ITALIANO'S ITALIAN RESTAURANTS HUMBLE, TX - DINNER MENU
Italiano's Restaurants, considered by many to be the best Italian restaurants in the Houston area, serve a variety of tasty chicken, veal, steak and seafood as well as pasta and vegetarian entrees. Customers rave about the tasty Italian food and great service at
our four locations
, including three in the Humble area and one in Pearland. View our dinner menu below to see what fabulous meals you want to try during your next visit.
Although you cannot smell the enticing aroma of these Italian foods cooking as you do when entering one of our restaurants, your taste buds will come alive as you read about each entrée and anticipate the dining experience that awaits you. We look forward to serving you!
Need a caterer or a private banquet room? Call Al or Susie at 832-971-8400.
Contact Us
*Prices subject to change without notice*

About the Business
Often referred to as “the wine lover's restaurant,” Sixty Vines delivers simple, yet flavorful cuisine paired perfectly with 60 wines on its sustainable tap system. Every plate and pour is designed to inspire adventure and discovery of wine culture reimagined. Guests are encouraged to experience abundance over shared plates, enjoy wine “pinkies down” and to visit for brunch, lunch and dinner. Signature menu items include charcuterie boards, seasonal proteins, wood fired pizzas and innovative pasta dishes all inspired by ingredients found in wine country.
…

Recognizing
"Our Family"
who have been with us for 10, 20, 25, and 30 years!
Thank You!
For over 30 years, Carrabba’s has been Houston’s true neighborhood restaurant. Family owned and operated, The Original Carrabba’s on Kirby Drive opened on Dec. 26, 1986, with $500 in the cash register (a loan from Mr. C, Johnny’s dad), 94 seats, seven barstools, and a menu whose most expensive item was a $9.95 T-bone steak and a glass of the best wine came in at a whopping $2.25.
After the initial success of the restaurant – “lightning in a bottle,” Johnny has called it – a second location opened at Voss Road and Woodway Drive. Eventually, the original Carrabba’s outgrew its 3,000 square feet and moved to a newer, larger space.  What began with a relatively simple concept – a casual Italian restaurant that featured a wood-burning pizza oven, big bowls of pasta, and an open kitchen – would become the heart of Houston’s dining scene.
But for all the changes Carrabba’s has undergone over the years, some things have remained constant: Our commitment to fantastic food, the warm, inviting, comfortable, family-oriented feeling of our restaurants, mature servers who understand the value of impressing and appreciating our guests, and a staff that has fun and knows our customers by name.
We don’t operate our restaurants based on lessons learned in some fancy cooking school or business book. We operate them based on heart and soul, and a belief that our job at the end of the day is to give our guests an experience they’ll love – and remember. And that’s what we do. Every day.

Privacy Statement
All rights reserved. We respect your privacy. And it is our policy not to share or sell any information you provide us. Our web site contains several contact forms that allow visitors to interact with our company. These forms require personal information so that we can respond to requests efficiently especially if the response entails the use of U.S. mail or another courier. The information we collect through these forms is used only to respond to specific requests. We retain this information but do not use it for any other purpose.
Periodically we may use cookies to collect non-personally identifiable information. This helps us detect things such as browser type and plug-ins, and navigational information regarding which pages visitors go to and when. If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us by email, snail mail, phone, or fax.
The Original Carrabba's is committed to providing equal employment and volunteer opportunities to all individuals without regard to race, religion, gender, national origin, age, sexual orientation or disability. Our intent is to provide a work environment that is free of discrimination, harassment or intimidation. We respect individuality and creativity.

An assortment of white truffle-inspired appetizers created by Chef Giancarlo
Sparkling Wine Pairing: Rustico Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore DOCG by Nino Franco

Antipasto

Maine lobster tail poached in truffle butter and stock, served with a fennel and lemon zest confit salad, topped with a truffle lobster foam

Primo Piatto
Girelle di Pasta con Burrata e Prosciutto di Parma e Salvia, Salsa al Parmigiano Reggiano e Tartufo Bianco
Fresh pasta rolled with imported burrata cheese, sage and prosciutto di Parma, served with Parmigiano Reggiano sauce and shavings of white truffles

About Us
Mia Bella Trattoria - which translates as "My Beautiful" Trattoria - is a delightful combination of Italian tradition and regional American twists.  With multiple locations, the dining destinations are fun, intimate and moderately priced just like the traditional Trattorias where Italian families gathered for wine and delicious food.  In a tradition of his own making, Owner/Chef Youssef Nafaa has created an exciting menu of familiar foods pushed to a new level with daring preparations and imaginative ingredients.  Wine lovers will find a pleasingly extensive list of evenly priced wines while those seeking cocktails will find the same combination of classic recipes and creative mixings which set the menus apart.

Mia Bella's owner and head chef, Youssef Nafaa presides over lunch and dinner every day and brunch on Sundays.  The restaurant not only provides dine-in and carry-out, but also offers full catering services.  Lunch menus include pizza, calzone, panini sandwiches, and unusual dishes like marinated quail with shrimp, and scallops with salmon lasagna.  Guests can also create their own pasta or risotto by choosing from 9 kinds of pasta, 12 different ingredients and 11 different sauces.  Dinners include salads, topped with asparagus, grilled hearts of romaine or smoked salmon, while main entrees include New York strip steak, caramelized halibut, and whole wheat tortellini filled with spinach. The Sunday brunch is served and guests can choose from eggs, pancakes, calzones, french toast, salmon, and omelettes cooked to their specifications.

menu
menu
our menu
Potente focuses on sourcing local products whenever possible and uses only the highest quality ingredients. The kitchen is overseen by Executive Chef Danny Trace. Chef Danny and his team shop the local Houston Farmers Markets on select Saturday mornings to choose the fruits and vegetables that he will serve at Potente. The modern Italian menu features all wild-caught seafood selections, USDA steaks and homemade pastas. In November 2020, Potente’s truffle pasta was featured as
“One of the Best Pastas in the Country”
by the Food Network.

The restaurant’s boutique wine list features a vast selection of Italian wines, as well as a section of California’s finest vintners. Should you need a recommendation from our wine list, our Sommelier is available during dinner service to assist. In addition to our special collection of wine, a selection of fine whiskeys, scotches, tequilas, spirits, liquors and craft beers are available.
CHEF TRACE
Executive Chef Danny Trace joined Potente and
Osso & Kristalla
in 2017.

“The most memorable meals for me are of my grandmother and grandfather in the kitchen. My grandmother’s family was from Milan and Naples, Italy and my grandfather was a Cajun from Thibodaux, Louisiana. From étouffée to grand bowls of pasta, the marriage of these traditional dishes and family experiences is the very reason I am a chef.”
chef danny's bio
happy hour
Potente boasts one of the best Happy Hour menus in downtown Houston. Whether you are joining us after work or before an Astros game, the bar has a lively, yet refined atmosphere. In 2023 Potente was listed as one of the
“11 Most Romantic Bars to Impress Your Date in Houston.”
Happy Hour is weekdays from 5-7pm in the bar area.
*Menus subject to change.

Additional Info
Ready for the Most Wonderful Time of the Year?
Celebrate big, celebrate bold - book your Holiday Private Dining now!
Learn More
Conveniently located at Avenida Houston and connected to the George R. Brown Convention Center, Grotto Downtown offers a chic, vibrant dining experience in the heart of Houston--within walking distance to Minute Maid Park, Toyota Center and Discovery Green. Unlike any other Grotto, Downtown offers a new look with a rustic, warehouse style interior and exposed brick. From small and shareable plates, fresh and local salads to refreshing and dynamic Italian cuisine, Grotto's menu also offers a selection of curated craft beers, Grappa and wine--the ideal place for any occasion whether it's lunch, happy hour, a business meeting or dinner in the city.

Grato Italian Restaurant
Welcome to Grato: Your Italian Corner in Cypress, TX
Welcome to Grato, a locally owned family restaurant. For us, food is more than just a meal — it's a way to bring people together. From our homemade pasta sauces  to our hand-tossed pizzas, every dish is crafted with love, passion. When you're here, you're part of the family.

$25.00
Shredded King Oyster mushroom, Jackfruit & onions cooked in sweet and zesty BBQ sauce with chopped   cucumbers, tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, pickled purple cabbage and Tzatziki sauce, all wrapped in our house made Hot & Fresh out of oven Naan bread and served with your choice of side.
Grilled Chicken Chunks Caesar Salad
$18.00
Seasoned grilled chicken Chunks on top of fresh artisan romaine lettuce tossed in our house made caesar dressing topped with seasoned croutons and Violife parmesan cheese. *( Make it 100% Gluten Free without croutons.)*

$25.00/Single Skewer
$35.00/Triple Skewer
$45.00

Bánh mì

$25.00
$35.00
$45.00
*(Large feed two)* Fresh house made Large or X-Large Naan bread. your choice of single, double or triple kabob koobideh skewer, fresh organic spring mix, pickled purple cabbage, baked mix fries, chopped cucumbers, tomatoes, bell peppers, onions with garlic aioli, Tzatziki and space sauce. wrapped like burrito and cut in half.

Starchild
$15.00

$18.00

Caprese

Pepperoni/ Chicken Alfredo Pizza

Cut in 4 big Slices. fold them like tacos and enjoy! *(GLUTEN FREE CRUST 5)*
Texas BBQ Pizza

Your choice of crust, House BBQ sauce, house  mozzarella blend, chicken chunks, Smoked Bacon, italian sausage, onions and banana peppers.

Annoying Vegan

Parmesan garlic butter Stuffed Crust with Violife Smoked        Provolone cheese, topped with House mozzarella Blend, seasoned grilled chicken chunks, pepperonis, smoked bacon and Beyond sausage. ***(Make it SUPER ANNOYING Vegan with Pepperoni & Cheese STUUFED CRUST+9)***

(Make it Gluten Free with our toasted Gluten Free Burger Bun +3)

Perfect for sharing  between 3 to 5 ppl *(Pro tip: +add Extra Kabob Koobideh.)*
Fried Rice
$15.00

Pizza
We use only the finest ingredients in our hand-tossed pizzas. Bene grazie! Each pizza is topped with Mozzarella, Provolone, and Romano cheeses. Available in traditional, whole wheat or gluten free* crust.
*Gluten free crust available on 12” pizza only for a $5 up-charge.
Size of Pizza    8″ | 12″ | 16″ | 20″

TRADITIONAL TOPPINGS –
Pepperoni, Italian Sausage, Ground Beef, Canadian Bacon, Mushrooms, Roma Tomatoes, Onions, Green Olives, Black Olives, Jalapeños, Artichoke Hearts, Eggplant, Bell Peppers, Sun Dried Tomatoes, Anchovies, Feta Cheese, Pineapple, Spinach, Extra Cheese
Pasta
We pride ourselves in how choosy we are when it comes to pasta. We take extra special care in its preparation (we even stuff our own pastas), gently cooking each into these gloriously delicious dishes. All are served with a small house salad, or substitute a small version of any of our salads for a small up-charge.

Catering Humble, Kingwood & N. Houston Areas - Italiano's Restaurant
Home
Catering
Event Catering
Italiano's Restaurant offers excellent special event catering in Humble, Kingwood and surrounding areas. If you want
Italian catering for a corporate event
in Houston, the Woodlands, Atascocita or Spring, look no further. Italiano's is the place to call. This local family restaurant in Humble, Texas offers the finest authentic Italian foods such as Chicken Marsala, Homemade Lasagna, Pene Ala Vodka and Chicken Cacciatore. Whether catering wedding parties in Humble, birthday parties in Kingwood or a Bat Mitzvah or Bar Mitzvah in Houston, Italiano's helps to make each of the events more successful and memorable.
Order Catering by the Pan or Half Pan
Italiano's prepares mouthwatering meals using recipes handed down through the family from Italy and cooked with the freshest of vegetables. You can order each dish by the pan, which serves about 20-24 guests, or by the half pan for serving about 10-12 people. Order a few of the different dishes and add a fresh garden salad with homemade salad dressing, some homemade marinara sauce and Italiano's famous garlic knot bread for an unforgettable meal your guests will be raving about. Italiano's can even supply the drinks, serving utensils, sets of plates, salad bowls and dinnerware. You only need to provide the tables and hungry guests. Our
catering menu
includes our most popular dishes, though we're happy to create custom dishes for your special event.
Italiano's offers catering services for special events that include up to 2,000 guests. Located at FM 1960 and Highway 59, Italiano's Humble restaurant offers convenient take-out of orders as well as local drop-off, although a minimum purchase of $100 is required for delivery service.
Host Your Party at Italiano's
If you need a place to hold your event, Italiano's
banquet halls
with full catering service available are ideal for private parties, banquets and receptions. Our new private banquet hall adjacent to the restaurant seats 150 guests and is large enough to bring your own band or DJ.
To learn more about Italiano's banquet halls or catering in Humble, call 832-971-8400 and ask for Susie or Al. They will be happy to help you!
View our catering menu
Italiano’s Humble catering menu features classic Italian foods prepared using recipes handed down through generations.

*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness • Your own wine pairing: 1 glass of prosecco + 2 wines by the glass of your choice for $32.00 • Gluten-free pasta available.
Antipasti
Caprese
$18.00
A fresh and vibrant Italian salad featuring  mozzarella by Lira Rossa, aromatic pesto, and ripe tomatoes. This dish is a celebration of simple, high-quality ingredients.  (Lira Rossa mozzarella, pesto, tomatoes)
Bruschetta Pomodoro Rucola
$11.00
Classic Italian appetizer featuring juicy cherry tomatoes and peppery arugula, served on toasted bread. This dish combines freshness and crunch in every bite. (Cherry tomatoes, arugula)
Burrata Fritta
$24.00
Fried burrata served with a rich pomodoro sauce and fresh basil, offering a delightful blend of creamy, crispy, and tangy flavors. (Fried burrata, pomodoro sauce, basil)
Burrata Pesto
$25.00
Delight in the fusion of textures with fried burrata atop a fresh spring mix salad, cherry tomatoes, and a generous drizzle of pesto. This dish combines creamy, crispy, and vibrant flavors for a refreshing taste experience. (Fried burrata, pesto, spring mix salad, cherry tomatoes)
L' Antipasto
$31.00
A classic Italian starter featuring prosciutto crudo, creamy burrata, tender artichoke hearts, and sweet cherry tomatoes. This dish offers a delightful variety of flavors and textures, perfect for beginning any meal but definitively rich. (Prosciutto crudo, burrata, artichoke, cherry tomatoes)
Ricotta Fritta
$17.00
Creamy fried ricotta by Lira Rossa, paired with peppery arugula and sweet cherry tomatoes for a delightful combination of flavors and textures. (Fried ricotta, arugula, cherry tomatoes)
Selezioni Di Salumi E Formaggi
$27.00/small
$42.00/large
A curated selection of locally sourced Italian cheeses and cured meats, offering a delightful variety of rich and savory flavors perfect for sharing  (2 sizes available).
Crostini
$17.00
Crispy fried and toasted sourdough bread topped with a drizzle of olive oil, creamy mozzarella, and savory prosciutto for a delightful blend of textures and flavors. (Fried & toasted sourdough bread, olive oil, mozzarella, prosciutto)
Cozze Alla Marinara
$25.00
Fresh mussels cooked with a touch of heat from chili flakes, fragrant garlic, and a splash of white wine. This classic Italian dish offers a savory and slightly spicy taste of the sea.  (*Mussels, chili flakes, garlic, white wine)
Bresaola, Rucola E Parmigiano
$23.00
Thin slices of lean, dried salted beef (Bresaola) served with peppery arugula and shavings of rich Parmesan cheese, creating a light yet flavorful dish. (Bresaola (lean dried salted beef), arugula and parmesan)
Cuore Di Carciofo
$12.00
Tender artichoke hearts dressed in olive oil and garnished with fresh parsley. This simple yet elegant dish highlights the delicate flavor of artichokes.  (Artichokes, olive oil, parsley.)
Tartare Di Tonno*
$28.00
Fresh tuna tartare served with a mix of crispy vegetables. This dish offers a delicate balance of flavors and textures, highlighting the freshness of the tuna. (Tuna tartare, crispy vegetables)
Primi
Lasagna Alla Bolognese
$29.00
Layers of pasta sheets generously filled with our housemade Bolognese sauce, featuring a rich blend of ground meat, tomatoes, and aromatic vegetables. This classic Italian dish is baked to perfection, offering a hearty and flavorful experience. Probably the best Lasagna in Houston! (Housemade bolognese sauce)
Spaghetti Ai Pomodorini E Basilico
$25.00
A light and fresh pasta dish featuring stewed cherry tomatoes, fragrant basil, and a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese. This classic combination highlights the natural sweetness of the tomatoes and the aromatic flavor of basil. (Stewed cherry tomatoes, basil, parmesan)
Cacio E Pepe
$23.00
A simple yet flavorful Italian pasta dish made with Pecorino Romano cheese and freshly ground black pepper, highlighting the beauty of minimalistic ingredients. (Pecorino romano cheese, black pepper.)
Melanzane Alla Parmigiana
$27.00
Layers of tender eggplant baked with rich tomato sauce and topped with melted Parmesan cheese. This classic Italian dish combines the earthy flavor of eggplant with the savory goodness of tomatoes and cheese for a comforting, hearty meal. A Vegetarian alternative to our Lasagana. (Eggplant, parmesan, tomatoes)
Carbonara
$27.00
A rich and creamy Italian pasta dish featuring guanciale (cured pork cheek), egg yolk, Pecorino Romano cheese, and freshly ground black pepper, creating a deliciously savory and authentic flavor. one of the few true and traditional Italian carbonara in Houston. (*Guanciale, egg yolk, pecorino romano cheese, black pepper)
Amatriciana
$28.00
A traditional Italian pasta dish featuring savory guanciale, ripe tomatoes, Pecorino Romano cheese, and a touch of black pepper, offering a rich and robust flavor profile. (Guanciale, tomatoes, pecorino romano cheese, black pepper)
Linguine Al Branzino
$35.00
Linguine pasta served with tender branzino, complemented by a light sauce of white wine, fresh oregano, and tomatoes. This dish combines the delicate taste of sea bass with aromatic herbs and a touch of acidity from the tomatoes. (Branzino, white wine, fresh oregano, tomatoes)
Fettucine ‘Nduja
$27.00
Savory fettucine pasta tossed with spicy pork 'nduja sausage, creating a dish that balances the heat and rich flavors of the sausage with the smooth texture of the pasta. (Spiced pork 'nduja sausage)
Fettucine Al Pesto
$25.00
Delight in the fresh flavors of fettucine pasta coated in a vibrant pesto sauce made from pine nuts, basil, Pecorino Romano, and Parmesan cheese. This dish offers a creamy, nutty, and herbaceous taste that embodies the essence of Italian cuisine. (Pine nuts, basil, pecorino romano, parmesan)
Linguine Al Prosciutto Di Parma
$28.00
Linguine pasta tossed with Parma prosciutto, Parmesan cheese, white wine, and butter. This dish combines the savory richness of prosciutto with a creamy, buttery sauce enhanced by a hint of white wine. (Parma prosciutto, parmesan, white wine, butter)
Linguine Alla Pescatora
$45.00
A seafood feast with linguine pasta served in a spicy tomato sauce, featuring a delightful mix of shrimp, scallops, and mussels. This dish offers a perfect blend of heat, freshness, and ocean flavors. (Linguine with spicy tomato sauce, shrimp, scallops and mussels)
Ravioli All'aragosta
$35.00
Luxurious lobster-filled ravioli, perfectly complemented by a rich and creamy tomato brandy sauce. This dish combines the sweetness of lobster with the depth and complexity of the brandy-infused cream sauce for an exquisite dining experience. (Lobster, tomato brandy cream sauce.)
Ravioli Alle "Costolette"
$31.00
Short rib, basil, tomato sauce.
Ravioli Di Magro E Mozzarella
$27.00
Delight in spinach-filled ravioli paired with creamy mozzarella, drizzled with olive oil, and garnished with sweet cherry tomatoes. This dish offers a fresh and light combination of flavors, perfect for a satisfying yet delicate meal. (Spinach ravioli,  mozzarella, olive oil, cherry tomatoes)
Risotto Verdure E Capesante
$33.00
Harmonious blend of creamy vegetable risotto paired with perfectly seared scallops. This dish combines the fresh flavors of seasonal vegetables with the delicate sweetness of scallops for a satisfying and elegant meal. (Vegetable risotto, scallops)
Spaghetti Alla Bolognese
$27.00
Classic spaghetti served with a rich and hearty Bolognese sauce, made with a savory blend of ground meat, tomatoes, and aromatic vegetables, simmered to perfection. (Spaghetti with bolognese sauce)

$32.00
Tender grilled octopus paired with a fresh spring mix salad and drizzled with aromatic pesto. This dish offers a perfect combination of smoky, savory octopus with a refreshing and herbaceous salad. )Grilled octopus, pesto, spring mix salad.
Cotoletta Alla Milanese Con Rucola
$46.00
A classic Italian dish featuring a crispy fried veal chop served with a fresh spring mix salad and peppery arugula. This dish combines the rich flavors of the tender veal with the light and refreshing salad for a balanced meal. (Fried veal chop, spring mix salad)
Branzino Alla Griglia

Branzino filet, asparagus, cherry tomatoes.
Tagliata Al Rosmarino
$49.00
Robust flavors of an Angus filet, perfectly cooked and infused with rosemary, accompanied by roasted potatoes and carrots. This dish offers a satisfying combination of tender meat and hearty, flavorful vegetables. (*Angus filet, roasted potatoes, roasted carrots)
Tonno in Crosta Di Sesamo
$43.00
Seared tuna encrusted with sesame seeds, paired with a fresh spring mix salad. This dish offers a delightful contrast of textures and flavors, with the nutty sesame crust enhancing the tender tuna. (*Seared tuna, sesame seeds, spring mix salad)

Recognizing
"Our Family"
who have been with us for 10, 20, 25, and 30 years!
Thank You!
For over 30 years, Carrabba’s has been Houston’s true neighborhood restaurant. Family owned and operated, The Original Carrabba’s on Kirby Drive opened on Dec. 26, 1986, with $500 in the cash register (a loan from Mr. C, Johnny’s dad), 94 seats, seven barstools, and a menu whose most expensive item was a $9.95 T-bone steak and a glass of the best wine came in at a whopping $2.25.
After the initial success of the restaurant – “lightning in a bottle,” Johnny has called it – a second location opened at Voss Road and Woodway Drive. Eventually, the original Carrabba’s outgrew its 3,000 square feet and moved to a newer, larger space.  What began with a relatively simple concept – a casual Italian restaurant that featured a wood-burning pizza oven, big bowls of pasta, and an open kitchen – would become the heart of Houston’s dining scene.
But for all the changes Carrabba’s has undergone over the years, some things have remained constant: Our commitment to fantastic food, the warm, inviting, comfortable, family-oriented feeling of our restaurants, mature servers who understand the value of impressing and appreciating our guests, and a staff that has fun and knows our customers by name.
We don’t operate our restaurants based on lessons learned in some fancy cooking school or business book. We operate them based on heart and soul, and a belief that our job at the end of the day is to give our guests an experience they’ll love – and remember. And that’s what we do. Every day.

Join our list
to be the first to hear about new menu additions, special events, gift cards, online ordering and developments within the Johnny Carrabba's family of restaurants.
Johnny Carrabba Family of Restaurants are closed on the following holidays:
New Year’s Day, July 4th, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve and Christmas Day
Carrabba’s is a casual restaurant, however, proper attire is required at our discretion.  If a guideline is not met, guests may be asked to change or cover up before being seated.
Privacy
Copyright
close
Privacy Statement
All rights reserved. We respect your privacy. And it is our policy not to share or sell any information you provide us. Our web site contains several contact forms that allow visitors to interact with our company. These forms require personal information so that we can respond to requests efficiently especially if the response entails the use of U.S. mail or another courier. The information we collect through these forms is used only to respond to specific requests. We retain this information but do not use it for any other purpose.
Periodically we may use cookies to collect non-personally identifiable information. This helps us detect things such as browser type and plug-ins, and navigational information regarding which pages visitors go to and when. If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us by email, snail mail, phone, or fax.
The Original Carrabba's is committed to providing equal employment and volunteer opportunities to all individuals without regard to race, religion, gender, national origin, age, sexual orientation or disability. Our intent is to provide a work environment that is free of discrimination, harassment or intimidation. We respect individuality and creativity.

About George's Pastaria
George's Pastaria has been a beloved Italian restaurant in Houston since the 80s, offering a delightful menu that captures the essence of Italy. With a commitment to quality and taste, we provide catering services and convenient online ordering to serve our customers better.
Located at 1722 S Dairy Ashford, Houston, Tx 77077, George's Pastaria values customer feedback above all else. Our dedication to exceptional service ensures that every visit is a memorable experience for our guests.

click here to start a delivery order
For pick up order call 713-225-5656 Option 2
Pizza
Frank’s famous hand-tossed pizzas are made with the finest ingredients.  We make our own dough and create our own sauce daily.  Menu items are subject to change.
EXTRA LARGE 18" (SERVES 4) / LARGE 16" (SERVES 3) / MEDIUM 12" (SERVES 2) / PERSONAL 8" (SERVES 1)
Note: Personal size pizzas are a delivery special.
TRADITIONAL FLAVORS
SCRUMPTIOUS SUPREME
The Works! Our most popular pizza loaded with pepperoni, hamburger, sausage, green peppers, tomatoes, black olives, mushrooms and onions.
MEAT SPECIAL
An Italian specialty loaded with sausage crumbles, seasoned hamburger, and tasty pepperoni.
CLASSIC PEPPERONI
Covered with savory fine-sliced pepperoni.
SIMPLY CHEESE
Our tasty cheese special with our famous home-made marinara pizza sauce.
VEGETARIAN SPECIALS
MARGHERITA
A light and delicious pizza loaded with fresh sliced tomatoes and basil seasoning.
PESTO SPINACH
Titillate your taste buds with fresh herbs and spices, olive oil, and fresh spinach.  Definitely two thumbs up!
GARDEN VEGGIE
A healthy variety of vegetables including chopped onions, bell peppers, fresh spinach, tomatoes, black olives, and mushrooms.
MUSHROOM
Loaded with freshly sliced mushrooms.
HOUSE SPECIALTIES
BOUDIN AND BACON
Our Cajun inspired pizza is loaded with boudin and bacon. Da best pizza you never had before again.
CHICKEN FIESTA
South of the border pizza made with tender fajita chicken morsels, jalapeños, queso, black olives, mushrooms, onions, tomatoes, and green peppers with our delicious Pesto sauce.
PESTO CHICKEN
Topped with tender chicken morsels, fresh herbs and spices with our famous pesto sauce.
CHICKEN SPECIAL
Similar to the Scrumptious Supreme, but with chicken.  Topped with tender chicken morsels, green peppers, tomatoes, black olives, mushrooms, and onions.
HAWAIIAN
A tropical treat loaded with Canadian bacon and pineapple bits.
BAR-B-QUE CHICKEN
Tender chunks of chicken, Bar-B-Que sauce, topped with extra cheese.
CHICKEN BACON RANCH
Tender chicken, yummy bacon, Ranch dressing instead of marinara, topped with cheese.
CREATE YOUR OWN
MEAT TOPPINGS
Bacon, Canadian bacon, marinated grilled chicken, sliced ham, seasoned hamburger, tasty pepperoni, Italian sausage crumbles, and sliced turkey.
VEGETABLE TOPPINGS
Imported black olives, chopped green peppers, zesty jalapeños, marinated mushrooms, diced onions, tangy pineapples, fresh spinach, and diced tomatoes.
DIPPING SAUCES
A great way to enhance your pizza experience.  Our customers love them!  Your choice of Ranch, Marinara, or Bar-B-Que sauce.
BACK TO MENU
Lasagna
Healthy ingredients include home-made marinara sauce, pasta, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, and house spices.  Freshly baked when ordered.  Comes with 3 freshly baked breadsticks. Menu items are subject to change.
Beef Lasagna
A delicious choice with seasoned ground beef and house spices.
Spinach Lasagna
A lighter version with fresh spinach marinated in our house spices.
Chicken Lasagna
Similar to the Beef Lasagna, but with chicken instead of beef.
Breadsticks (3 pc)
Made from our own pizza dough.  Comes with 1 ranch and 1 marinara dipping sauce.
Small Group Lasagna
Includes 10 breadsticks. Serves 4 people.
Small Group Beef Lasagna
Small Group Spinach Lasagna
Small Group Chicken Lasagna
Large Group Lasagna
Includes 24 breadsticks. Serves 12 people.
Large Group Beef Lasagna
Large Group Spinach Lasagna
Large Group Chicken Lasagna
BACK TO MENU
BACK TO MENU
Sandwiches
Our sandwiches are made to order using wholesome ingredients.  Try them once and you'll come back for more.  Sandwiches come with a pickle slice on the side and coleslaw (substitute chips for fries or onion rings for additional charge). Menu items are subject to change.
Triple Decker Club
A Texas-size meal, loaded with tender turkey, honey ham, sizzling bacon, and Swiss and American cheeses.  Garnished with fresh lettuce and tomatoes.
Philly Cheesesteak
A delicious grilled sandwich with thinly sliced beef, grilled green peppers and onions. Topped with melted provolone cheese on a hoagie bun.
Philly Cheese Chicken
Same as the Philly Cheesesteak above, but with tender chicken breast.
Frank's B.L.T
An old-fashioned sandwich layered with delicious crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and tomatoes.
Ham and Cheese
A traditional sandwich layered with delicious Wisconsin ham and American cheese.  Garnished with fresh lettuce and tomatoes.
Tempting Turkey
Mouth-watering sliced turkey breast with fresh lettuce and tomatoes.
Veggie Sandwhich
Sautéed onions, mushrooms, green peppers, tomatoes, and black olives, plus fresh spinach and provolone cheese on a hoagie bun.
Burgers
A huge 1/2 pound tender, lean beef patty served on a wheat bun with lettuce and tomatoes. Includes a side of Frank's fries (substitute onion rings for no additional charge). Menu items are subject to change.
Hamburger
Cheeseburger
Bacon Cheeseburger
Mushroom & Swiss Cheeseburger
Spicy Black Bean Veggie Burger
BACK TO MENU
BACK TO MENU
WINGS & SIDES
Great finger foods to satisfy your taste buds. Menu items are subject to change.
Spicy Wings
Frank's delicious Buffalo style wings are some of the best wings in town.  Comes with ranch dressing (1 with 5pc, 2 with 10pc, 3 with 20pc).
Pepperoni Pizza Rolls
Our fresh hand made rolls are a great appetizer and make an excellent party treat.  Comes with ranch and marinara dipping sauces (1 ea with 2 pc, 2 ea with 4 pc, 6 ea with 12 pc)
Cheese Pizza Rolls
Same as Pepperoni Pizza Rolls above, but without pepperoni.
Breadsticks (3 pc)
Made from our own pizza dough.  Comes with 1 ranch and 1 marinara dipping sauce.
Cheese Sticks (6 pc)
Mozzarella Cheese Sticks.  Comes with 1 marinara dipping sauce.
Frank's Fries
The best fries around town.  Our fries are baked, not fried. Regular or Large
Onion Rings
Our tasty onion rings are also baked, not fried. Regular or Large
Chips
Plain, Barbeque, Jalapeño, or Nacho Cheese
SALADS
Dressing choices: Ranch, Italian, Blue Cheese, Honey Mustard, or Balsamic Vinaigrette. Menu items are subject to change.
Garden Salad
Side salad with Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, carrots, and purple cabbage.  Comes with croutons and dressing on the side.
Chef's Salad
Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, carrots, purple cabbage, mozzarella cheese, and turkey.  Comes with croutons and dressing on the side.
Grilled Chicken Salad
Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, carrots, purple cabbage, mozzarella cheese, and grilled chicken breast.  Comes with croutons and dressing on the side.

About the Business
Business owner information
Marisol G.
Business Owner
Global Food, Transparency, Balance. These are the hallmarks of what makes Mastrantos the fastest growing restaurants in The Heights neighborhood of Houston, TX. We're committed to providing healthy cuisine, bursting with delicious flavors in our restaurant. We seasonal menus, with global tastes with responsibly sourced ingredients. In the morning we are a breakfast & brunch restaurant and artisan coffee shop, serving up unique brunch staples and pastries form our signature dough lab. Then for lunch and dinner we are a sophisticated global restaurant, offering delicious pastas, vegetarian & gluten free options and elite wine pairings. Our slogan is "every meal matters, and every meal should be enjoyed." Join us for Brunch or Dinner Today!

Indulge in a lavish feast of exceptional flavors at our Cypress, Texas restaurant. We pride ourselves on offering unparalleled culinary artistry for everyone to enjoy, whether you’re dining in or looking for a restaurant near you that delivers. Immerse yourself in a symphony of refined tastes, meticulously curated from the finest ingredients, as our talented chefs expertly blend tradition with innovation. From delectable homemade pastas to tantalizing seafood delicacies, each dish embodies luxury and sophistication. View our all-day menu below.

Frenchies Italian Restaurant
Frenchies Italian Restaurant Menu (Update 2025)
Home
Menu
Frenchies Italian Restaurant in Houston, TX, offers a cozy and authentic dining experience with a variety of Italian dishes. The menu features appetizers like Garlicky Escargot and Fresh Mozzarella, along with soups like Minestrone and Chicken Gumbo. Their salads, such as the Antipasto and Caesar, are fresh and flavorful. Customers rave about the homemade pasta and rich, delicious flavors of dishes like spaghetti with meat sauce and fettuccine Alfredo. The owner, a sweet elderly Italian man, and his family provide warm and welcoming service. The ambiance is relaxed, with NASA memorabilia adding to the charm of the restaurant. Frenchies is a local gem serving the community for decades, offering great prices and generous portions. Whether you're a fan of authentic Italian cuisine or looking for a new favorite spot, Frenchies is a must-try.

Frenchies Italian Restaurant
Experience the best and most authentic Italian cuisine at Frenchies Italian Restaurant in Houston, TX. Enjoy a warm and welcoming atmosphere with delicious homemade pasta dishes, salads, and appetizers. With over 50 years of serving the community, Frenchies is a must-visit restaurant for foodies and NASA enthusiasts alike.

**Our gluten-friendly and cauliflower crusts have a gluten content of less than 20ppm based on information provided by our ingredient suppliers; however, we cannot guarantee that pizzas made with these crusts will be gluten-free as we prepare all of our pizzas in a common kitchen with a risk of gluten exposure. In addition, certain toppings contain gluten. We do not recommend these pizzas for guests with Celiac Disease. Guests with gluten sensitivities should exercise judgment in consuming these pizzas.

In order to provide an elevated experience, we kindly ask that our guests abide by the strict upscale, elegant dress code at our Zanti River Oaks location. The following items are strictly prohibited in our restaurants: Beachwear, Tracksuits, Sportswear, Athletic Tops, T-Shirts & Shorts, Ball Caps, Flip Flops & excessively revealing clothing. Catering
Houston’s Authentic Brazilian Steakhouse Experience
Fogo de Chão Houston is located near the Galleria on famed Westheimer Road, featuring expansive dining rooms for all occasions from intimate to grand celebrations, a white Carrara marble Market Table, and a lively Bar Fogo.   Differentiated menus are offered for all dayparts including lunch, dinner, weekend brunch and group dining, plus full-service catering and contactless takeout and delivery options.
Parking
Complimentary valet and self-parking available.
All Day Happy Hour
Join us for All Day Happy Hour at Bar Fogo, featuring $5 Beers, $8 South American Wines and $10 Brazilian-Inspired Cocktails.
To-Go and Catering
Bring the Fogo experience to you with delivery or pick up.

Events
Cakebread Cellars Wine Dinner
Join us on Thursday, October 9th for a four-course experience featuring a chef-curated Churrasco menu paired with elegant wines from Cakebread Cellars. Make your reservations now, space is limited.
Reserve Now
Wagyu & Wine Bar Event
Join us on Thursday, November 6th for the ultimate steak & wine tasting. Indulge in side-by-side tastings of Wagyu Ribeye and Bone-In Ribeye, each perfectly paired with VIK wines. Make your reservations now, space is limited.
RESERVE NOW
Fogo Happy Hour. So good, it lasts all day.
We’re offering Happy Hour Specials and Half-Price South American bottles of wine under $130. All Day Every Day. In the dining room and bar. So drop by anytime.
Reserve Now
Group Dining
Learn More
Whether celebrating a special birthday, hosting a large corporate meeting, or a complete buyout of the restaurant, Fogo is the ideal place for groups of all sizes. Our dedicated sales managers will offer a range of customizable menus, package options, private and semi-private dining spaces to suit your needs.

FAQ
Menu
Our menu features Neo-Neapolitan dishes informed by Italian tradition with the unexpected.
Introducing the Fiery Baroness by the Pasta Queen
Order
Reservations
Egg. Bacon jam. Pizza. Say less. Uovo is back!
Order
Reservations
New Torta al Limone will transport you to Italy’s coast!
Order
Reservations
Pizza
Pasta
Appetizers
Salad
Dessert
Pizza
Daniele Uditi’s interpretation of the Naples staple is reimagined with consciously sourced toppings which blend the traditional with the unexpected. His signature “slow dough” is meticulously prepared and allowed to ferment for two days. The result is a light, easy-to-digest crust still sturdy enough to pick up with one hand.
Bianca Pizza
berkshire fennel sausage, fior di latte, panna, shaved fennel, red onion | nut free
Cacio e Pepe Pizza
provoloncino d’agerola, fior di latte, parmigiano crema, cracked black pepper | nut free | vegetarian
Carnivoro Pizza
san marzano dop, fior di latte, pepperoni, berkshire fennel sausage, prosciutto cotto, basil | nut free
Classic Cheese Pizza
san marzano dop, shredded fior di latte | nut free | vegetarian
Corbarina Pizza
san marzano dop, squash blossom, burrata, cherry tomato, gremolata | seasonal | nut free | vegetarian
Diavola Pizza
spicy salami, fior di latte, charred shallot, walnut romesco, honey
Funghi Pizza
seasonal mushroom, fior di latte, fontina, caramelized onion | nut free | vegetarian
Margherita al Crudo Pizza
san marzano dop, fior di latte, prosciutto di parma, arugula, shaved parmigiano, basil | nut free
Margherita Pizza
san marzano dop, fior di latte, basil | nut free | vegetarian
Neo Margherita Pizza
san marzano dop "polpa," fior di latte, basil crumb, basil | nut free | vegetarian
Pepperoni Pizza
san marzano dop, fior di latte, pepperoni, basil | nut free
Spinaci Pizza
spinach, fior di latte, basil pesto, roasted garlic, parmigiano crema | vegetarian
Vegan Funghi Pizza
seasonal mushroom, cauliflower besciamella, caramelized onion | nut free | vegan
Vegan Margherita Pizza
san marzano dop, vegan mozzarella, basil | nut free | vegan
Vodka Pizza
vodka sauce, smoked fior di latte, smoked coppa, parsley pesto, calabrian chile, oregano, pecorino | nut free
Pasta
Crafted with genuine Italian passion and the finest ingredients, Creste alla Vodka, Pappardelle alla Bolognese and Spaghetti al Pomodoro are a perfect complement to our pizzas. Grab a fork and twirl up the taste of Italy in every bite. Buon Appetito!
Creste Alla Vodka Pasta
creste di gallo pasta, san marzano dop vodka sauce, calabrian chile, parsley, parmigiano | nut free | vegetarian
Pappardelle Alla Bolognese Pasta
pappardelle pasta, 8 hour beef bolognese, san marzano dop, parmigiano crema, basil | nut free
Spaghetti Al Burro Pasta
spaghetti pasta, butter, parmigiano | nut free | vegetarian
Spaghetti Al Pomodoro Pasta
spaghetti pasta, san marzano dop, butter, parmigiano, basil, olive oil | nut free | vegetarian
Appetizers
In Italy, a meal is a marvelous journey, and our starters set the stage for a vibrant evening. Resist the rush to the main course and savor the prelude with dishes like Polpette al Forno, Carciofi Arrostiti and Caprese di Bufala. Our antipasti are crafted for sharing and to start lively conversation. Awaken your appetite with true Italian spirit!
Broccolini
charred broccolini, whipped ricotta, roasted garlic, parmigiano, honey, calabrian chile oil | gluten free | nut free | vegetarian
Caprese di Bufala
mozzarella di bufala, heirloom tomato, basil, oregano, garlic, balsamic, olive oil | seasonal | gluten free | nut free | vegetarian
Carciofi Arrostiti Artichoke
charred artichoke heart, crispy baby artichoke, toasted pine nut, parmigiano, lemon, olive oil | gluten free | vegetarian
Cavolfiore Cauliflower
crispy panko cauliflower, calabrian lemon aioli, parsley pesto, calabrian chile | nut free | vegetarian
Polpette al Forno Meatballs
oven seared meatball, san marzano dop, grilled bread | nut free
Salad
Revamp your salad game with our vibrant insalate like the Cavoletto di Bruxelles, Cesare and Tricolore! Packed with fresh local produce and bursting with Italian flavors, these salads do more than accompany a pizza - they steal the spotlight. Perfect for a refreshing bite or a veggie-forward twist to your meal.
Cavoletto di Bruxelles Salad
shaved brussels sprout, lolla rossa, apple, toasted pistachio, caramelized shallot vinaigrette | gluten free | vegan
Cesare Salad
little gem, fried caper, pizza crouton, parmigiano, calabrian chile caesar dressing | nut free
Chop Salad
kale, green leaf lettuce, frisee, cucumber, chickpea, avocado, kalamata olive, salami, provolone d’agerola, parmigiano, calabrian chile vinaigrette | gluten free | nut free
Rucola Salad
arugula, spinach, shaved fennel, lemon zest, pine nut, parmigiano, lemon citronette | gluten free | vegetarian
Tricolore Salad
arugula, treviso, endive, cherry tomato, candied walnut, red wine vinaigrette, parmigiano | gluten free | vegetarian
Dessert
Pastry Chef and Sprinkles Founder Candace Nelson offers her expertise to the dessert selection which features Italian-inspired sweets such as the cult favorite Chocolate Olive Oil Cake and Salted Caramel Panna Cotta with Pretzel Crunch.
Panna Cotta
salted caramel, vanilla bean panna cotta, caramelized pretzel | nut free
Tiramisu
ladyfinger, mascarpone cream, espresso, cocoa | nut free | vegetarian
Torta al Cioccolato
dark chocolate olive oil cake, vanilla ice cream | nut free | vegetarian
Torta al Limone
lemon sponge cake, white chocolate frosting, candied lemon | gluten free | nut free | vegetarian
Wine & Cocktails
Wine & Cocktails
Raise your glass to our eclectic mix of wines from the sunny vineyards of Italy and California, all ready to be savored by the glass or bottle. Twist things up with our cocktail menu that brings a dash of Italian flair with Sorrento Spritz, Negroni di Napoli and Limoncello Martini. For those who prefer their sips on the lighter side, our modtails mix up the fun with low ABV options while our vibrant mocktails pop with pure, non-alcoholic joy. Cin cin to drinks that dazzle!
Payment by credit or debit card only.
Our food may contain or come into contact with peanuts, tree nuts, dairy, soy and wheat.

Additional Info
Ready for the Most Wonderful Time of the Year?
Celebrate big, celebrate bold - book your Holiday Private Dining now!
Learn More
Inspired by an Old Country trattoria ambiance & classic Italian cooking, Grotto delivers a savory menu brimming with timeless recipes made on premises. Creations include many “Old World” signature dishes such as Neapolitan thin crust pizzas, Veal Kickerillo, Pollo Francese, Pasta Verdura and Snapper Siciliano. Enjoy Grotto’s famous Peach Bellini or extensive collection of Italian and domestic wines inside or on the patio.

DOWNLOADABLE MENUS ARE REPRESENTATIVE — OUR MENUS ARE SEASONAL AND CHANGE OFTEN
These menus are crafted for on premise dining only. The safety and satisfaction of our guests is our first priority at State of Grace. Many of the items listed are temperature and time sensitive and therefore not well suited for delivery. As a result, we are NOT affiliated with any third party delivery services, including DoorDash, GrubHub, Postmates, etc., and will not allow to-go orders to be placed or picked up through third parties at this time. We look forward to having you dine with us soon!

About the Business
Since 2017, Rocco's has been serving up pasta, handcrafted pizzas, and a curated selection of wine, beer and cocktails in as casual yet trendy setting. With a focus on bold flavors and warm, welcoming vibes. it's the kind of place where friends gather, conversations flow, and every meal feels like a celebration. Whether you're stopping by for an glass of wine, sharing a pizza, or enjoying a nigh out, we bring people together over great food and good energy.

raw_text:
Menu | PIZZA INN
Menu
Locations
Franchising
With dough house-made fresh all day, and a buffet full of family favorites, it’s easy to see why we’ve been America’s Hometown Pizza Place for 60 years and counting. After just one bite, you’ll taste why there’s no topping Pizza Inn. Menu choices vary by location.
Alfredo Cheese
– Creamy Alfredo sauce and mozzarella cheese. (360 cal./slice)
Bacon Cheddar Ham
– Bacon, ham, cheddar and mozzarella cheeses. (380 cal./slice)
Bacon Cheeseburger
– Mustard sauce topped with beef, bacon and onions with cheddar and mozzarella cheeses and pickles. (380 cal./slice)
BBQ Chicken
– Grilled chicken, onions, BBQ sauce, cheddar and mozzarella cheeses. (380 cal./slice)
BLT
– Bacon, mayonnaise, shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes and mozzarella cheese. (410 cal./slice)

– Pepperoni to the max with mozzarella cheese. (400 cal./slice)
Pizza Inn Special
– Pepperoni, beef and pork toppings, onions, mushrooms, green peppers and black olives. (360 cal./slice)
Spicy Asian Chicken

Spinach Alfredo
– Alfredo sauce, fresh spinach and mozzarella cheese. (360 cal./slice)
Supreme Max

OUR MENU
Osso & Kristalla
is open for lunch, dinner and weekend brunch and focuses on using fresh and local ingredients. The kitchen is overseen by Executive Chef Danny Trace.
Happy Hour
is available weekdays from 3pm-7pm (Monday all day!) and features drink and food specials!
Lunch and dinner offers salads, wood fired pizza and pasta, including the signature Kristalla Salad and fresh fish.
Osso & Kristalla boasts a full bar and extensive wine selection. Cocktails are served alongside shared plates and Italian-Cajun house specialities. We invite you to join us for a delightful weekend brunch! Enjoy a selection of exquisite dishes from 10 AM to 3 PM on both Saturday and Sunday. We look forward to serving you!

BEYOND THE DOUGH
The idea for Piada Italian Street Food came from wanting to share the culture, amazing flavors and 
          happiness found while walking around the streets of Rimini, Italy with you. It’s about creating moments
          of joy through food and experience for our Guests everyday.

Frequently Asked Questions
Do you have vegan/vegetarian options?
Expand or collapse answer
We do have a delicious Vegan and Vegetarian menu to choose from. Please use the following link to find it:
https://www.carrabbas.com/nutrition
Do you have a Gluten Free menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes. Please visit our website at
www.carrabbas.com
and enter your city and state, or zip code in the search box provided. View a menu by clicking on "more info" and then "download a menu" and our Gluten Free offerings will be marked with GF.
Where can I add a missing visit for Dine Rewards?
Expand or collapse answer
Please visit
https://www.dine-rewards.com/
and click "Add a Visit." Enter the phone number associated with your Dine Rewards account and complete the form to have your credit manually applied. If you no longer have the receipt, please contact the restaurant directly and they will be happy to help you locate it.
Do you have outdoor seating?
Expand or collapse answer
Many of our restaurants have patio seating. Please contact your local Carrabba's to see if outdoor dining is available.
Do you have a Kids menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes, we do have a menu for kids 10 and under.
Click here to view the Kids menu
Give The Gift Of Carrabba's
BUY NOW
About Carrabba's Italian Grill
Houston, TX
Offering authentic Italian cuisine passed down from our founders' family recipes, Carrabba's Italian Grill® uses only the best ingredients to prepare fresh and handmade dishes cooked to order in a lively exhibition kitchen. Featuring a wood-burning grill inspired by the many tastes of Italy, guests can enjoy signature dishes, including Chicken Bryan, Pollo Rosa Maria, Wood-Fire Grilled Steak and chops and classic Italian Pasta dishes in a welcoming, contemporary atmosphere.
Managing Partner: Steven Duerringer
Location: On the Service Road on I10 between Ethan Allen and Twin Peaks, Exit Kirkwood and follow East bound feeder roard

lemon pepper, garlic parmesan, or spicy hot buffalo.

PIZZA TOSCANA

160-290 cal

Truffle Burrata & Prosciutto
295-424 cal

690 cal

890 cal

710 cal

Chicken Manicotti
840 cal

1170 cal

960 cal

Baked Ziti

CALZONES

1280 cal

SANDWICHES

1100 cal

Chicken Parmesan
1090 cal

1300 cal

675-1375 cal

KIDS

DESSERTS

pizza franchise opportunity
It's the perfect time to franchise Russo's New York Pizzeria and Italian Kitchen and we know the pizza business and what it take to fire up your first restaurant. With 50+ locations and growing, our franchisees have created success built on our flexible design starting 1,500 sq ft. We produce a higher average store volume (AUV $1.134M) than industry average by serving authentic New York-style pizza and unique menu items. Ask about available territories!

About the Business
MONA Fresh Italian Food is a unique concept combining the swiftness of a fast-casual restaurant with the sophistication of upscale surroundings and high-quality food. MONA uses fresh, local products in a warm and cozy environment offered in their natural forms sourced from locally owned farms. 

The five-step menu starts with the base (house made fettuccini, bruschetta, chopped salad), topped with fresh veggies, cheeses and garnishes. Guests can choose to upgrade with multiple protein options and customize their entrées with homemade sauces, dressings and seasonings.   Organic herb gardens of basil and microgreens can be found at the end of the line for customers to cut fresh for added flavor to their newly created dishes.

MONA is a chef-driven, fast-casual restaurant serving the best of Italian cuisine for the value-motivated diner. We set out to be a place guests will want to visit often for our delicious and approachable menu. The atmosphere is inviting and comfortable allowing patrons to feel they are dining in the comforts of their own homes, with the opportunity to interact with our chefs and experience the variety of authentic Italian-inspired recipes.
…

About the Business
With James Beard-nominated chef and restauranteur Levi Goode at the helm, our fourth Kitchen & Cantina from Goode Company Restaurants showcases the rich foods and traditions we grew up with on both sides of the border. Find us located across from the historic River Oaks Theatre where you'll find an experience inspired by long days on the Gulf, late nights on the ranch, and the colorful creations of our abuela. Try wood-fired redfish on the half shell swaddled in homemade tortillas, made-to-order guacamole, and family-style parrilladas - huge mixed platters of wild game and fresh vegetables, topped with pico de gallo and queso fresco. A few margaritas on our patio and you've found your new casa sweet casa. Top off the experience by wandering over to our agave sanctuary Bar Buena nestled around the corner (coming soon).
…

Fun, Facts, Rumors and Legends
KINGS INN SALAD POLLO A LAS BRASA
Executive Chef Neal Cox has fond childhood memories of family dinners In Lima, the capital of Peru, cooks have perfected marinated, crispy-skinned
at the King’s Inn. The history of The King’s Inn is as special as the dish it’s chicken cooked over charcoal that is almost as Peruvian as the country’s
named for. Established in 1945 and located in Riviera, Texas, it is owned and flag itself. This piquant dish is credited to an hotelier in Peru named Roger
operated by Randy Ware. Randy began his career at the age of 12, and now Schuler who emigrated from Switzerland and opened a restaurant on his
at 68, has over 56 years of tenure at this beloved South Texas eatery. Chef farm called La Granja Azul, which is still operating at the very same spot
Neal reminisces over his King’s Inn favorites – the Avocado and the Bom- in Santa Clara to this day. Served with plantain maduros, pepper jack lime
bay salads, and has combined the two to introduce the Kings Inn Salad to sauce and a modest side dish discovered by one of our team members while
TRIBUTE diners. We sincerely hope you enjoy Chef Neal’s interpretation angling for tarpon in the jungles of Costa Rica - Gallo Pinto or “Spotted
of memorable dinners as you look to create your own dining memories. Rooster.” Our Pollo a la Brasa blends cultures, flavors, and discoveries, and
is our way of paying tribute to our friends from south of our borders.
LAMB BIRRIA
WOOD GRILLED REDFISH
Birria pronounced (bee-rryah) originates from the town of Cocula in the
state of Jalisco, Mexico. A traditional preparation that could be served as a On a research and development trip to Mexico City to experience the
stew or tacos, it was always marinated in herbs and strong spices and cooked flavors of our neighbors to the South, the TRIBUTE team encountered
in an earthen kiln. A dish that was created during the era of the Conquista, Contramar, a restaurant with incredible service and fresh seafood that
it was typically made with goat meat as they were viewed as pests that tantalized tastebuds. It was love at first bite of the snapper with cascabel
destroyed crops. Nowadays it is also traditional for it to be made with lamb, salsa, which inspired a tribute to their first stop in CDMX with a redfish
and we have recreated that experience. The state of Jalisco located in the dish topped with cascabel salsa. A guest favorite, this dish recognizes the
southwestern part of the country is famous for another product which is healthy culture of Mexico, and the loyalty of longtime staff, which mirrors
tequila. Some of our team have traveled through Jalisco visiting tequila the sense of community diners feel when stepping into TRIBUTE.
haciendas and always recommend a fine tequila while enjoying Birria. Let
your server recommend one while we take you on a journey through the
SMOKED CRAB CLAWS
history of Cocula, Mexico.
In 1998, Hotel General Manager Steve Fronterhouse and Executive
Chef Neal Cox both worked at Américas, which features upscale South
ENSALADA TIJUANA
American cuisine. The Smoked Crab Fingers are Chef Neal’s tribute to
The Tijuana Salad on the TRIBUTE menu has interesting origins that many Chef Michael Cordúa, who is seen by many as a mentor and leader in
aren’t aware of. Caesar and Alex Cardini Sr. are attributed with creating this the Culinary community. After explaining the concept of TRIBUTE to
popular salad. Caesar operated restaurants in both Mexico and the United Chef Cordúa, he gave his blessing for Chef Neal to feature this dish on
States during Prohibition. Legend has it that Caesar created the salad one the menu, and it has quickly become a frequent diner favorite. Served
evening in Tijuana, when running short on kitchen supplies. Our creatively with a grilled baguette, this dish invites you to indulge and offers
titled version of the Caesar salad is a nod to the unique origins of the dish the perfect vessel to soak up the hearty sauce.
and the Cardini family. Interestingly, several members of the Cardini family
live right here in Houston.
BACON WRAPPED BANDERA QUAIL
Start your meal at TRIBUTE with these delectable bites that have an authentic quail hunting guide’s seal of approval. This story begins on a 7800-acre
ranch in La Pryor, Texas. Hotel General Manager Steve Fronterhouse and Executive Chef Neal Cox were invited to the El Mirador ranch towards the end
of quail hunting season, and heard the guide remark that he had eaten so much quail during the season he refused to eat another bite. Thinking about
what they’d brought to cook for the community dinner, Steve asked the guide to give them a chance and eat a bite of quail prepared by Chef Neal.
The guide agreed, and the next night, after eating the Bacon Wrapped Bandera Quail, gave the dish
its highest marks, and later pulled Chef Neal aside to ask for the recipe.
Regional Contributors
Diamond H Ranch – Bandera, Texas Louisiana Seafood – Houston, Texas Jazzmen Rice – Jefferson, Louisiana
Goode Co. – Houston, Texas Butler Wood Co. – Seguin, Texas 1836 Olive Oil – Asherton, Texas
Houston Dairymaids – Houston, Texas Gilbert’s Tortillas – Houston, Texas Bee2Bee Honey – Houston, Texas
Camellia Red Beans – Hanrahan, Louisiana D’artagnan Foods – Houston, Texas J & R Wood Fire Grills – Mesquite, Texas
FINE CUISINE CELEBRATING THE PAST
FROM TEXAS PRESENT AND FUTURE
LOUISIANA AND MEXICO OF HOUSTON
Houston was founded by land speculators on August 30th, 1836 at the confluence of
White Oak Bayou and Buffalo Bayou. After briefly serving as the capital of the Republic in the late 1830s,
Houston grew into a regional trading center for the remainder of the 19th century.
For almost four decades now The Houstonian has been humbled to share the name of our beloved city
as we sit along the banks of Buffalo Bayou where it all began.
Over the years, Houston has welcomed those who have traveled across
our southern and eastern borders, bringing diverse cultures and traditions
that have helped shape and evolve our city into what it is today.
Houston, a multicultural town where differences are embraced and celebrated,
is a true melting pot of colorful and creative people.
Whether we’re boiling crawfish, roasting pork, or grilling steaks over an open fire,
Houston absolutely has it all.
Join us as we share our passion for regional cuisine
from our neighbors to the north, south, and east.
SO LET’S EAT, CELEBRATE, AND ENJOY LIFE TOGETHER.
Neal Cox, Executive Chef Juan Tuch, Sous Chef Jeff Boudreaux, Chef de Cuisine
– NORTH – – SOUTH – – EAST –
TRIBUTE attire is business casual or casual elegance. Jackets are not required. Athletic wear and flip-flops are not permitted.
Casual dining options are available via In-Room Dining, Center Court Cafe, and Arbor Grill (open seasonally).

Mole Tasting Menu
Dinner
Lunch
Saturday Brunch
Sunday Brunch Buffet
Vegetarian & Vegan Menu
Dessert
Drinks
Happy Hour
Available for dinner Monday - Saturday
It's all about mole! There are 7 classic moles of Oaxaca but there are actually hundreds of moles commonly served there. The meat or vegetable that is served with the mole is considered just a carrier. We hope you enjoy this menu showcasing pipián verde, mole amarillo, mole pasilla, mole de higos (fig mole) and mole negro.
PRIMERO
Tetela
blue masa triangular envelope stuffed with hoja santa, beans, cheese, pumpkin seeds, pipián verde
paired with
Mezcal Casa Pineda Extravagante
SEGUNDO
Camarones en Mole Amarillo
grilled shrimp, corn cremoso, mole amarillo
paired with
Flor de Oaxaca - Flor de Caña dark rum, mezcal reposado, banana liqueur, banana syrup, lime
TERCERO
Taco de Cabrito
baby goat meat, refried beans, mole pasilla
paired with
3oz '19 Casa Madero Gran Reserva Shiraz, Valle de Parras, México
CUARTO
Pechuga de Pato
Rohan duck breast, fig mole
paired with
3oz '21 ZD Pinot Noir, Carneros, California
QUINTO
Mole Chocolate Cake
chocolate cake, mole negro ganache, mole soil, chocolate gel, pepitas, ants, mandarin sorbet
$85 per person / $45 optional beverage pairing
plus tax and gratuity

Breakfast
MADE-FROM-SCRATCH BREAKFAST
Available Saturday& Sunday from 11AM - 1:30 PM
All our dishes are made FRESH to order. Please allow proper time for preparation
Substitutions may cost extra
-MEXICAN BREAKFAST PLATTERS
All platters served with skillet potatoes, beans  and 2 handmade corn or flour tortillas
HUEVOS A LA MEXICANA Scrambled Eggs with Diced Onion, Tomatoes and Fresh Jalapeños................. 11.95
HUEVOS RANCHEROS Sunny-side-up Eggs with Ranchera Sauce.......................................................... 11.95
MIGAS CON HUEVOS Crispy Tortilla Strips & Scrambled Eggs.......................................................................... 11.95
Topped with Monterey Jack Cheese..     ADD $1.00
HUEVOS RIO GRANDE VALLEY Two Sunny-side-up Eggs with Chorizo and Ranchera Sauce....................... 12.50
CHORIZO CON HUEVOS Mexican Sausage Scrambled with Eggs.......................................................... 11.95
CARNE ASADA CON HUEVOS 4 oz  Carne Asada served with Ranchera Sauce & Two Eggs, Any Style............. 1 5.95
PAPAS CON HUEVOS Skillet-fried Potatoes with Scrambled Eggs............................................................ 11.95
BREAKFAST TACO PLATTER Choice of Two Breakfast Tacos served with Skillet Potatoes & Beans: EGG & BACON • EGG & POTATO • EGG & CHORIZO • A LA MEXICANA..................... 11.95
Add Cheese to Any Taco             1.00
ALL-AMERICAN PLATTERS
BUILD YOUR OWN OMELET
Served with Skillet-fried Potatoes and Beans
Three-Egg Omelet stuffed with your choice of 3 ingredients:

Cheddar Cheese, Monterrey Jack Cheese, Onion, Avocado, Tomato, Jalapeño, Chorizo, Bacon or Ham
....................................... $12.50
KIDS MENU
Eggs & Bacon ................................5.95 





EGGS & BACON ............................5.95

At El Tiempo Cantina, everything is made from scratch. We cook all of our food using generations-old family recipes such as our tortillas, salad dressings, salsas and desserts. Our attention to quality and exceptional friendliness is our driving force.
Enjoy the El Tiempo experience at multiple locations in Houston and the surrounding areas including our original location on Richmond as well as our Washington, Annex, Northwest (290), Navigation, Vintage Park, Gessner, Stafford, Katy and Galleria locations.

Slide 4 of 4
Tabasco Tasting Menu
Available for dinner Monday - Saturday from Oct 2 - Nov 1
Caracol’s menus are culinary tours along Mexico’s coasts, shaped by 16 coastal states. To spotlight the diversity of regional flavors, we feauture a monthly tasting menu series, each one dedicated to a different coastal state. This October, we invite you to experience Tabasco!
History & Background
Tabasco, in southeastern Mexico along the Gulf, is a land of rainforests, rivers, and ancient heritage. As the cradle of the Olmec civilization, its history shines through archaeological sites and vibrant traditions. Villahermosa, the capital, bridges modern life with natural beauty, surrounded by wetlands rich in wildlife.
The cuisine reflects its fertile land and waterways: robalo a la tabasqueña, grilled pejelagarto, river shrimp, tamales with chipilín, and the grand zacahuil. Plantains, cacao, corn, and tropical fruits infuse Tabasco’s dishes with flavor and warmth. This menu honors the state’s proud culinary heritage, alive with tradition and festivity.
Entremes
TOSTONES CON CAMARÓNES
shrimp, tomato, cucumber, avocado, onion, jalapeño, cilantro, lime, tostones
Paraiso - tequila blanco, mango, papaya, peach liqueur, lime
Entrada

About the Business
Chapultepec Lupita Mexican Restaurant has been serving the Montrose community since 1977. Family owned and operated, we take pride in using fresh ingredients.  Like in our grandma's kitchen.  Cooking with heart.  Customers refer to us as a Montrose institution in referring to our time in the area. We like to welcome everyone and provide a good experience in Tex Mex and Mexican food.

info@elfogonmexicankitchen.com
4514 Hwy 6, Sugar Land, TX 77478
Home
About Us
Menu
Contact Us
Home
About Us
Menu
Contact Us
VIEW OUR MENU
Mexican Cuisine is Our passion
At El Fogón Restaurant, we are more than just a place to eat – we are a family dedicated to sharing the rich culinary heritage of Guadalajara, Jalisco, with our Sugar Land, Texas community. As a family-owned and operated establishment, our mission is to bring people together over meals that celebrate tradition, flavor, and culture.
Know More About Us
Our Menu
Tex-Mex cuisine, creatively inspired by generations of cherished recipes and the  rich cultural heritage of Guadalajara, Jalisco
Our location in Sugar Land, TX
El Fogón Restaurant in Sugar Land, Texas, is more than a place to enjoy authentic Mexican cuisine—it’s a gathering spot for the community. Rooted in tradition and inspired by the vibrant culture of Guadalajara, we take pride in bringing people together with delicious food and warm hospitality. For families, friends, and neighbors, El Fogón is a space to connect, celebrate, and create memories that reflect the heart of Sugar Land.

TIO TROMPO
HOME
TROMPOS
MENU
ORDER NOW
LOCATION
Previous
Next
ORDER
NOW!
OUR TROMPOS
The stars of the show
“Trompo Tacos” or “Middle East Tacos”
are marinated pork shawarma tacos grilled in a revolving spit and were created by middle eastern immigrants that settled in
Puebla, Mexico
after World War I. The original recipe evolved through time, bringing together the middle eastern seasoning and cooking techniques with the Mexican tortilla and salsas, creating one of
the most iconic Mexican dishes.
AUTHENTIC MEXICAN TACOS!

Huevos
Huevos en Rabo De Mestiza (Drowned Eggs)
eggs cooked in a roasted tomato sauce with roasted poblano peppers and onions, topped with melted chihuahua cheese

fried eggs served over grilled crisp corn tortilla, refried black beans, ham, chipotle tomato salsa, cotija cheese, green peas, served with fried plantains

served with toasted bolillo bread-- Al Ajillo is a condiment in mexican cuisine which involved infusing olive oil with dried chilis and sliced garlic for a minimum of 72 hours, its name derives from the work "aji" which spaniards use to name chilis, this infused oil is used to sautée meats, seafood + vegetables

Pibil
Pibil, a traditional Mexican slow-roasted way of cooking from the Yucatan peninsula, involves marinating meat in achiote-citrus, then slow roasting it wrapped in banana leaves. We serve Pibil with pickled red onions, Mexican rice, refried black beans and spicy xni-pec

Adults $48 | Seniors (65+) $38 | Children (8-12) $20 | Children under 8 $10
BUFFET ITEMS
Migas
eggs scrambled with crispy tortilla strips and your choice of adding house made chorizo or sautéed onions, tomatoes and serrano peppers
Huevos con Nopales
eggs scrambled with sautéed diced cactus in a guajillo pepper sauce
Chilaquiles
crispy homemade totopo chips topped with your sauce, cheese, crema mexicana + onions
Tamales Oaxaquenos de Puerco
banana leaf wrapped tamales filled with pork
Tamales Oaxaquenos de Pollo
banana leaf wrapped tamales filled with chicken
Enchiladas Tex-Mex
fresh corn tortillas filled with chihuahua cheese topped with texas gravy, melted cheddar cheese + chopped onions
Enchiladas Suizas
fresh corn tortillas filled with chihuahua cheese topped with a creamy tomatillo sauce, melted cheese + sliced onion
Pescado Tikin-Xic
today's catch charbroiled over banana leaves and basted with achiote sauce
Pescado a la Veracruzana
today's catch covered in tomatoes, green olives, capers and chiles gueros
Chicharron en Salsa Verde
pork belly confit sautéed in green tomatillo, fresh herb + serrano sauce
Paella a la Valenciana
Carne Guisada
Rajas con Crema y Queso
Fried Plantains
Stewed Black Beans
Arroz Blanco
Traditional Mexican Moles
featured on the Brunch Buffet
Mole Negro
Mole Poblano
Mole Coloradito
You Build It, We Make It
Omelet + Waffle Stations
Omelet Station
featuring, but not limited to:
onion, tomato, peppers, serrano pepper, mushroom, spinach, bacon, ham, house made chorizo, cheddar + chihuahua cheeses
Waffle Station
featuring, but not limited to:
fresh strawberries, whipped cream + warm maple syrup
Cold Bar Items
Ceviche Campechano
onions, tomatoes, cilantro, serrano pepper, avocado + fresh campechana sauce with lime-marinated fresh snapper + gulf shrimp
Ceviche Pescador
onions, tomatoes, serrano peppers, cilantro + avocado with lime-marinated fresh snapper + gulf shrimp
E-Z Peel Gulf Shrimp
Royal Charcuterie Board
Ensalada de Nopales
House Made Guacamole
Chiles Toreado
Pico de Gallo
Sopas Station:
Menudo
"breakfast of champions" 
dried chile broth with beef tripe and beef feet, served with radish, onion, serrano pepper + oregano
Pozole Verde
traditional stew of braised chicken and hominy in a tomatillo fresh herb, pepita + serrano broth, served alongside shredded lettuce, radish, onion, serrano pepper + lime
Pozole Rojo
traditional stew of braised pork and hominy in a dried guajillo pepper broth, served alongside shredded lettuce, radish, onion, serrano pepper + lime
Rotating Chef's Carving Station
carnivores rejoice! enjoy different items every week featuring items such as prime rib, porkchetta, lamb lollipops, wild boar ribs, beef tenderloin + more
Specialty Brunch Menu
Introducing our Specialty Brunch Buffet, available every Saturday and Sunday from 9 AM to 3 PM! Enjoy a unique array of delicious dishes apart from our sunday brunch buffet
Chorizo Hash Benedicts
two poached eggs over house chorizo hash, traditional hollandaise + cilantro
Huevos Reales (Royal Eggs)
two poached eggs over crispy hashbrowns, house smoked salmon, 
chipotle hollandaise.
Mex Benny's
two poached eggs over corn salbutes, refried black beans, cochinita pibil, avocado, roasted poblano hollandaise, xni pec
Tortitas De Chicharron
mini bolillo buns, seasoned pinto beans, chicharron en salsa verde, 
cilantro, avocado + poached egg
Papadzules Yucatecos
corn tortillas filled with hard boiled eggs, pumpkin seed sauce, tomato sauce, chopped hard boiled eggs + toasted pepitas.
Omelette Divorciado
sautéed spinach, roasted mushrooms, roasted poblanos, goat cheese, topped half with tomato chipotle sauce and roasted tomatillo sauce + avocado served with frijoles de la olla.
Concha French Toast
conchas french toast, served with fresh berries + house piloncillo syrup and whipped cream

address: 5161 San Felipe St, Ste 100, Houston, TX 77056
raw_text:
