Serving Food of the Border since 1970
Scroll
Prefer a PDF menu? Click
here
.
HOUSE GUACAMOLE
Our signature, house made Guacamole. Made with fresh avocados, diced onions, and fresh squeezed lime juice.
CHILE CON QUESO
A classic, Tex-Mex staple. House made Chile con Queso, made daily in house.
Katie’s t-Sip DIP
Our house made Chile con Queso, topped with House Guacamole and ground taco beef.
TAQUITOS DORADOS
Shredded chicken, rolled in a corn tortilla and fried to golden brown. Tolled with tomatillo sauce, House Guacamole, Mexican crema, Queso fresco, pickled onions, & cilantro. Served with a side of black beans.
nachos los tios
Our Signature Nachos! Crispy tortilla chips topped with refried beans, taco meat, chile con queso, guacamole, and jalapenos.
Anniversary nachos
Crispy tortilla chips, refried beans, fajita beef & chicken, and melted Mexican cheeses. Served with pico de gallo, House Guacamole, and pickled jalapenos.
Alice Nachos
Simple Nachos. Crispy tortilla chips with melted cheddar cheese and topped with pickled jalapenos.
ceviche
Red Fish and shrimp marinated in lime juice, served on top coarsely mashed avocados. Topped with pickled red jalapenos.
Back to the top
ENSALADAS Y SOPAS
los tios salad
Spring mix and chopped romaine, roasted cherry tomatoes, shredded carrots, diced avocado, cotija cheese, toasted pepitas, pickled red onions, tossed in a creamy poblano dressing.
(Add chicken, beef or shrimp for additional charge)
classic taco salad
A Tex-Mex Staple. Crispy taco shell, chopped iceberg lettuce, taco meat, diced avocado, diced tomatoes, pickled jalapenos, & sour cream, topped with our house made Chile con Queso.
supermex bowl
Brown rice, shredded kale, black beans, diced avocado, roasted pepitas, pickled red onions, pico de gallo, roasted corn, with a house made cilantro lime dressing.
Tortilla soup
Our house made, tortilla soup, with chopped fajita chicken and topped with crispy tortilla strips, shredded jack cheese, and sliced avocados.
black bean soup
A creamy blend of black beans and spices, topped with Mexican crema, crispy tortilla strips, and queso fresco.
Back to the top
PUFFIES, QUESADILLAS & CHALUPAS
the original puffy queso
The Famous Los Tios puffy queso! A crispy shell, smothered with our Chile con Queso.
Stuffed puffy queso
The Los Tios Puffy Queso, stuffed with Fajita Chicken or Fajita Beef, refried beans, shredded lettuce, guacamole and topped with crispy tortilla strips & Chile con Queso.
Build your own puffy queso
The Los Tios Puffy Queso, topped with your choice of any two toppings.
Toppings include: Fajita Chicken, Fajita Beef, Shredded Pork, Guacamole, Ranchero Sauce, Sour Cream, Grilled Onions, Queso Fresco
house quesadillas
Made to order flour tortillas, filled with melted jack cheese. Can be made with Fajita Chicken, Fajita Beef, Grilled Shrimp, Spinach & Mushrooms, or Shredded Pork. Served with Sour Cream, Diced Tomatoes, and Guacamole.
Tostada poblano
Crispy tostada topped with refried beans, fajita chicken, shredded lettuce, diced tomato, creamy poblano dressing, diced avocado, and queso fresco.
tostada con ceviche
Crispy tostada topped with fresh made ceviche, shredded lettuce, sliced avocados, and cilantro lime sauce.
chalupa los tios
A classic chalupa topped with refried beans, chili gravy, melted cheese, taco meat, shredded lettuce, diced tomato, and guacamole.
Back to the top
TACOS
all taco plates are served with Mexican rice & your choice of beans
golden tacos
Crispy Taco shells, made fresh daily, topped with taco meat, shredded lettuce, shredded cheese, and diced tomatoes.
deluxe tacos
Crispy Taco shells, made fresh daily, topped with taco meat, shredded lettuce, pico de gallo, queso fresco, and House Guacamole.
FRESH FISH tacos
Made-to-order corn tortillas, grilled Texas red fish, shredded red cabbage and cilantro, sliced avocado, raspberry chipotle sauce, and queso fresco.
street tacos
Five double stacked mini corn tortillas with beef or chicken, topped with diced onions and chopped cilantro. Served with lime and tomatillo sauce.
Back to the top
FAJITAS
Fajitas are served with homemade flour or corn tortillas, guacamole, sour cream, shredded cheese,
pico de gallo, pickled jalapenos, Mexican rice, & your choice of beans.
ANGUS BEEF FAJITAs
Certified Black Angus beef fajitas grilled to perfection. Served in 1/2 lbs or 1 lbs sizes.
CHICKEN FAJITAS
Marinated and grilled choice chicken breast fajitas. Served in 1/2 lbs or 1 lbs sizes.
COMBO FAJITAS
Certified Black Angus and Grilled Chicken fajitas. Served in 1/2 lbs or 1 lbs sizes.
PRIME BEEF FILET
Prime Filet Fajitas grilled to perfection. Served in 1/2 lbs or 1 lbs sizes.
*San Felipe & West U location only*
SHRIMP FAJITAS
Jumbo seared shrimp fajitas. Served in small or large sizes.
roasted veggie FAJITAs
A mix of carrots, mushrooms, zucchini, and yellow squash. Served in 1/2 lbs or 1 lbs sizes.
PRESIDENTE FAJITAs
A pound of combo fajitas, two jalapeno sausage links, two grilled Texas quail, six diablo shrimp, and 1/2 pound of shredded pork tender.
Extra fixins’
Add any addition items or toppings to your fajitas.
Diablo Shrimp
Grilled Shrimp
Grilled Texas Quail
Shredded Pork Tender
Jalapeno Sausage
or top your fajitas Los Tios Style
Monterrey
Sautéed mushrooms & melted Monterrey cheese
Rancheras
House-made Ranchera Sauce & melted Monterrey cheese
Back to the top
FROM THE GRILL
all items served with made-to-order tortillas, Mexican rice and your choice of beans
GRILLED RED FISH VERACRUZ
Grilled Texas red fish, sourced daily, on a bed of onions & bell peppers, and roasted veggies, topped with veracruz sauce.
RED FISH ON THE HALF SHELL
Grilled Texas redfish, served on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers.
*San Felipe & West U location only*
DIABLO SHRIMP
Five jumbo shrimp, filled with cheese and jalapeno, wrapped in bacon, and topped with melted monterrey cheese on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers.
GRILLED CHICKEN DINNER
A grilled chicken breast on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers. Served with guacamole & pico de gallo.
pechuga monterrey
A grilled chicken breast topped with mushrooms, serrano peppers, and melted Monterrey cheese on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers.
carne asada
Grilled Black Angus skirt steak on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers served with pico de gallo and guacamole.
shredded pork tender
Shredded pork tender on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers, topped with pickled red onions. Served with tomatillo sauce, queso fresco, chopped cilantro, guacamole, and pico de gallo.
grilled quail
Three grilled Texas Quail on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers. Served with guacamole and pico de gallo.
chile relleno 1970
An egg-battered poblano pepper, stuffed with picadillo, and topped with ranchero sauce and melted cheese.
Back to the top
PLATOS ESPECIALES
all special plates served with Mexican rice & choice of beans
ACAPULCo
Crispy beef taco, guacamole salad, puffy queso, cheese enchilada, and pork tamale topped with chili gravy.
TEX-MEX
A Los Tios Favorite! Taco al carbon topped with chile con queso, crispy beef taco, and a cheese enchilada.
laredo
Crispy beef taco, cheese enchilada, and a pork tamale topped with chili gravy.
meatless special
Puffy queso, guacamole salad, and two cheese enchiladas topped with Spanish sauce.
tampico
Crispy beef taco, guacamole salad, cheese enchilada, and pork tamale topped with chili gracy.
tacos al carbon
Two fajita tacos on house-made flour tortillas. Served with guacamole, pico de gallo, and chile con queso.
Back to the top
COMBINATION PLATES
no. 1
Guacamole salad, puffy queso, & classic chalupa.
no. 2
Guacamole salad, crispy beef taco, & cheese enchilada.
no. 3
Guacamole salad, puffy queso, & cheese enchilada.
no. 4
Guacamole salad, puffy queso, & crispy beef taco.
No. 5
Two crispy beef tacos, & a puffy queso.
NO. 6
Crispy beef taco, puffy queso, & cheese enchilada.
No. 7
Classic chalupa, crispy beef taco, & a puffy queso.
No. 8
Two puffy quesos, & a cheese enchilada.
Back to the top
ENCHILADAS
all plates come with two enchiladas, Mexican rice, & choice of beans
cheese enchiladas
A Tex-Mex Classic. Melted cheese enchiladas topped with chili gravy.
Beef enchiladas
Corn tortillas rolled with taco meat, topped with chili gravy and melted cheese.
chicken enchiladas
Corn tortillas rolled with chicken taco meat & topped with your choice of sauce (Spanish, Cream, Chili Gravy, or Verde) and melted cheese.
spinach enchiladas
Corn tortillas filled with spinach and cheese, topped with cream sauce and melted cheese. Served with guacamole and pico de gallo.
enchiladas verdes
Corn tortillas rolled with shredded chicken and cheese, topped with green tomatillo sauce and melted cheese. Served with sour cream, guacamole, and pico de gallo.
Shrimp enchiladas
Corn tortillas rolled with seared shrimp, topped with cream sauce and melted cheese. Served with guacamole and pico de gallo.
enchiladas al carbon
Corn tortillas rolled with either Fajita Beef or Fajita Chicken, topped with your choice of sauce (Chili gravy, Spanish, Cream, or Verde)and melted cheese. Served with guacamole and pico de gallo.
Back to the top
Kid’s Meals
12 & under only. Drink and side choice included.
KID BURGER
A kid’s burger, a side of lettuce, tomato, and served with fries.
KID CHEEsE ENCHILADA
A single cheese enchilada with chili gravy, served with rice & refried beans.
KID CRISPY TACO
A single crispy beef taco with lettuce and diced tomato, served with rice & refried beans.
KID GRILLED CHEESE
A grilled cheese, served with fries.
KID PUFFY QUESO
A single puffy queso, served with rice & refried beans.
Kid QUESADILLAS
Cheese quesadillas served with rice & refried beans.
KID TACO AL CARBON
A single taco al carbon (fajita beef or fajita chicken) served with rice & refried beans.
Chicken Tenders
Two crispy chicken tenders and white toast served with fries.
Back to the top
DESSERTS
sopapillas
Four lightly fried pastries, dusted with cinnamon and powdered sugar. Served with caramel and honey.
tres leches
A slice of house-made Tres Leches cake with strawberry drizzle.
Mexican flan
House-made Mexican Flan, a custard baked with a caramel sauce glaze. Topped with whipped cream.
Back to the top
Primero
Ensaladas Y Sopas
Puffies, Quesadillas & Chalupas
Tacos
Fajitas
From the Grill

Specials

Menu
At El Tiempo Cantina, everything is made from scratch. We cook all of our food using generations-old family recipes such as our tortillas, salad dressings, salsas and desserts. Our attention to quality and exceptional friendliness is our driving force.
Enjoy the El Tiempo experience at multiple locations in Houston and the surrounding areas including our original location on Richmond as well as our Washington, Annex, Northwest (290), Navigation, Vintage Park, Gessner, Stafford, Katy and Galleria locations.

Gorditas Aguascalientes
Gorditas Aguascalientes Menu
Home
Menu
Located in Houston, TX, Gorditas Aguascalientes is a Tex-Mex gem offering a variety of breakfast and brunch options. This casual restaurant provides delivery, takeout, and even accepts reservations, making it a convenient spot for any occasion. With a range of vegetarian options available, everyone can find something delicious to enjoy. The menu features classic dishes like Huevos a la Mexicana and Chilaquiles for breakfast, as well as tasty appetizers like Chile con Queso and Nachos Regulares. The cozy atmosphere, friendly waiter service, and beer and wine selection make it a great place to gather with friends or family. Don't miss out on the authentic flavors and welcoming vibes of Gorditas Aguascalientes.

Experience the best Tex-Mex breakfast & brunch at Gorditas Aguascalientes in Houston, TX. Offering delivery, takeout, and catering with many vegetarian options. Call (713) 697-7888 to make a reservation or visit 3810 Irvington Blvd for a delicious meal. Don't miss out on their authentic Mexican dishes like Huevos a la Mexicana and Chilaquiles!

Menu
At El Tiempo Cantina, everything is made from scratch. We cook all of our food using generations-old family recipes such as our tortillas, salad dressings, salsas and desserts. Our attention to quality and exceptional friendliness is our driving force.
Enjoy the El Tiempo experience at multiple locations in Houston and the surrounding areas including our original location on Richmond as well as our Washington, Annex, Northwest (290), Navigation, Vintage Park, Gessner, Stafford, Katy and Galleria locations.

We keep things fresh! Our buffet lineup changes weekly to showcase fresh flavors and seasonal favorites.
Omelet Station
Build-your-own omelets with a variety of fresh meats, veggies, and cheeses—made just the way you like.
Taco Station
Handmade tacos with bold fillings and all the toppings—from spicy meats to fresh salsas, guac, and crispy chips.
Enchilada Station
Rolled, sauced, and ready to savor—featuring classic enchiladas with rich fillings and traditional salsas.
Classic Breakfast Station
A hearty mix of breakfast favorites and Mexican comfort food—think eggs Benedict, chorizo, taquitos, and more.
Waffle & Pancake Station
Sweet treats hot off the griddle—waffles, pancakes, churros, and French toast with all the fixings.
Dessert Station
Finish strong with a spread of Mexican sweets, cookies, and pastries.

About the Business
Little Rey's Northern Mexican inspired menu boasts wood-roasted "chicken al carbon" at its core plus staples like al carbon tacos, traditional street style tacos, salads and fresh salsas, all on hand-made tortillas - and all to balance out those refreshing margaritas. Breakfast is served every weekend, think cult-favorite pancakes and migas breakfast tacos. With ample indoor seating, a spacious patio, and a walk-up to-go window, it's the perfect spot for any occasion - an easy weeknight spot with the kids, weekend brunch or afternoon margs with friends!
…

Daily Specials
Monday - Friday Happy Hour
Enjoy Happy Hour all week with daily specials on house margaritas, beer, wine, and select appetizers.
View Menu
Taco Tuesday Special
Join us every Tuesday for 50% off our most popular tacos!
VIEW MENU
Fajita Wednesday Special
Join us every Wednesday for our Fajita Wednesday Special! Enjoy mixed fajitas for two for just $39.95, after 4pm. Served with rice, beans, pico de gallo, guacamole, fresh tortillas, chips & salsa.
View Menu
About Us
Don Carlos Mexican Restaurant is one of the best family-owned Mexican Restaurants in Houston & Waco, serving delicious Tex-Mex cuisine since 1986. We love to welcome our new and regular customers to provide great customer service and a tasty experience. In 1986, two Greek brothers, Christos and Gerry Stathatos, had a passion to achieve the American dream one plate of food at a time. From immigrants to businessmen, the two brothers opened their first restaurant in the heart of Houston’s East End to serve the hardworking people of the city. Later expanding to their second location near Hobby Airport in 1994, and their third location in Waco, Texas in 2009, their drive to provide every customer a quality plate of food has not ceased.

WE CATER!
We have catering available for your special occasions and private parties, and to serve at your home or office. You can choose from our unique menu of empanadas: cocktail- or regular-sized; baked or fried. We also offer a delicious tray of homemade pastries baked daily. Please call us at 713-789-0350 or email us at catering@theoriginalmarinis.com with your order 48 hours before your event.
Here's what people are saying about us:
View all Reviews
The Houston Chronicle Dining Guide
"The lure of these small packets spans age groups and cultures in a way that's almost primal."
The Houston Press
: Best Empanada award 2008
"Inside, don't be surprised to see Marcello or his daughter greeting customers new and old like family, welcoming them with warm smiles and lots of friendly conversation."
Cooks Tour
"I love the fact that the Marini family has never resorted to the icky-sticky commercial fillings that many bakeries use these days. You get a real sense of the fruit from their dessert empanadas, which is all too rare."

About the Business
El Charro Mexican Bar & Grill is proud to serve the bold flavors of Mexican cuisine to the people of Houston, TX. This family-owned restaurant specializes in making authentic Mexican recipes using only the finest, and freshest ingredients. Every taco, enchilada, or burrito served at El Charro Mexican restaurant is crafted by hand with care. El Charro is a place where people can come together. Gather your family and share stories over an authentic Mexican meal or enjoy an ice-cold beverage in the company of friends. El Charro Mexican Bar & Grill offers a variety of tasty margaritas as well as domestic and imported beers. Stop in today and experience service that keeps people coming back. We'd love to meet you!

raw_text:

Serving Food of the Border since 1970
Scroll
Prefer a PDF menu? Click
here
.
HOUSE GUACAMOLE
Our signature, house made Guacamole. Made with fresh avocados, diced onions, and fresh squeezed lime juice.
CHILE CON QUESO
A classic, Tex-Mex staple. House made Chile con Queso, made daily in house.
Katie’s t-Sip DIP
Our house made Chile con Queso, topped with House Guacamole and ground taco beef.
TAQUITOS DORADOS
Shredded chicken, rolled in a corn tortilla and fried to golden brown. Tolled with tomatillo sauce, House Guacamole, Mexican crema, Queso fresco, pickled onions, & cilantro. Served with a side of black beans.
nachos los tios
Our Signature Nachos! Crispy tortilla chips topped with refried beans, taco meat, chile con queso, guacamole, and jalapenos.
Anniversary nachos
Crispy tortilla chips, refried beans, fajita beef & chicken, and melted Mexican cheeses. Served with pico de gallo, House Guacamole, and pickled jalapenos.
Alice Nachos
Simple Nachos. Crispy tortilla chips with melted cheddar cheese and topped with pickled jalapenos.
ceviche
Red Fish and shrimp marinated in lime juice, served on top coarsely mashed avocados. Topped with pickled red jalapenos.
Back to the top
ENSALADAS Y SOPAS
los tios salad
Spring mix and chopped romaine, roasted cherry tomatoes, shredded carrots, diced avocado, cotija cheese, toasted pepitas, pickled red onions, tossed in a creamy poblano dressing.
(Add chicken, beef or shrimp for additional charge)
classic taco salad
A Tex-Mex Staple. Crispy taco shell, chopped iceberg lettuce, taco meat, diced avocado, diced tomatoes, pickled jalapenos, & sour cream, topped with our house made Chile con Queso.
supermex bowl
Brown rice, shredded kale, black beans, diced avocado, roasted pepitas, pickled red onions, pico de gallo, roasted corn, with a house made cilantro lime dressing.
Tortilla soup
Our house made, tortilla soup, with chopped fajita chicken and topped with crispy tortilla strips, shredded jack cheese, and sliced avocados.
black bean soup
A creamy blend of black beans and spices, topped with Mexican crema, crispy tortilla strips, and queso fresco.
Back to the top
PUFFIES, QUESADILLAS & CHALUPAS
the original puffy queso
The Famous Los Tios puffy queso! A crispy shell, smothered with our Chile con Queso.
Stuffed puffy queso
The Los Tios Puffy Queso, stuffed with Fajita Chicken or Fajita Beef, refried beans, shredded lettuce, guacamole and topped with crispy tortilla strips & Chile con Queso.
Build your own puffy queso
The Los Tios Puffy Queso, topped with your choice of any two toppings.
Toppings include: Fajita Chicken, Fajita Beef, Shredded Pork, Guacamole, Ranchero Sauce, Sour Cream, Grilled Onions, Queso Fresco
house quesadillas
Made to order flour tortillas, filled with melted jack cheese. Can be made with Fajita Chicken, Fajita Beef, Grilled Shrimp, Spinach & Mushrooms, or Shredded Pork. Served with Sour Cream, Diced Tomatoes, and Guacamole.
Tostada poblano
Crispy tostada topped with refried beans, fajita chicken, shredded lettuce, diced tomato, creamy poblano dressing, diced avocado, and queso fresco.
tostada con ceviche
Crispy tostada topped with fresh made ceviche, shredded lettuce, sliced avocados, and cilantro lime sauce.
chalupa los tios
A classic chalupa topped with refried beans, chili gravy, melted cheese, taco meat, shredded lettuce, diced tomato, and guacamole.
Back to the top
TACOS
all taco plates are served with Mexican rice & your choice of beans
golden tacos
Crispy Taco shells, made fresh daily, topped with taco meat, shredded lettuce, shredded cheese, and diced tomatoes.
deluxe tacos
Crispy Taco shells, made fresh daily, topped with taco meat, shredded lettuce, pico de gallo, queso fresco, and House Guacamole.
FRESH FISH tacos
Made-to-order corn tortillas, grilled Texas red fish, shredded red cabbage and cilantro, sliced avocado, raspberry chipotle sauce, and queso fresco.
street tacos
Five double stacked mini corn tortillas with beef or chicken, topped with diced onions and chopped cilantro. Served with lime and tomatillo sauce.
Back to the top
FAJITAS
Fajitas are served with homemade flour or corn tortillas, guacamole, sour cream, shredded cheese,
pico de gallo, pickled jalapenos, Mexican rice, & your choice of beans.
ANGUS BEEF FAJITAs
Certified Black Angus beef fajitas grilled to perfection. Served in 1/2 lbs or 1 lbs sizes.
CHICKEN FAJITAS
Marinated and grilled choice chicken breast fajitas. Served in 1/2 lbs or 1 lbs sizes.
COMBO FAJITAS
Certified Black Angus and Grilled Chicken fajitas. Served in 1/2 lbs or 1 lbs sizes.
PRIME BEEF FILET
Prime Filet Fajitas grilled to perfection. Served in 1/2 lbs or 1 lbs sizes.
*San Felipe & West U location only*
SHRIMP FAJITAS
Jumbo seared shrimp fajitas. Served in small or large sizes.
roasted veggie FAJITAs
A mix of carrots, mushrooms, zucchini, and yellow squash. Served in 1/2 lbs or 1 lbs sizes.
PRESIDENTE FAJITAs
A pound of combo fajitas, two jalapeno sausage links, two grilled Texas quail, six diablo shrimp, and 1/2 pound of shredded pork tender.
Extra fixins’
Add any addition items or toppings to your fajitas.
Diablo Shrimp
Grilled Shrimp
Grilled Texas Quail
Shredded Pork Tender
Jalapeno Sausage
or top your fajitas Los Tios Style
Monterrey
Sautéed mushrooms & melted Monterrey cheese
Rancheras
House-made Ranchera Sauce & melted Monterrey cheese
Back to the top
FROM THE GRILL
all items served with made-to-order tortillas, Mexican rice and your choice of beans
GRILLED RED FISH VERACRUZ
Grilled Texas red fish, sourced daily, on a bed of onions & bell peppers, and roasted veggies, topped with veracruz sauce.
RED FISH ON THE HALF SHELL
Grilled Texas redfish, served on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers.
*San Felipe & West U location only*
DIABLO SHRIMP
Five jumbo shrimp, filled with cheese and jalapeno, wrapped in bacon, and topped with melted monterrey cheese on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers.
GRILLED CHICKEN DINNER
A grilled chicken breast on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers. Served with guacamole & pico de gallo.
pechuga monterrey
A grilled chicken breast topped with mushrooms, serrano peppers, and melted Monterrey cheese on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers.
carne asada
Grilled Black Angus skirt steak on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers served with pico de gallo and guacamole.
shredded pork tender
Shredded pork tender on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers, topped with pickled red onions. Served with tomatillo sauce, queso fresco, chopped cilantro, guacamole, and pico de gallo.
grilled quail
Three grilled Texas Quail on a bed of grilled onions & bell peppers. Served with guacamole and pico de gallo.
chile relleno 1970
An egg-battered poblano pepper, stuffed with picadillo, and topped with ranchero sauce and melted cheese.
Back to the top
PLATOS ESPECIALES
all special plates served with Mexican rice & choice of beans
ACAPULCo
Crispy beef taco, guacamole salad, puffy queso, cheese enchilada, and pork tamale topped with chili gravy.
TEX-MEX
A Los Tios Favorite! Taco al carbon topped with chile con queso, crispy beef taco, and a cheese enchilada.
laredo
Crispy beef taco, cheese enchilada, and a pork tamale topped with chili gravy.
meatless special
Puffy queso, guacamole salad, and two cheese enchiladas topped with Spanish sauce.
tampico
Crispy beef taco, guacamole salad, cheese enchilada, and pork tamale topped with chili gracy.
tacos al carbon
Two fajita tacos on house-made flour tortillas. Served with guacamole, pico de gallo, and chile con queso.
Back to the top
COMBINATION PLATES
no. 1
Guacamole salad, puffy queso, & classic chalupa.
no. 2
Guacamole salad, crispy beef taco, & cheese enchilada.
no. 3
Guacamole salad, puffy queso, & cheese enchilada.
no. 4
Guacamole salad, puffy queso, & crispy beef taco.
No. 5
Two crispy beef tacos, & a puffy queso.
NO. 6
Crispy beef taco, puffy queso, & cheese enchilada.
No. 7
Classic chalupa, crispy beef taco, & a puffy queso.
No. 8
Two puffy quesos, & a cheese enchilada.
Back to the top
ENCHILADAS
all plates come with two enchiladas, Mexican rice, & choice of beans
cheese enchiladas
A Tex-Mex Classic. Melted cheese enchiladas topped with chili gravy.
Beef enchiladas
Corn tortillas rolled with taco meat, topped with chili gravy and melted cheese.
chicken enchiladas
Corn tortillas rolled with chicken taco meat & topped with your choice of sauce (Spanish, Cream, Chili Gravy, or Verde) and melted cheese.
spinach enchiladas
Corn tortillas filled with spinach and cheese, topped with cream sauce and melted cheese. Served with guacamole and pico de gallo.
enchiladas verdes
Corn tortillas rolled with shredded chicken and cheese, topped with green tomatillo sauce and melted cheese. Served with sour cream, guacamole, and pico de gallo.
Shrimp enchiladas
Corn tortillas rolled with seared shrimp, topped with cream sauce and melted cheese. Served with guacamole and pico de gallo.
enchiladas al carbon
Corn tortillas rolled with either Fajita Beef or Fajita Chicken, topped with your choice of sauce (Chili gravy, Spanish, Cream, or Verde)and melted cheese. Served with guacamole and pico de gallo.
Back to the top
Kid’s Meals
12 & under only. Drink and side choice included.
KID BURGER
A kid’s burger, a side of lettuce, tomato, and served with fries.
KID CHEEsE ENCHILADA
A single cheese enchilada with chili gravy, served with rice & refried beans.
KID CRISPY TACO
A single crispy beef taco with lettuce and diced tomato, served with rice & refried beans.
KID GRILLED CHEESE
A grilled cheese, served with fries.
KID PUFFY QUESO
A single puffy queso, served with rice & refried beans.
Kid QUESADILLAS
Cheese quesadillas served with rice & refried beans.
KID TACO AL CARBON
A single taco al carbon (fajita beef or fajita chicken) served with rice & refried beans.
Chicken Tenders
Two crispy chicken tenders and white toast served with fries.
Back to the top
DESSERTS
sopapillas
Four lightly fried pastries, dusted with cinnamon and powdered sugar. Served with caramel and honey.
tres leches
A slice of house-made Tres Leches cake with strawberry drizzle.
Mexican flan
House-made Mexican Flan, a custard baked with a caramel sauce glaze. Topped with whipped cream.
Back to the top

Our Story
We started Costa Brava Bistro with a combined experience of over 60 years in the hospitality field and we can happily say that this is our dream come true.
Over time, consistency and inspiration came a long way and our vision caught form.
A form in which we’ve created a home where our guests can enjoy the best of Spanish and French cuisine.

About the Business
Family-owned and operated for over 40 years, Taqueria Mexico has been proudly serving the Gulfton community since 1982. We specialize in authentic Mexican dishes inspired by the flavors of Aguascalientes. From breakfast tacos to full dinner plates, everything is made with tradition, care, and flavor. Come experience why we’ve been a neighborhood favorite for decades.

name: El Tiempo Cantina - Galleria
raw_text:
Menu - El Tiempo Cantina - Tex-Mex Cantina throughout the Houston Area
Skip to main content
El Tiempo Cantina-logo
Menu
Locations
Gift Cards
Catering
Contact
More
Menu
Locations
Gift Cards
Catering
Contact
Join Our Birthday Club
Order Now
Specials
Specials
Order Now
Join Our Birthday Club
Menu
At El Tiempo Cantina, everything is made from scratch. We cook all of our food using generations-old family recipes such as our tortillas, salad dressings, salsas and desserts. Our attention to quality and exceptional friendliness is our driving force.
Enjoy the El Tiempo experience at multiple locations in Houston and the surrounding areas including our original location on Richmond as well as our Washington, Annex, Northwest (290), Navigation, Vintage Park, Gessner, Stafford, Katy and Galleria locations.

Explore the symphony of flavors with our hand-selected Peruvian specialties, each telling the story of a rich culinary heritage.
Menu
Ceviche Bar
THE CLASICO
A quintessential blend of white fish, zesty leche de tigre, crisp red onion, and the bright kick of limo pepper.
CEVICHE 713
Signature white fish cured in lime juice, adorned with red onion, cilantro, piquant yellow pepper sauce, crunchy Peruvian corn, and topped with golden fried calamari.
SHRIMP CEVICHE
Fresh shrimp marinated in tangy lime with aji limo, garlic, cilantro, red onion, and Peruvian corn for a true coastal indulgence.
CEVICHE MIXTO
A bountiful mix of fish, shrimp, and calamari in a lime marinade, complemented with aji limo, garlic, cilantro, and red onion, crowned with Peruvian corn.
tuna CEVICHE NIKKEI
Sashimi-grade tuna, infused with soy sauce, aji Amarillo, lime juice, cilantro, and avocado, served with crispy fried wonton chips for an Asian-Peruvian fusion.
Entrees
Peruvian seafood paella
A sumptuous mix of seafood and fragrant, spiced rice, embodying the vibrant essence of Peruâs coastal cuisine.
seafood chaufa
A Peruvian twist on fried rice, brimming with a seafood mix, oriental ginger sauce, and crowned with a fried egg.
chicken chaufa
Savor the flavors of Peru with this chicken-laden fried rice, enriched with ginger oriental sauce and a fried egg topping.
LOMO SALTADO
Succulent sautÃ©ed beef, wok-tossed with onions, tomatoes, and a fragrant mix of garlic and cilantro, served with pristine white rice and crispy potatoes.
CHICKEN SALTADO
Juicy chicken strips join the sautÃ©ed sensation with onions, tomatoes, garlic, and cilantro, alongside white rice and crispy potatoes.
peruvian fried seafood
Crispy shrimp, calamari, and fish, served with a fresh red onion salad, golden yuca fries, and creamy tartare sauceâa coastal feast that's delightfully golden and tangy.
Poke clÃ¡sico
A vibrant bowl of white fish ceviche paired with rice, topped with red onion, cilantro, spicy aioli, corn, and seaweedâa refreshing blend of classic flavors and crisp textures.
Poke 713
A delightful rice bowl featuring white fish ceviche with yellow chili, complemented by red onion, cilantro, corn, and seaweedâperfectly balanced for a burst of vibrant flavors and textures.
Appetizer
SHRIMP CAUSA
A delectable layering of smooth potato cake with aromatic yellow peppers, topped with creamy avocado and succulent marinated shrimp.
causa ceviche
Experience the blend of a velvety potato cake infused with yellow peppers, crowned with fresh avocado and zesty fish ceviche. A refreshing Peruvian twist.
Pulpo 713
Delight in marinated, char-grilled octopus served with golden yuca fries, zesty chimichurri, and a crisp red onion salad. A Peruvian classic reimagined.
CHICKEN ANTICUCHOS (kebob)
Grilled marinated chicken skewers basking in aji panca sauce, served with choclo, crispy potatoes, and creamy huancaÃ­na sauce.
shrimp kebob
Grilled marinated shrimp served with tender yuca, topped with creamy huancaÃ­na sauce and a drizzle of vibrant chimichurriâ a perfect harmony of flavors.
Dessert
Flan
Indulge in our silken caramel custard, draped in a golden caramel sauce and adorned with fresh, tart berries.
LUCUMA MOUSSE
Discover the rich flavor of lucuma, Peru's cherished fruit, in a light mousse, layered with ladyfingers and luscious chocolate.

OUR COMMITMENT
The menu at Govinda’s uses fresh ingredients and a variety of spices – giving each dish and a bite a unique flavor of India. If you have a special craving for an item, best thing we can suggest is to call us (832) 831-9951 or
see today’s menu
. Our menu items change daily.
On Sundays, Wednesdays and Fridays – we only serve vegan items. Many of our offerings are Gluten-Friendly.
BUFFET OPEN DAILY!
LUNCH: 11–2:30 | DINNER: 5-9
Here are some of our daily rotating items:
BBQ Tofu [Vegan, Gluten Friendly] Tofu cooked in Tomato sauce
Baingan Bharatha [Gluten Friendly] Eggplant/Tomatoes cooked with Yogurt
Bhindi Masala [Vegan, Gluten Friendly] Okra and Potatoes
Chana Masala [Vegan, Gluten Friendly] Chickpeas cooked with Oil and Spices
Dal Fry [Vegan, Gluten Friendly] Chana Dal & Moong Dal cooked with Ginger, Oil
Dal Makhni [Vegan, Gluten Friendly] Black Urad Dal & Rajma cooked with Oil
Malai Kofta – Cauliflower/Carrot/Potatoes/Tomatoes/Cheese cooked with Oil
Mix Vegetable Pakora [Vegan, Gluten Friendly] Vegetable with Chickpeas Flour battered / fried
Navaratan Korma [Gluten Friendly] Assorted Vegetables in rich creamy sauce
Paneer Tikka Masala – Paneer Cheese, Butter, Tomatoes, Bell Peppers
Saag paneer [Gluten Friendly] Paneer Cheese with Spinach in creamy sauce
Tofu Curry [Vegan, Gluten Friendly] Tofu cooked with coconut milk & Chickpeas Flour
Vegetable Jalfrezi [Vegan, Gluten Friendly] Mixed Vegetables, oil, Spices
Vegetable Kofta [Vegan, Gluten Friendly] Vegetables, Chickpea Flour, Oil
Veggie Pulao Rice [Vegan, Gluten Friendly] Rice, Vegetables, Olive Oil
Fruit Halava [Vegan] Semolina, Sugar, Fruit, Vegan Butter
Khir (Sweet Rice) [Gluten Friendly] Rice with Milk, Sugar
Vegetable Pakoras, Samosas with fresh-made Mint Chutney
Rice Pilaf
Papadam (roasted Lentil crackers)
Of course, we serve fresh salad items and house-made dressings, fresh roti/puri (flat whole wheat flour breads) daily

Menu
Brunch-y Lunch

Menu
Tasting Menus
Dessert
Delhi by way of Houston
The Chef defines her cuisine as a combination of cultures, philosophies and cooking techniques. Sourced from local purveyors and the Gulf waters, our food is inspired by the Awadhi style of cooking – the art of cooking over a slow fire, with the subtle use of spices and herbs to create delicate flavors. Some of the food is also cooked in traditional clay ovens, or tandoors, in the style of the Indian North-West Frontier Province. Our dishes are inventive but authentic to the traditions and style of north Indian cuisine.
Our meats are antibiotic- and hormone-free and come from sustainable sources.
All our chicken and lamb is Halal.
Visit Kiran's

Menu: Indian Food in Spring and the Woodlands
Indian Food Menu
From Palette Indian Kitchen
Look through our
Indian food menu
options below to find your favorite. If you are one of our
5 star fans
from Google or Facebook we would like to thank you for your continued support and feedback. We guarantee we will never stop trying to amaze and delight you with our authentic Indian food and make sure your satisfaction is our number one priority.
Immerse Yourself in Flavor
Lunch and Dinner
See Full Menu
Catering Request
Catering
We Offer Catering for Corporate Lunches & Events.
Include Wraps and Combo Meals.
Check out our
catering menu
or
Contact Us
Some of Our Fan Favorites
"Serving delicious food was a way of honoring a guest. Naturally we carried on this legacy of hosting with our family and friends, pleased with the satisfaction of loved ones enjoying the food in each others company. For each family get-together and party, my wife and I gladly cook and cater to the tastes of each member of the gathering, because this is how we express our love. The gift of love and sharing was instilled in us during our formative years in India.

This persistent passion for food and hospitality began in us a desire to make a space available to everyone, an open table, where families can sit and where friendships can begin, all in the presence of a re-imagined and flavorful cuisine that is comprised of both family and traditional recipes."
Note From The Owner
Owner

Tavern By Hearsay​
Tavern by Hearsay brings a fresh twist to British and Indian cuisine in the heart of Downtown Houston.
Nestled inside Market Square Tower, our restaurant blends historic charm with contemporary style. From brunch to dinner, experience vibrant dishes, craft cocktails, and an intimate atmosphere ideal for gatherings, date nights, or casual dining. Join us to discover tavern-style dining reimagined with a global touch.

EAT GOOD KARMA
Authentic Indian Food, Made Fresh Daily
CURRIES
Six delicious curries sautéed with your choice of Chicken, Lamb, Vegetables, Paneer or Shrimp. Spiced to order and served with basmati rice.
KABOBS
Juicy & flavorful grilled entrees, served with fresh vegetables, basmati rice and a delicious chutney made with mint tamarind & yogurt.
BIRYANIS
Basmati rice stir-fried with garlic, ginger, onions, spices, and choice of protein. Spiced to order and served with a yogurt-cucumber sauce.
VEGETARIAN
An amazing selection of fresh vegetarian and vegan dishes spiced and served with perfectly cooked and seasoned basmati rice.

Tarka: “The pop and sizzle of spices dancing on hot oil”
OUR ROOTS
Fresh, Healthy Indian Cuisine
We set out with a simple premise. Create a restaurant with
fresh and flavorful Indian food
that is also fast and affordable. Serve it in a casual, modern space with stellar customer service. Make it as convenient as possible, whether you’re enjoying a relaxing meal on our patio with a glass of wine, or grabbing takeout using our online ordering system. And, run it as environmentally friendly as we can.
Our first store opened in Austin in 2009, and from that moment on, our guests have been almost as passionate about Tarka as we are. We had lines out the door, but couldn’t make the food fast enough. Struggling to keep up, we scrambled to redo our menu countless times before we finally found the right balance of curries, kabobs, biryanis, and freshly baked flatbreads. And we paired the food with great drinks like mango lemonade, fresh fruit lassis, and select wine and beer.
Enthusiastically embraced by Austin, Tarka opened its second location a year later and a third shortly after that. We opened our first store outside of Austin in 2014, and now have locations in
Austin
,
San Antonio
,
Round Rock
, and
Houston
, Texas.
At Tarka, we know that sound and smell intimately, from our own kitchens growing up. We have experienced the deliciousness that happens when our moms bring out their spice tiffins, and get their Tarka on. Tarka is committed to making affordable and healthy Indian cuisine and offers a variety of vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free menu items.
Dine-in. Take Out. Delivery via third-party delivery partners.
ORDER ONLINE
CITY OF AUSTIN SUSTAINABLE ‘GREEN RESTAURANT’
The City of Austin has recognized Tarka as a
Green Restaurant
. We use environmentally friendly to-go packaging, recycle our used cooking oil, glass, aluminum, plastic & cardboard, and compost our food waste. For additional information, please feel free to email us at
[email protected]
.
Contact
We love to hear from you
Have questions or comments? We value your communication & would love for you to share with us. Contact Tarka directly!

About us
Madhuram Mirch masala, serves the best and delicious Indian vegan food in Houston, TX, for a long time. Our place will bring you the most delicious vegetarian cuisine of your life with the best hospitality in a traditional Indian style. Visit our restaurant to get a taste of the best vegan and vegetarian food in Houston, TX.

name: Ashar's Kitchen
raw_text:
Ashar’s Kitchen MENU (Updated October 2025)
Skip to content
Ashar's Kitchen
Home
About
MENU
Photos
CONTACT
Ashar’s Kitchen Menu
Beef Nihari: A Culinary Journey into Pakistani Delight
Indulge in the enchanting flavors of Beef Nihari, a culinary masterpiece that embodies the essence of Pakistani cuisine. Our slow-cooked beef shanks are simmered to perfection in a rich and flavorsome sauce, infused with aromatic spices, fragrant herbs, and a hint of fiery chilies. This classic Pakistani stew is a testament to the depth and complexity of our culinary heritage.
At Ashar’s Kitchen take immense pride in preparing Beef Nihari using time-honored techniques that have been passed down through generations. The slow cooking process allows the flavors to meld together, resulting in tender, melt-in-your-mouth beef that is immersed in a luscious gravy.
With every spoonful of Beef Nihari, you’ll experience a symphony of flavors that dance on your palate. The warm and earthy spices, such as cumin, coriander, and cinnamon, create a harmonious blend that tantalizes your taste buds. The addition of aromatic herbs like bay leaves and cardamom elevates the dish, adding layers of complexity.
Chicken Tikka Masala: A Harmony of Flavors and Textures
Prepare to embark on a culinary adventure with Chicken Tikka Masala, a beloved Indian-Pakistani fusion dish that delights both chicken lovers and curry enthusiasts. This exquisite creation offers a perfect balance of flavors that will transport your taste buds to new heights.
At Ashar’s Kitchen, succulent chicken pieces take center stage in this dish. Marinated in a blend of yogurt and spices, each bite is infused with a medley of aromatic flavors that complement the tender chicken. The marination process ensures that every morsel is infused with a delightful harmony of spices, allowing the flavors to penetrate the meat.
Biryani: A Flavorful Journey through Fragrant Rice
Prepare to be captivated by the aromatic and tantalizing flavors of Biryani, a beloved rice dish cherished across South Asia. Ashar’s Kitchen take immense pride in crafting our biryani with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring a culinary experience that is nothing short of extraordinary.
Our biryani begins with the finest aromatic basmati rice, known for its long grains and delicate fragrance. The rice is then layered with tender, succulent pieces of meat, vibrant vegetables, and a medley of carefully selected spices. Each component harmoniously blends together, creating a symphony of textures and tastes that will enchant your senses.
As you delve into each spoonful of biryani, you’ll discover a myriad of flavors that dance on your palate. The fragrant spices, such as cardamom, cinnamon, and cloves, infuse the rice with their aromatic essence, imparting a depth of flavor that is both enticing and satisfying. The tender meat and colorful vegetables add a delightful contrast of textures, further enhancing the overall experience.
ASHAR’S KITCHEN

Our Services
Wide range of bakery products
Bakery
Wide range of Spices
Spices
Spices have a long and ancient history, especially in India, where they are a part of life and heritage. In every home & in every province across the country, different spices and blends are used to create different and distinctive tastes in dishes. Several decades ago, housewives used to grind their spices manually at home and make their own blends for use in their cooking and same legacy is being continued by Honest till date. We proudly produce spices with best ingredients and recipe. Every raw spices is carefully cleaned, roasted & blended together to make a perfect and balanced mix spices.

Welcome to BBQ Village
The Home of Ethnic
Traditional Flavors.
An Exceptional Journey of Taste.
Serving Food, Harmony & Laughter Since 2010
View Full Menus
Authentic BBQ and cuisines
BBQ and Ethnic Cuisine in Houston
The destination for halal BBQ lovers, BBQ Village serves
a unique blend of Chinese, Pakistani, Indian, Mexican, and Bohra cuisines, offering an authentic taste of tradition
. We are known not only for serving exceptional taste, but also for our warm hosting.
Whether you’re looking for the best Halal BBQ in Houston or craving flavors from around the world, our menu has something for everyone.
Tantalize your taste buds.
About Us
Founded by a passionate couple who loved cooking and sharing meals with others, BBQ Village continues to embody the same spirit of hospitality today.
Our dedicated team of chefs, staff, and everyone involved shares a deep passion for crafting delicious halal feasts that bring joy to our guests.
Halal Delicacies
Experience the Taste of Tradition
Indulge in the rich, authentic flavors that embody the essence of tradition. Every bite takes you on a journey
through time, blending heritage and taste to create a truly unforgettable dining experience.
Dine IN
Dine in Menu
See Menu
Catering Option
Catering
Learn More

Learn More

Party Trays
See Menu
Thursday Buffet: BBQ & More
Dine-In Delights
Join us every Thursday for our Dine-In Buffet, featuring a rotating menu
with
BBQ, fish,
Pakistani dishes, fast food
,
and
Chinese cuisine.
Thursday nights just got better. Gather your group and head to BBQ Village. Whether you’re in the mood for a traditional Pakistani meal with Biryani, Karhai, Nihari, or are craving one of our popular burger deals, there’s something for everyone!
Contact us now
Passion
Our Story
I am Mohammad Kitabi, a well-loved figure among the Asian Community in Houston, known for my passion for feeding people and serving authentic, flavorful meals.
What began as a dream during my years managing restaurants and catering events has now grown into BBQ Village, the home of Halal BBQ and different ethnic cuisines in Houston since 2010.
Testimonial
What our customers say
Our customers love the authentic flavors and warm atmosphere at BBQ Village. Hear their stories of
unforgettable meals and top-notch service that keep them coming back for more!”
I had the best BBQ experience at BBQ Village! The flavors were authentic, and the meat was tender and juicy. The live BBQ setup made the entire dining experience even more special. Highly recommended for anyone looking for real desi flavors!"
Ahmed Khan
Customer
The food was delicious, especially the chicken tikka and seekh kebabs. The service was a bit slow, but the taste and ambiance made up for it. I’ll definitely be coming back!
Sara Ali
Customer
BBQ Village catered our family event, and everyone loved the food! The variety on the menu and the customized options made our event truly special. Great value for money too!
Usman Malik
Customer
I tried their premium catering option for a corporate event, and the feedback from my colleagues was amazing! The food was fresh and well-presented. The only downside was the limited dessert choices.
Ayesha Tariq
Customer
Their live BBQ was a fantastic experience! It reminded me of authentic Pakistani street BBQ. The staff was friendly, and the atmosphere was vibrant. Definitely my go-to spot for BBQ now.
Hassan Javed
Customer

About the Business
We are proud to introduce to you Tandoori Indian Cuisine, one of the finest new restaurants in a convenient location of Spring, and Woodlands, TX. It is located on FM-2920 which is an easy commute from I-45 and other close locations of Houston. 
​
TIC (Tandoori Indian Cuisine) is open Now in your town. The owner happens to be a Chef and has 15+ years experience of cooking under his belt. His expertise includes various kinds of Indian, Pakistan and Bengali dishes which will literally take your breath away. Please do not take our word for it, but " do give us a chance to serve you" and let you decide it. 
​
The management is well-experienced and very customer focused. Our first priority is to serve our customer by providing them the best food in their town. Please try us and bring all your families, friends so that we can prove what we claim about our food.

name: Gourmet India
raw_text:
Best Indian in Houston, TX | Gourmet India | Order Online
Gourmet India
13155 Westheimer Rd Ste 140, Houston, TX 77077
(346) 258-5379
Menu
Terms and Conditions
Privacy Policy
Cookies Policy
Accessibility

25.00
Needed
$
25.00
Needed
Menu
Menu availability may vary based on the time of your order.
All Day Menu
Menu
All Day Menu
Appetizer
Chat Corner/Soup
Salad, Rayta, & Soups
Tandoori & Mixed Grill
Chicken Specialties
Goat Specials
Lamb Specials
Vegetable Sabji
Rice & Biryani
Seafood
Tid-Bits
Beverages
Sweets & Desserts
Kids Meal
Appetizer
1. Vegetable Samosa
Our Vegetable Samosa is a delightful concoction of spiced potatoes, peas, and carrots, all encased in a light, flaky pastry. Perfectly fried to a golden crisp, each bite delivers a burst of savory flavors, making it an irresistible starter or a snack to enjoy anytime.
$
3.99
2. Chicken Samosa
Savor the rich filling of our Chicken Samosa, featuring finely minced chicken, seasoned with an exquisite blend of herbs and spices. Wrapped in a crispy pastry shell, these samosas are a perfect harmony of textures and flavors, ideal for satisfying your hunger with a touch of elegance.
$
4.99
3. Lamb Samosa
Indulge in the deep, robust flavors of our Lamb Samosa. Packed with juicy, spiced lamb meat, onions, and herbs, each samosa is a pocket of rich, meaty goodness. The crispy outer layer complements the succulent filling, making it a must-try for meat lovers.
$
5.99
4. Vegetable Pakora
Our Vegetable Pakoras are a crunchy, delightful treat. A mixture of fresh vegetables dipped in a chickpea batter and deep-fried to perfection. These fritters are light, flavorful, and an excellent choice for a vegetarian appetizer or a side dish.
$
6.99
5. Onion Pakora
Onion Pakora is a popular Indian snack made by coating thinly sliced onions with a spiced batter made from chickpea flour and then deep-frying until crispy and golden brown. The result is a delicious and crunchy snack with a perfect balance of savory and spicy flavors, often served with mint chutney or tamarind chutney on the side.
$
6.99
6. Paneer Pakora
Paneer pakora are a delicious Indian snack made with paneer, spices & gram flour. These paneer pakora are delicious, flavorful and addictive with all the goodness of Indian cheese in them.
$
9.99
7. Gobi Pakora
Gobi Pakora is a popular Indian snack made by coating cauliflower florets in a spiced batter of chickpea flour, herbs, and spices before deep-frying until crispy and golden brown. The result is a deliciously crunchy and savory dish with a satisfying kick of heat, perfect as an appetizer or accompaniment to a meal.
$
9.99
8. Mirchi Pakora
Mirchi Pakora is a popular Indian snack made by stuffing long green chilies with a spiced mixture of potatoes, onions, and herbs, before coating them in a batter of chickpea flour and deep-frying until crispy and golden brown. It's a deliciously spicy and crunchy dish that's perfect as a snack or appetizer.
$
9.99
9. Gobi Manchurian
Gobi Manchurian is a popular Indo-Chinese dish made with crispy cauliflower florets coated in a spicy batter and then stir-fried with garlic, ginger, onions, and a tangy sauce made with soy sauce and vinegar. The result is a delicious and flavorful dish with a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and spicy flavors, often served as an appetizer or a side dish.
$
11.99
10. Vegetable Manchurian
Experience the bold flavors of our Vegetable Manchurian. Deep-fried vegetable balls are dunked in a tangy, slightly spicy Manchurian sauce, creating a mouth-watering dish that's a staple in Indo-Chinese cuisine. It's a perfect blend of comfort and flavor in every bite.
$
11.99
11. Reshmi Paneer Tikka
Our Reshmi Paneer Tikka features succulent cubes of paneer, marinated in a creamy blend of yogurt and spices, then grilled to perfection. Soft and juicy, these paneer tikkas are a heavenly treat for vegetarians and cheese lovers alike.
$
13.99
12. Chicken 65 Manchurian
A unique twist on two classics, our Chicken 65 Manchurian combines the fiery taste of Chicken 65 with the zest of Manchurian sauce. This dish is a fusion of flavors that's spicy, tangy, and absolutely addictive, making it a fantastic choice for those who love a bit of heat.
$
13.99
13. Chicken Tikka Sizzler
Our Chicken Tikka Appetizer is marinated in herbs and spices, then grilled until crispy. Served without curry, it's a lighter, flavor-packed start to your meal. Perfect for those who prefer a crisp, savory beginning.
$
13.99
14. Egg Bhurji
Egg Bhurji is a delicious Indian street food made by hard-boiling eggs, cutting them in half, and coating them in a spiced batter of chickpea flour and deep-frying them until crispy. These egg halves are then served with a tangy and spicy tomato-based sauce and garnished with fresh herbs. It's a perfect snack or appetizer for any occasion.
$
11.99
15. Fish Pakora
Fish Pakora is a popular Indian snack made by coating small pieces of fish in a spiced batter of chickpea flour, herbs, and spices before deep-frying until crispy and golden brown. The result is a flavorful and crispy dish with a satisfying kick of heat, perfect as an appetizer or accompaniment to a meal.
$
14.99
Chat Corner/Soup
16. Samosa Chaat
Samosa Chaat is a mouth-watering Indian street food made by crushing and layering pieces of crispy samosas with spiced chickpeas, yogurt, tamarind chutney, and green chutney, topped with finely chopped onions, tomatoes, and fresh coriander. The result is a sweet, sour, and savory explosion of flavors and textures, perfect for any food lover.
$
9.99
17. Aloo Chaat

The result is a delicious and satisfying snack with a perfect balance of flavors and textures.

The result is a tangy and savory snack with a perfect balance of textures and flavors, and a must-try for any street food lover.

Pani Puri, also known as Gol Guppa, is a popular Indian street food consisting of small, crispy, hollow balls filled with spiced potatoes, chickpeas, and tamarind chutney, and then filled with a spicy and tangy mint water called "pani". The result is a burst of flavors and textures in every bite, and a must-try for any street food enthusiast.

About the Business
Kohinoor Indo-Pak Restaurant & Grocery has something for everyone. Our cuisine is a reflection of our culture and depth of flavors. Our Lamb Chops, Grilled Fish, Tandoori Chicken, Malai Boti, Beef Nihari, Goat Karahi, Chicken Biryani, Butter Chicken, Saag Paneer, Chicken Tikka Masala and Samosa are a must try.
In the grocery, we have a variety of Indian and Pakistani spices, lentils, rice , flour, fresh vegetables, and Halal Fresh Chicken, Goat, Lamb and Beef.

raw_text:
Home - Tikka Munch
0
items in Cart
Home
Order Online
0
items in Cart
Home
Order Online
Tikka Munch
Tikka Munch
Spring, TX
Start Your Order
Reviews
★★★★★
Great food and service! Veggie lovers will truly admire this place and will make it their new to go weekly spot. The owner Raj is helpful and will recommend what you’re taste buds are craving. The paneer tikk and dahi puri is me and my wife’s favorite.
Amit G.
★★★★★
I have always been waiting for a delicious Indian food truck in North Houston; finally I can say this is one of the best authentic Indian food truck that is located in North Houston. They work very hard to cater everyones' taste buds. I am very impressed with their service, quantity, and quality of the food.
Nilay D.
★★★★★
All I can say is WOW. The paneer burger is the best veggie burger I’ve ever had. It’s dangerously good. Highly recommend checking this place out!
Navreen R.
Leave a Review
Contact Form
Tikka Munch
At Tikka Munch in Spring, we serve Indian Cuisine such as our Pani Puri, Chole, and Paneer Burger. We are located on Louetta Rd just a few minutes from Dollar Tree. Order Online for carryout or delivery today!

About us
Our menu features a variety of classic Indian dishes, from aromatic biryanis and flavorful curries to mouthwatering tandoori specialties. Whether you’re enjoying a hearty lunch or a special dinner, every meal at Suvai is a celebration of Indian culture and hospitality.

Our Menus
Starters & Salads
Appetizers
Lonely Mountain Black Bean Nachos
Tortilla chips topped with black beans, jack cheese, pico de gallo, jalapeño peppers and sour cream.
Lonely Mountain Fajita Nachos
Black bean nachos topped with jack cheese, and beef or chicken fajita meat, pico de gallo, sour cream, and jalapeños.
Dragon Wings
Chicken wings served with Jamaican jerk sauce and our own chipotle sauce.
Treebeard’s Guacamole Salad
A large guacamole salad served with tostado chips and salsa.
Hobbit Chips and Salsa
A basket of corn chips served with homemade salsa.
Fellowship Platter
Roasted garlic hummus, tabouli, kalamata olives, feta, roasted red peppers, tomato, and cucumber on spring mix served with pita and tzaziki.
Lake-Town Shrimp Rolls
Cream cheese, shrimp, and chives, rolled in a spring roll paper and lightly fried. Served with a side of sweet pepper Thai Sauce.
Orc Poppers
Jalapeños stuffed with cream cheese, lightly fried and served with our salsa.
Wizard Quesadillas
Baby spinach, mushrooms and jack cheese, served with sour cream and pico de gallo.
Hobbit Quesadillas
Grilled cheese with fire roasted bell peppers. Served with pico de gallo and sour cream.
Hobbit Fajita Quesadillas
Fajitas stuffed with fire roasted red and green bell peppers and jack cheese. Served with pico de gallo and our cream.
Beef or Chicken
Great Goblins Platter
Shrimp rolls (2), Fried Pickles (8), jalapeno poppers (4), Dragon wings (4) and your choice of a Quesadilla
Soups & Salads
Salad Dressings: Creamy Dill (House Dressing), Ranch, Caesar, Honey Mustard, Bleu Cheese, Italian, Oil and Vinegar.
Strider’s Protein Platter
Your choice of tabouli, tuna salad, chicken salad, curry chicken salad, or egg salad. Served on a bed of lettuce with sliced tomato.
Easterling Tropical Chicken Salad
Spring mix tossed in our tropical spiced honey yogurt dressing. Topped with jerk chicken, fresh fruit, toasted almonds and coconut.
Hobbit Salad
Spring mix with tomato wedges, cucumbers, and shredded carrots.
Kili’s Greek Salad
Baby Greens with feta cheese, Kalamata olives, tomatoes, cucumbers, and green onions tossed in our Greek Salad Dressing
Chicken
Salmon
Grilled, Blackened, or Jerk Style
Fili’s Caesar Salad
Romaine Lettuce with baby greens, croutons, parmesan cheese, and our house made Caesar Dressing.
Chicken
Salmon
Grilled, Blackened, or Jerk Style
Frodo’s Fresh Fruit Salad
Seasonal fruit tossed in a vanilla yogurt and honey dressing. Topped with almonds and coconut.
Soup Du Jour
or Gazpacho
Lunch and Dinner
Burgers
Fresh ground burgers pattied in-house and served on your choice of whole wheat or white wheat bun and your choice of shredded carrots, potato chips, black beans, or brown rice.
Hobbit Burger
Grilled Angus with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickle, and mayo.
Aragorn’s Avocado Burger
Grilled Angus with avocado. Served with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickle, and mayo.
Bombur’s Bacon Cheese Burger
Barbados burger with bacon and cheese. Served with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickle, and mayo.
Boromir’s Boudin Burger
One half pound Angus burger topped with one quarter pound smoked jalapeño pork boudin, mango pico de gallo, spring mix, creole mustard, chipotle caesar dressing, and Sriracha sauce.
Bolg’s Black and Bleu Burger
Cajun seasoned burger blackened and topped with sautéed bell peppers and onions with blue cheese dressing.
Balrog Burger
Double-meat patty (1 lb.), double cheese, bacon, avocado, stuffed jalapeño, mushrooms, jalapeño, chipotle mayo.
Saruman’s Caesar Burger
Grilled Angus topped with caesar dressing and parmesan cheese. Served with lettuce, tomato, and onion.
Fires of Mt. Doom Burger
Grilled Angus patty topped with chorizo, hatch queso, guacamole, pico de gallo, sauteed jalapenos, sliced serranos and cilantro.
King Theodens Burger
Grilled Angus patty topped with smoked gouda, sauteed mushrooms and kalamata olives with humus and pesto.
Jamaican Jerk Burger
Grilled Angus topped with Caribbean Jerk Sauce. Served with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickle, and mayo.
Bifur’s Lamb Burger
Fresh ground leg of lamb grilled and served with spring mix, tomatoes, marinated cucumbers, red onion, and mayo.
Boufer’s Buffalo Burger
Grilled lean buffalo patty served with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickle, and mayo.
Mirkwood Black Bean Burger
Our own black bean patty served with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickle, and mayo.
Radagast’s Mushroom Burger
Portobello mushroom cap marinated in olive oil, balsamic and spice atop spring mix, tomato and red onion with basil pesto.
Prancing Pony Hickory Burger
Bacon, cheddar, barbecue sauce, spring mix, tomato, onion, and pickle with mayo
Morgoth Burger
Quad patty, smoked boudin link, bacon (4x),  cheddar cheese (2x), jack cheese (2x), fried egg, avocado, sautéed jalapeños, spring mix, tomato, onion, pickle with house made chipotle caesar dressing, screwed with an orc popper, goblin pickles and a lake town shrimp roll!
Eowyn’s Elk Burger
Elk, Ghost Pepper Cheddar, Fig Jam, Caramelized Onions, arugula
Sandwiches
Served on whole wheat with your choice of shredded carrots, ruffles, black beans, or brown rice.
Gandalf
Avocado topped with mushrooms and melted jack cheese.
Smaug's Delight
Smoked turkey topped with avocado, tomato, and melted jack cheese.
Dwalin
Curry chicken salad mixed with grapes, almonds, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.
Bilbo Magnificent
Guacamole, tomato, cucumber, and alfalfa sprouts with mayo.
Fatty Lumpkin
Tuna salad with tomato under melted cheese.
Withy Windle
Chicken salad with lettuce, tomato, and mayo.
Far Down
Egg salad, guacamole, tomato, and mayo.
Frodo
Mesquite smoked turkey, roasted bell peppers with tomato under melted cheese.
Thorin Oakenshield
Fresh tabouli topped with mushrooms under melted cheese.
Turkey BLT
Mesquite smoked turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.
Shire
Avocado, fresh tabouli, tomato, alfalfa sprouts with mayo.
Mahi Mahi
Grilled mahi mahi fillet with lettuce, tomato, red onion, and house made tarter sauce.
South of the Border
Gollum’s Seafood Tacos
Blackened fish fillet topped with shredded red cabbage and our own Chipotle dressing. Served with mango pico, Hobbit salsa and a side of black beans and rice.
Gondor
Cajun seasoned and blackened Grouper fillet, topped with our cilantro lime cream sauce. Served with brown rice and steamed veggies.
Rivendell Salmon
Salmon fillet grilled and topped with jerk sauce. Served with curry brown rice, steamed veggies, and mango pico de gallo.
Rivendell Chicken
Chicken breast grilled and topped with jerk sauce and toasted coconut flakes. Served with curry spiced rice, steamed veggies, and mango pico.
Helm’s Deep Classic Fajitas
Sizzling beef or chicken fajitas (or portobello mushroom). Served with black beans, rice, roasted peppers and onions, shredded cheese, and pico de gallo.
Valinor
Steamed veggies over black beans and brown rice.
Lady Galadriel’s Magic Enchiladas
Fresh spinach and sautéed mushrooms in corn tortillas, topped with jack cheese and mole sauce. Served with black beans, rice, and pico de gallo.
Rohan Chicken Enchiladas
Chicken breast in corn tortillas. Topped with jack cheese and your choice of sauce (Mole, Chipotle Verde, Roja, Blanca or Fuego Verde) Served with black beans, brown rice, and pico de gallo.
Celeborn’s Cheese Enchilada
Jack cheese in corn tortillas, topped with chipotle verde sauce. Served with black beans, brown rice, pico de gallo and sour cream.
Faromir’s Falafel Wrap
Hummus, tzatziki, falafel, cucumber, tomato, red onion, and spring mix rolled up in a spinach tortilla
Brunch is only served on Saturdays and Sundays from 11 AM- 3 PM
Second Breakfast
Poached Salmon Benedict
Toasted English muffins topped with poached salmon, steamed spinach, poached egg and hollandaise sauce. Served with brunch potatoes.
Smoked Turkey Benedict
Toasted English muff topped with mesquite smoked turkey, steamed spinach, poached egg and hollandaise sauce. Served with brunch potatoes.
Smoked Jalapeño Boudin Benedict
Toasted English muffins topped with smoked jalapeño boudin , steamed spinach, poached egg and hollandaise sauce. Served with brunch potatoes.
Boudin and Eggs
Three scrambled eggs mixed with smoked jalapeño boudin served with pico de gallo, sour cream, and brunch potatoes.
Chilaquiles
Three eggs scrambled with fried tortilla strips and roasted pepper salsa. Topped with soft Mexican cheese. Served with brunch potatoes.
Chorizo and Eggs
Three eggs scrambled with chorizo. Served with pico de gallo, flour tortillas and breakfast potatoes.
Huevos a la Shire
Three eggs scrambled with fried tortilla strips, tomatoes, jalapeños, onion and cilantro. Served with pico de gallo and breakfast potatoes.
Beef Fajitas and Eggs
Beef fajitas with 3 scrambled eggs, sautéed peppers and onions. Served with brunch potatoes.
Portobello Mushroom Fajitas and Eggs
Portobello mushrooms fajitas with 3 scrambled eggs, sautéed peppers and onions. Served with brunch potatoes.
Avocado Omelette
Three egg omelette stuffed with sliced avocado, cream cheese, and house spices. Served with breakfast potatoes and toast.
Greek Omelette
Three egg omelette with feta cheese, sautéed tomato and onions, fresh basil and greek olives. Served with breakfast potatoes and toast.
Spinach Mushroom Omelette
Three egg omelette stuffed with fresh spinach, sautéed mushrooms and onions. Served with breakfast potatoes and toast.
Fire Roasted Pepper Omelette
Three egg omelette stuffed with roasted poblano peppers, jalapeños and onions. Drizzled with our own Caesar chipotle dressing. Served with breakfast potatoes and toast.
Pancakes
Blueberry Pancakes
Served with blueberry syrup.
Coconut Pancakes
Served with coconut syrup.
Strawberry Pancakes
Served with strawberry syrup.
Nutella Pancakes
Served with maple syrup. Add banana (0.99)
Lavender Pancakes
Served with lavender syrup.
Pistachio Pancakes
Served with pistachio syrup.
Almond Pancakes
Topped with sliced almonds and served with almond syrup.  Add chocolate chips & shredded coconut (1.49)
Chocolate Chip Panacke
Add cheddar cheese (0.99)
Sides
Breakfast Potatoes
House-made breakfast potatoes.
Boudin Link Sausage
Link of our legendary boudin.
Eggs (any style)
Cooked to order, your preference.
Bacon Strips
Strips of bacon.
Toast
Order of toasted bread, wheat.
Fresh Fruit
Strawberries, pineapple, grapes, cantaloupe, and kiwi.
Brunch Booze
Mimosa, Frozen Peach Bellini, Bloody Mary, Red Sangria.

Bag End Key Lime Pie
Original Key West recipe on graham cracker crust topped with whipped cream and sliced strawberries.
Carrot Cake of Angmar
Made with grated carrots, sweet crushed pineapple and walnuts. Covered in cream cheese icing and dusted with ground pistachios.
Old Man Willows Chocolate Mousse Cake
Three layers of chocolate sponge cake with layers of milk and white chocolate.
Óni and Gloin’s Cheesecake
Slice of NY style cheesecake served with strawberry purée and whip cream.
Brandywine Bourbon Pecan Pie
Toasted pecan halves laced with Kentucky bourbon and topped with whipped cream.
Shelob’s Salted Caramel Cheesecake
Baked on a sweet and salty almond crust, topped with buttery caramel, sliced almonds and whipped cream.
Durin’s Chocolate Blackberry Cake

Sooji Halwa
Sooji halwa, also known as sheera or suji ka halwa, is a popular Pakistani/Indian sweet dish made with semolina, sugar, and ghee, and flavored with cardamom and saffron. It is a delicious and decadent treat that is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth. Our Sooji Halwa is made with fresh, high-quality ingredients and is cooked to perfection. We use a traditional recipe to create a rich and flavorful dish that is sure to impress. To make this halwa, we first roast the semolina in ghee until it is golden brown. We then add sugar, water, and cardamom and cook the mixture until it thickens. Finally, we add saffron and nuts for garnish! At Karahi Boys, sooji halwa is best served warm and is a delicious way to end a meal. It is also a popular dish for special occasions and festivals.

Boneless Chicken Karahi (Charsi)
Try our Charsi Chicken Karahi, one of the most popular karahis from Northern Pakistan. Enjoy this flavorful dish with naan or rice and experience the authentic taste of Northern Pakistan.

Chitti Chicken Karahi
The hidden gem of Kashmiri cuisine, Chitti Chicken Karhai. This delightful dish showcases the authentic flavors of the region, offering a unique twist to the traditional karahi. Prepared with a blend of yogurt, cream, coconut, and a medley of fresh spices, this karahi stands apart with its distinct flavor profile. Unlike the usual tomato-based karahi, Chitti Chicken Karhai takes a milder approach, perfect for those who prefer a gentle spice level. Each bite unveils a symphony of flavors that will transport you to the beautiful valleys of Kashmir.

Chicken Dum Biryani
Karahi Boys' chicken dum biryani is a traditional dish, lovingly prepared with tender, juicy chicken, long-grain basmati rice, and a blend of aromatic spices.  The secret to our iconic biryani! We cook our biryani in layers, carefully arranging the rice, chicken, and spices so that every bite is full of flavour. Cooked in a sealed pot over low heat, this method ensures the flavours meld perfectly, creating a fragrant and delicious combination. It is then garnished with fresh cilantro and crispy fried onions and served with a side of raita for an extra dash of flavour.

Gajar Ka Halwa
Gajar halwa, a cherished winter dessert, is a delightful blend of freshly grated carrots, creamy khoya, and a mix of aromatic spices. At Karahi Boys, we pride ourselves on serving an authentic version of this classic treat, made with only the freshest and highest-quality ingredients. The making of our special gajar halwa We start with finely grated carrots, simmered in milk and sugar until they become soft and tender. Next, we mix in creamy khoya, cooking it until it melts and blends seamlessly with the carrots. To finish, we add a generous amount of nuts, cooking them until they release their fragrant oils. Served hot and garnished with pistachios, our gajar halwa is a perfect sweet indulgence.

Gulab Jamun
Gulab Jamun is soft, spongy, and deliciously sweet soaked in sugar syrup and flavored with rose water and cardamom. It is a popular Indian dessert that is often served on special occasions, but it's so good, you'll want to eat it every day! It is made with milk solids, sugar, and flour, and is then deep-fried and soaked in syrup. The result is a sweet and decadent treat that is sure to please your taste buds. At Karahi Boys, we use only the freshest ingredients to make our Gulab Jamun, so you can be sure that it is always fresh and delicious. Pro tip: Warm gulab jamuns in warm sugary syrup are a treat for all those sweet tooth cravings for something warm and gooey!

Sức hút đến từ những trận đấu gay cấn giữa các chiến kê tài ba, cùng công nghệ truyền hình trực tiếp độ nét cao, giúp người chơi ở bất cứ đâu cũng có thể trải nghiệm không khí sôi động nơi đấu trường đá gà chuyên nghiệp.
Vì sao nên theo dõi
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
?
Tận mắt chứng kiến các trận đá gà cam go, chiến thuật đấu trí hấp dẫn giữa các kê sư lừng danh Campuchia
Cập nhật kết quả, diễn biến trận đấu một cách
chân thực
và
dễ dàng đặt cược trực tuyến
Tiện lợi, không mất công di chuyển mà vẫn cảm nhận trọn vẹn không khí đặc biệt của bộ môn
đá gà
Hỗ trợ tích hợp nhiều nền tảng truyền phát: website, app di động, giúp truy cập
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
mọi lúc, mọi nơi.
Các loại hình đá gà campuchia trực tiếp phổ biến hiện nay
Tại Campuchia, truyền thống đá gà trải dài từ vùng quê đến các casino lớn ở biên giới với Việt Nam. Trong thời đại số hóa, các hình thức
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
chủ yếu có thể chia thành:
Phát sóng trực tiếp tại trường gà:
Truyền hình trực tiếp từ sới gà nổi tiếng qua các kênh được cấp phép.
Livestream trên các website cá cược:
Nơi người hâm mộ vừa thưởng thức trận đấu vừa có thể thử vận may qua các ván cược hấp dẫn.
Truyền hình trên mạng xã hội: Các nhóm yêu thích
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
thường xuyên cập nhật clip, livestream trận cầu mới nhất.
Làm sao để nhận diện kênh
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
uy tín?
Để đảm bảo xem được các trận
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
chất lượng đồng thời không gặp rủi ro về thông tin cá nhân, hãy chọn những nhà cái uy tín, được cộng đồng đánh giá cao và có giấy phép hoạt động hợp pháp.
Kinh nghiệm xem và cá cược
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
thành công
Dưới đây là một số lời khuyên giúp bạn vừa tận hưởng giờ phút kịch tính cùng
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
vừa có cơ hội thắng lớn:
Luôn kiểm tra thông tin về chiến kê, bài bản của từng đội tham gia trước trận đấu.
Phân tích lịch sử thi đấu, thể trạng gà và thời tiết để tiên đoán kết quả chính xác.
Chọn sàn cá cược có
phát sóng
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
rõ nét, bình luận viên hiểu biết để tiện theo dõi biến động tỷ lệ cược.
Sắp xếp thời gian hợp lý, không nên đặt cược quá đà mà hãy duy trì tâm lý tỉnh táo.
Mẹo nhỏ:
Khi theo dõi
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
, bạn có thể ghi chú lại lối đánh, sức bền của các chiến kê để áp dụng khi đặt cược ở các ván tiếp theo.
Lưu ý khi tham gia
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
Theo dõi
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
không chỉ đơn thuần là giải trí, đây còn là thú vui gắn với yếu tố may rủi. Nếu bạn muốn tham gia cá cược, hãy cân nhắc một số lưu ý để đảm bảo an toàn cho tài sản và thông tin cá nhân:
Chỉ đăng ký tài khoản tại các địa chỉ tin cậy, có chứng chỉ bảo mật mạng.
Không cung cấp mật khẩu, mã OTP cho bất kỳ ai, kể cả bạn bè, nhân viên hỗ trợ tự xưng.
Quản lý ngân sách cá nhân chặt chẽ, không vay mượn hoặc đặt cược vượt khả năng chi trả.
Cảnh giác với các đường link phát sóng
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
lạ, yêu cầu đăng nhập hoặc tải phần mềm không rõ nguồn gốc.
Những ưu điểm của
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
khiến người chơi ngày càng yêu thích
Bạn sẽ trải nghiệm cảm giác như đang có mặt tại trường gà lớn nhất Đông Nam Á.
Tỷ lệ trả thưởng hấp dẫn nhờ sự công khai minh bạch của hệ thống
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
.
Cộng đồng yêu thích
đá gà campuchia
nhiệt huyết, giao lưu, chia sẻ kinh nghiệm qua nhiều nền tảng khác nhau.
Xu hướng phát triển của
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
trong thời đại số
Với các ứng dụng công nghệ ngày càng hiện đại, xu hướng
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
sẽ ngày càng mở rộng hơn, đáp ứng nhu cầu giải trí và đam mê của nhiều thế hệ. Những trường gà hiện đại kết hợp cùng dịch vụ phát sóng HD, livestream đa nền tảng đã, đang thu hút lượng lớn khán giả trẻ vào bộ môn truyền thống này.
Đá gà campuchia trực tiếp – Kênh giải trí hợp pháp, an toàn
Rất nhiều người chơi đã và đang lựa chọn
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
tại các platform hợp pháp. Ngoài yếu tố giải trí, người tham gia còn có thể học hỏi thêm về nghệ thuật chăm sóc gà chiến, khám phá nét văn hóa đặc sắc của người Campuchia qua các màn bình luận sôi động. Tuy nhiên, bạn cũng cần nâng cao nhận thức để phòng tránh rủi ro từ các nguồn phát sóng không đáng tin cậy.
Bước đầu đăng ký và truy cập kênh
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
Truy cập vào website hoặc ứng dụng chính thức của nhà cái, cung cấp dịch vụ phát sóng trực tiếp.
Đăng ký tài khoản miễn phí, xác nhận thông tin cá nhân.
Chọn mục
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
và theo dõi các trận đấu hấp dẫn đang diễn ra.
Ngoài việc trực tiếp theo dõi, người chơi còn có thể trò chuyện, bình luận với cộng đồng, nhận khuyến mãi hấp dẫn từ đơn vị tổ chức.
Câu hỏi thường gặp về
đá gà campuchia trực tiếp
Đá gà campuchia trực tiếp có hợp pháp tại Việt Nam không?
Tại Việt Nam, các hình thức cá cược nói chung đều bị hạn chế. Tuy nhiên, phát sóng trực tiếp các trận đá gà Campuchia tại các trang web nước ngoài vẫn được nhiều người đam mê theo dõi, miễn là bạn chỉ xem giải trí, không cá cược trái phép.
Làm sao nhận biết trận đá gà campuchia trực tiếp nào minh bạch?
Bạn nên chọn các nhà cái uy tín, có kiểm định và công khai thông tin về sới gà, giải đấu, cũng như bình luận viên chuyên nghiệp đảm bảo phát sóng minh bạch và công bằng.
Có nên cá cược qua các trận đá gà campuchia trực tiếp?
Nếu bạn là người ham mê thể thao, cá cược qua các kênh hợp pháp, kiểm soát tốt tài chính thì đây vẫn là một lựa chọn giải trí hấp dẫn. Tuy nhiên, tuyệt đối không cá cược tại các trang web mập mờ, không rõ nguồn gốc để tránh bị lừa đảo hoặc mất dữ liệu cá nhân.

Địa chỉ email của bạn sẽ không được công bố. Các trường bắt buộc được đánh dấu

About us
New Saffron Kabob House Katy , serves the best and delicious Afghan vegan food in Katy, Texas , for a long time. Our place will bring you the most delicious vegetarian cuisine of your life with the best hospitality in a traditional Indian style. Visit our restaurant to get a taste of the best vegan and vegetarian food in Katy, Texas.

About the Business
Now an entirely new kind of experience awaits you in the heart of West Houston's energy corridor. In ten years we can boast by saying that no visit to Houston is complete without the memory of an exotic dinner at Ashiana. 

The new banquet room with a capacity of 150 people opened in June 2005. Ashiana's ambience is regarded as one of Houston's most charming and romantic spots to dine.

Authenticity     Home-Meal    Benevolence
​
Welcome to Uncle Chin's Kitchen, a family-run restaurant where we offer authenticity of
Malaysian/Singaporean comfort foods (home meal) and hospitality to all our guests.
Nasi Lemak (Roasted Hainanese or Curry Chicken)
A Malaysian national dish that comes with fragrant rice cooked in coconut milk, sambal sauce, roasted peanuts, cucumber slices, boiled egg, fried anchovies.
Char Kuey Teow (Stir-fry Flat Noodles)
Stir-fried flat noodles with shrimp, calamari, fish cake, onion, eggs, bean sprout and mix of soy sauce.
Roti Canai with Curry Chicken Sauce
Malaysian indian flatbread cooked on skillet and served with curry chicken dipping sauce.
Nasi Lemak (Roasted Hainanese or Curry Chicken)
