Announcements
**
IMPORTANT
:  We updated our business hours:
​
Monday:      11am to 8pm
Tuesday       Closed
Wednesday 11am to 8pm
Thursday     11am to 8pm
Friday          11am to 9pm
Saturday      Closed
Sunday        11am to 3pm.  5pm to 8pm.
​
​
​
​​
1.
We are excited to announce that we are serving
Malaysian Beef Rendang
every Friday only.
​
​
​
​
​
​
​
​​​​2
. Our team would like to give thanks to Yelp (Jando Shum) for organizing a
Yelp Elite Event
at our store on Tuesday, May 14, 2024. Thirty "Gold & Black" Badge elites were invited to the dinner. The following 8 course meal was served to all our special guests and everyone had a great time that night.
​
​
8 Course Meal includes
Chicken Satay Skewers
Roti with Curry Chicken Dipping Sauce
Char Kuey Teow
Roasted Hainanese Chicken & Rice
Beef Rendang
Kaya Puffs
Mango & Coconut Layered Pudding
"Pulled MIlk Tea"
​
​
​
Here's the link to view all our
perfect 5-Stars rated reviews
from all 30 reviewers.
​
​
​
Event summary written by Jando Shum (Yelp Senior Community Director):
​
​
​
"The Yelp Elite Event at Uncle Chin's in Katy, TX, celebrated Asian Pacific Islander Heritage Month as part of the HAPI (Houston Asian Pacific Islander) promotion. Yelp Elites enjoyed an intimate tasting of delicious Malaysian dishes, including beef rendang and Hainanese chicken, along with a variety of surprise menu items. The evening was made even more special with Uncle Chin himself serenading the crowd with surprise ballads, adding a personal and memorable touch to the culinary experience."
​
​
​
Event Description:
​
​
​
Welcome to Uncle Chin's Kitchen, where Malaysian flavors meet Texas hospitality in Katy, TX. At our establishment, we strive to offer an authentic taste of Malaysian cuisine, curated with care and passion. We've been recognized by the Houston Chronicle and Yelp as a Top 100 Restaurant in Texas, our commitment to quality and excellence is evident in every dish we serve. Join us for a culinary journey that celebrates tradition and innovation, all within the warm embrace of our inviting atmosphere.
​
​
​
​
What is Yelp Elite Event?
​
​
Elite Events are exclusive, in-person special gatherings open only to Yelp Elite Squad members (and in some instances, their guests). Community Events are open to the broader Yelp community. Anyone with a Yelp account may RSVP.
​
​
3. Our team is very excited to receive the "
People Loves Us on Yelp
" recognition from Yelp's CEO. We would like to give thanks to all of customers for the continuous support.
We wouldn't have been able to accomplish this without the support of our precious customers, friends, families, and team members.
4. Our team is incredibly thrilled to learn that the
Houston Chronicle
and
Yelp
have announced that Uncle Chin's Kitchen is featured in the
Top 100 Restaurants in the entire state of Texas.
We hold the
#62
position in all of Texas and
#14
in Houston. This news is absolutely fantastic for our entire team. We wouldn't have been able to accomplish this without the support of our precious customers, friends, families, and team members. We would like to say
THANK YOU
to all of you. Here are the links to the announcement:
​
​
Houston Chronicles
Best Texas Restaurant: Houston lands big on Yelp 2023 Ranking
Yelp
Top 100 Places to Eat in Texas 2023
5. We are now offering our homemade
Curry Chicken Puffs
and
Kaya (Homemade Coconut Jam) Puffs
where you can pre-order them and bake at home. Just follow the 3 simple steps below and you'll be able to enjoy the warmest and flakiest puffs at your own home:
Step 1
Thaw the puffs to room temperature.
Step 2
Pre-heat toasting oven to 375F. Beat an egg and brush on the puffs
Step 3
Bake the puffs for 20-23 mins (depending on the power of your oven)
Curry Chicken Puffs
Coconut Kaya Puffs

Uchi, "house" in Japanese, is founded by James Beard Award‑winning Chef Tyson Cole. A delicate balance of elevated food and impeccable service, Uchi offers non‑traditional Japanese cuisine with signature tastings, sushi, and seasonal omakase.

name: Huynh Restaurant
raw_text:
Vietnamese Restaurant in Houston, TX - Huynh Restaurant
Skip to content
Thank you for choosing Huynh!
Authentic Vietnamese Cuisine
“This is home-style Vietnamese cooking at its best.”
—Houston Chronicle, Critic’s Picks
.
Online ordering for pick-up or delivery from Huynh
Doordash
Call Huynh (713) 224-8964
Grubhub
Ubereats
A Family-Run Vietnamese Restaurant
Huynh is a family-run restaurant that serves homemade Vietnamese food in a comfortable urban atmosphere.
Huynh Restaurant has been in Houston for over 15 years. Our EaDo location, just behind the convention center, is easily accessed from 59 or downtown.
Our menu includes fresh spring rolls, rice plates, noodle bowls, stir-fry, hot soups, and other fresh traditional Vietnamese dishes.
Lunch Menu
Dinner Menu
Grilling out? Take-away our marinated meats for your grill:
Pork Chops: $10.95/lb
Beef Ribs: $12.95/lb
100 Restaurants America Can't Afford to Lose
Esquire, December 29, 2020
"... every one with any sense in Houston will tell you that for ten bucks, you're not going to find a more satisfying and delicious meal than the gingery, herbaceous duck salad known as Goi Vit."
https://www.esquire.com/food-drink/restaurants/a34864761/restaurants-america-covid-19-pandemic-service-industry/

Houston Chronicle, Critic's Picks
"the food here is made with much more care and talent than we've seen at other Vietnamese restaurants in town... despite Huynh's modern décor and its superb and sometimes creative take on standard Vietnamese dishes, the prices are completely in line with those of
its inferiors."
Fearless Critic, 2010 Houston Restaurant Guide
"Just when you thought that there was no hope for Old Chinatown, the Huynh family has opened one of the best Vietnamese restaurants in the city,
called Huynh."

House Specials
Green Onion Pancake 葱油饼
Our famous Green Onion Pancake is made with flaky dough layered with chopped scallions. Pan fried with scallion-infused oil to create a crispy texture.
Vegetarian
Spicy Beef Sandwich 大嘴牛肉包 (辣)
A freshly steamed bun packed with seasoned beef shank, fresh vegetables, and our spicy crushed pepper house sauce.
Spicy
Beef Sandwich 大嘴牛肉包 (不辣)
A freshly steamed bun packed with seasoned beef shank, fresh vegetables, and our savory house sauce.
Spicy Beef Pancake Roll 麻辣牛肉卷饼
Our Green Onion Pancake rolled into a wrap with seasoned beef shank, shredded lettuce, and our spicy crushed pepper house sauce.
Spicy
Beef Pancake Roll 酱香牛肉卷饼
Our Green Onion Pancake rolled into a wrap with seasoned beef shank, shredded lettuce, and our savory house sauce.
Pan Fried Chive Dumplings 韭菜盒子
Minced aromatic chives, egg, and glass noodles stuffed into a dumpling, pan fried for a crisp finish.
Pan Fried Beef Pies 牛肉馅饼
Juicy, seasoned beef wrapped in a savory crust and pan fried to perfection, served on a bed of shredded greens.
Five Spice Beef Shank 五香牛腱
Tender slices of braised beef shank seasoned with a fragrant blend of Five Spice, served cold with sliced cucumber.
Spicy Beef Shank 麻辣牛腱
Tender slices of braised beef shank seasoned with our mala spice blend, served cold with sliced green onion and cilantro.

Where We Started
Our Story
Qin Dynasty Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese and Japanese cuisine in Houston, TX. Qin Dynasty's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for dine-in or take-out meals in the Houston community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

What our customers say
Reviews
I highly recommend this place! The food, the atmosphere, and the service is great! Kevin was our waiter and he was the best! He made sure we were well taken care of.
Lisa Duran
Qin Dynasty is just amazing. My friends had Chinese food and I opted for sushi. The food was wonderful. And the prices were really good. Thank you. See you again!
Michelle
One of my favorite Chinese restaurants in the Houston area. The food is always fresh, delicious, quick and a great value. Everything on the menu is very good and made to order.
Bille Baty
First time to eat here in many years. Same delicious quality food and attentive service as usual. Hot and Sour soup is best in town. Lunch specials offer incredible choices.
Russell Adams
The place is clean. I ordered Unagi don and it tastes authentic!! I would say I have found my favourite spot for Asian food in Houston! Will definitely visit for the rolls next time!
Jessica Fung
I have been eating at this restaurant for years. I like that they use white meat chicken for dishes and good quality beef for my favorite beef with mushrooms and peppers.
Jim Gossen

Classic Dishes

Crab Rangoon
Nice & thick. Made from scratch & served with a side of herb based chili.
//
Street Bites
葱油饼 - Cōng yóubǐng
Scallion Pancake
Crisp & savory. Great for wrapping or dipping your favorite dish. Comes standard with sauce of choice.
//
Street Bites
左宗棠鸡 zuo zōngtáng jī
General Tso
Our General Tso is a deep, rich, sweet & savory, candied fried Chicken. Want to bump up the heat? Just say the word & we can make it medium spicy. It’s a crowd favorite. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
辣子鸡 la zī jī
Chongqing
One of the Szechuan inspired dishes on our menu. Think Ma (mouth numbing) & La (straight spicy), salty fried chicken pieces…delish! This house special goes great with beer & tea. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
蒜炒四季豆 Suàn chǎo sìjì dòu
Garlic 4 Season Green Beans
Classic Chinese style long green beans stir fried in a light savory sauce with plenty of garlic & julienned cut onions. Add any protein of your choice. Recommended with Beef, Chicken or Tofu. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
No Protein
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
甜酸鸡 tián suān jī
Sweet & Sour
With notes of sour plum our Sweet & Sour Chicken is served with grilled red & green bell peppers, onion & pineapple. It’s a classic & delish! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
茄子“和四季豆 qiézi hé sìji dòu
Eggplant Green Bean
This Chinese Eggplant & Greenbeans dish is lightly stir fried with green beans, eggplant & fresh garlic. A take on the Szechuan classic, it can be made regular or spicy, & pairs amazing with any other dish on the menu. Great for sharing!
//
Classic Dishes
//
No Protein
橘子鸡 juzi jī
Orange
Our Orange Chicken is stir fried with grilled bell peppers, onion & mandarin oranges. It is then topped with a fresh orange slice & dehydrated orange sprinkles. Citrus forward & sweet, this dish is great spicy! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
芝麻鸡 zhīma jī
Sesame
Sweet in flavor with hints of toasted sesame seed, our Sesame Chicken is tossed with grilled bell peppers & onion. Sesame caramelizes in the wok to give you a candied flavor second to none! Try it spicy! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
宫保鸡  gōng báo jī
Kung Pao
Our old school Kung Pao is stir fried with red & green bell pepper, celery, peppers & peanuts. We recommend with Chicken like the O.G., however you can make it with Shrimp or Beef! Being savory & spicy, we highly recommend with fried rice or noodle upgrade. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
咖喱鸡 galí jī
Curry
Thick with strong notes of coconut & fresh lemon grass, our Curry is stir fried with sweet potatoes, steamed carrots & cilantro, then topped with a fresh lime wedge & cilantro. Can be made with Tofu or Cauliflower. This dish unfortunately cannot be made 100% Vegetarian/Vegan.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
青椒牛肉 qīngjiāo niúròu
Pepper Steak
Our Pepper Steak is seared, then stir fried with bell pepper, onions & carrots. It has deep notes of sesame & is fantastic spicy! Great with Chicken, Shrimp, or Tofu too.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
芥藍牛肉 jièlán niúroù
Chinese Broccoli
An old school classic, our Chinese Broccoli Beef is stir fried with Chinese broccoli & white onions in a light savory sauce. If Chinese broccoli is not your thing, you can swap for English style broccoli florets. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
蒙古牛肉 ménggu niúròu
Mongolian
Wok-fired with white onions, scallions, & snow peas our Mongolian/Emperor stir fry is one of the most versatile items on our menu. While we recommend Beef, you can also choose Chicken, Shrimp, Tofu, or Cauliflower & get an equally great dish. Light, savory, & vegetable forward!
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
孜然牛肉 zī rán niúròu
Cumin
Light aromatic spiced beef & comes standard with white onion & green onion. This dish is a house special & the vegetables CANNOT be modified. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Tofu
橙皮牛肉 chéng pí niúròu
Orange Peeled Beef
Citrus, Candied, Beef — need we say more? Insanely tasty & addicting! This house specialty CANNOT be modified.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
奶油虾  nai yóu xiā
Candied Walnut Shrimp
Think pillowy fried shrimp tossed in a delicious sweet honey glaze. We then top the shrimp generously with candied walnuts. It’s dreamy.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Shrimp
小白菜  xiǎobáicài
Baby Bok Choy
Baby Bok Choy is a light, crisp savory classic with garlic that is a great side veggie to any dish on the menu. If you are feeling vegetables today, then this dish is for you. So good.
//
Classic Dishes
//
No Protein
,
Shrimp
麻婆豆腐 mápó dòufu
Mapo Tofu
Chengdu style Mapo Tofu（麻婆豆腐）with minced 44 Farms Beef. An absolute perfect pairing with any spicy selection on The Rice Box menu. Think Ma (mouth numbing) & La (straight spicy)—the dish brings the heat! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Minced Beef
,
No Protein
鱼香茄子  Yú xiāng qiézi
Garlic Eggplant
A crowd favorite & sleeper hit at The Rice Box, so dang good. A perfect blend of sweet & savory with a bit of tang & spice. Comes standard with minced 44 Farms Beef & pairs with anything on the menu.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Eggplant
,
Minced Beef
,
No Protein
,
Vegetable
炒饭 chǎofàn
House Fried Rice
Our house fried rice is a crowd favorite & a classic dish. Fresh off the wok, it’s made with bean sprouts, egg, & chives. You can also add Beef, Chicken, or Shrimp.
//
Fried Rice
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Chinese Sausage
,

扬州炒饭 Yángzhōu chǎofàn
Yang Chow Fried Rice
Yang Chow (Yangzhou) style fried rice is light & aromatic, & soy sauce free. We recommend adding a combination of Shrimp & Chinese sausage for our non-vegetarian guests.
//
Fried Rice

Curry Fried Rice
Fresh off the wok with bean sprouts, egg, chives & cilantro, our curry fried rice has notes of coconut & lemongrass. Level up by adding Beef, Chicken, or Shrimp.
//
Fried Rice

炒河粉 chao fēn
Chow Fun
Freshly made rice noodles stir fried with egg, bean sprouts and green onion. Our play on the famous street food from the mainland. Recommended with beef, but is fantastic with all proteins. Make it spicy!
//
Noodles

1lb (4-5 RIBS)

Sauce on the Side
,

Salt N Pepper Ribs
(Breaded)
Dry wokked in our house Salt N Pepper blend & served with a side of our herb based sweet chili. Thick, juicy, & tasty.
1lb (4-5 RIBS)

Ribs

,

Chongqing Ribs
(Breaded)
Dry wokked in our house made Szechuan spice! A perfect blend of heat & mouth numbing goodness. Thick, juicy, & tasty.
1lb (4-5 RIBS)
//
Ribs

Sauce on the Side
,
Tossed
鸡翅膀 ji chi bang
Wings
6 Jumbo Wings marinated in a dry rub & served naked. Wings are made to order so they come out piping hot & juicy. Choose one of our sauces for dunking on the side, or tossed with the wings. We recommend first timers getting wings naked with a side of our herb based sweet chili. PRO TIP: If you opt for General Tso or Sesame sauce, get them tossed!
//
Wings
//
Sauce on the Side
,
Tossed
Salt N Pepper Wings
(Breaded)
6 Jumbo Wings marinated in a dry rub & are dry wokked with our house Salt N Pepper blend. Wings are made to order so they come out piping hot & juicy. Served standard with a side of our house made herb based sweet chili!
//
Wings
//
Chicken
Chongqing Wings
(Breaded)
6 Jumbo Wings dry wokked in our housemade Szechuan spice, providing a perfect blend of heat & mouth numbing goodness! Wings are made to order so they come out piping hot & juicy.
//
Wings

Chicken
Salt N Pepper Stacks
Our Salt N Pepper Stacks are SUPER GOOD. Dry fried with bell pepper, green & white onions, they pair with just about anything on the menu! Comes standard with a side of our herb based sweet chili. Choose from Chicken, Tofu, Cauliflower, or Eggplant.

House Specials
Green Onion Pancake 葱油饼
Our famous Green Onion Pancake is made with flaky dough layered with chopped scallions. Pan fried with scallion-infused oil to create a crispy texture.
Vegetarian
Spicy Beef Sandwich 大嘴牛肉包 (辣)
A freshly steamed bun packed with seasoned beef shank, fresh vegetables, and our spicy crushed pepper house sauce.
Spicy
Beef Sandwich 大嘴牛肉包 (不辣)
A freshly steamed bun packed with seasoned beef shank, fresh vegetables, and our savory house sauce.
Spicy Beef Pancake Roll 麻辣牛肉卷饼
Our Green Onion Pancake rolled into a wrap with seasoned beef shank, shredded lettuce, and our spicy crushed pepper house sauce.
Spicy
Beef Pancake Roll 酱香牛肉卷饼
Our Green Onion Pancake rolled into a wrap with seasoned beef shank, shredded lettuce, and our savory house sauce.
Pan Fried Chive Dumplings 韭菜盒子
Minced aromatic chives, egg, and glass noodles stuffed into a dumpling, pan fried for a crisp finish.
Pan Fried Beef Pies 牛肉馅饼
Juicy, seasoned beef wrapped in a savory crust and pan fried to perfection, served on a bed of shredded greens.
Five Spice Beef Shank 五香牛腱
Tender slices of braised beef shank seasoned with a fragrant blend of Five Spice, served cold with sliced cucumber.
Spicy Beef Shank 麻辣牛腱
Tender slices of braised beef shank seasoned with our mala spice blend, served cold with sliced green onion and cilantro.

Where We Started
Our Story
Shanghai Inn Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine in Houston, TX. Shanghai Inn's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for dine-in or take-out meals in the Houston community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

What our customers say
Reviews
We have been ordering from Shanghai Inn and have been SO impressed with the food! This place is a real winner!
Lauren G.
The food is very good very hot.  Went for lunch and it was wonderful.  Not a fancy restaurant but very yummy.
P H.
I will happily risk the headache of 290 traffic to eat here. Everything is delicious, portions are large.
Kerri M.
Incredible food. Good prices. Generous portions.My go-to spot for years! The best option in the area!

Best Chinese food. Sets the standard for fried rice. Been coming here for years and plan on continuing to do so.

All
Classic Dishes
Fried Rice
Noodles
Ribs
Soups
Street Bites
Teas
Wings
Crab Rangoon
Nice & thick. Made from scratch & served with a side of herb based chili.
//
Street Bites
葱油饼 - Cōng yóubǐng
Scallion Pancake
Crisp & savory. Great for wrapping or dipping your favorite dish. Comes standard with sauce of choice.
//
Street Bites
左宗棠鸡 zuo zōngtáng jī
General Tso
Our General Tso is a deep, rich, sweet & savory, candied fried Chicken. Want to bump up the heat? Just say the word & we can make it medium spicy. It’s a crowd favorite. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
辣子鸡 la zī jī
Chongqing
One of the Szechuan inspired dishes on our menu. Think Ma (mouth numbing) & La (straight spicy), salty fried chicken pieces…delish! This house special goes great with beer & tea. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
蒜炒四季豆 Suàn chǎo sìjì dòu
Garlic 4 Season Green Beans
Classic Chinese style long green beans stir fried in a light savory sauce with plenty of garlic & julienned cut onions. Add any protein of your choice. Recommended with Beef, Chicken or Tofu. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
No Protein
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
甜酸鸡 tián suān jī
Sweet & Sour
With notes of sour plum our Sweet & Sour Chicken is served with grilled red & green bell peppers, onion & pineapple. It’s a classic & delish! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
茄子“和四季豆 qiézi hé sìji dòu
Eggplant Green Bean
This Chinese Eggplant & Greenbeans dish is lightly stir fried with green beans, eggplant & fresh garlic. A take on the Szechuan classic, it can be made regular or spicy, & pairs amazing with any other dish on the menu. Great for sharing!
//
Classic Dishes
//
No Protein
橘子鸡 juzi jī
Orange
Our Orange Chicken is stir fried with grilled bell peppers, onion & mandarin oranges. It is then topped with a fresh orange slice & dehydrated orange sprinkles. Citrus forward & sweet, this dish is great spicy! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
芝麻鸡 zhīma jī
Sesame
Sweet in flavor with hints of toasted sesame seed, our Sesame Chicken is tossed with grilled bell peppers & onion. Sesame caramelizes in the wok to give you a candied flavor second to none! Try it spicy! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
宫保鸡  gōng báo jī
Kung Pao
Our old school Kung Pao is stir fried with red & green bell pepper, celery, peppers & peanuts. We recommend with Chicken like the O.G., however you can make it with Shrimp or Beef! Being savory & spicy, we highly recommend with fried rice or noodle upgrade. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
咖喱鸡 galí jī
Curry
Thick with strong notes of coconut & fresh lemon grass, our Curry is stir fried with sweet potatoes, steamed carrots & cilantro, then topped with a fresh lime wedge & cilantro. Can be made with Tofu or Cauliflower. This dish unfortunately cannot be made 100% Vegetarian/Vegan.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
青椒牛肉 qīngjiāo niúròu
Pepper Steak
Our Pepper Steak is seared, then stir fried with bell pepper, onions & carrots. It has deep notes of sesame & is fantastic spicy! Great with Chicken, Shrimp, or Tofu too.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
芥藍牛肉 jièlán niúroù
Chinese Broccoli
An old school classic, our Chinese Broccoli Beef is stir fried with Chinese broccoli & white onions in a light savory sauce. If Chinese broccoli is not your thing, you can swap for English style broccoli florets. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
蒙古牛肉 ménggu niúròu
Mongolian
Wok-fired with white onions, scallions, & snow peas our Mongolian/Emperor stir fry is one of the most versatile items on our menu. While we recommend Beef, you can also choose Chicken, Shrimp, Tofu, or Cauliflower & get an equally great dish. Light, savory, & vegetable forward!
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
孜然牛肉 zī rán niúròu
Cumin
Light aromatic spiced beef & comes standard with white onion & green onion. This dish is a house special & the vegetables CANNOT be modified. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Tofu
橙皮牛肉 chéng pí niúròu
Orange Peeled Beef
Citrus, Candied, Beef — need we say more? Insanely tasty & addicting! This house specialty CANNOT be modified.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
奶油虾  nai yóu xiā
Candied Walnut Shrimp
Think pillowy fried shrimp tossed in a delicious sweet honey glaze. We then top the shrimp generously with candied walnuts. It’s dreamy.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Shrimp
小白菜  xiǎobáicài
Baby Bok Choy
Baby Bok Choy is a light, crisp savory classic with garlic that is a great side veggie to any dish on the menu. If you are feeling vegetables today, then this dish is for you. So good.
//
Classic Dishes
//
No Protein
,
Shrimp
麻婆豆腐 mápó dòufu
Mapo Tofu
Chengdu style Mapo Tofu（麻婆豆腐）with minced 44 Farms Beef. An absolute perfect pairing with any spicy selection on The Rice Box menu. Think Ma (mouth numbing) & La (straight spicy)—the dish brings the heat! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes

name: Fat Bao
raw_text:
Fat Bao Houston
top of page
HOME
MENU
ORDER ONLINE
CONTACT US
FRANCHISE
More...
Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
BAO CHICKA BOW WOW
OUR KITCHEN
All natural
Back in the summer of 2012, two high school friends teamed up to answer the question, "what is the tastiest ingredient we can stuff inside these steamed buns?"
They worked day and night searching for the perfect combination.  Crab and coleslaw?  Banana and Nutella?  How far outside the box could they go?
After several long months of trial and error, Fat Bao Kirby opened its doors in December 2012.
Thank you for all the continued support!
We could not have done it without you!
WHAT'S NEW
HOW A BAO THAT!

About
Our chefs specialize in authentic and delicious Chinese food. The staff at Heights Asian Cafe is devoted to serving customers mouthwatering dishes that feature the highest quality ingredients available. Chicken Pho, Beef Ball Pho and Veggie Pho are all prepared quickly and delivered to you right away.
Heights Asian Cafe uses only the freshest ingredients around, ensuring that every dish is of the highest possible quality. Not sure what you're in the mood for? Try one of our specialties including Extra Pho Veggie , Shrimp Pho, Veggie Noodle Soup, Asian Style Beef Noodle Soup (Copy), and more.

About the Business
Business owner information
David Y.
Manager
In the heart of Houston's Chinatown, we've been serving traditional Cantonese food since 2002, and our chef-made dishes are staying true to their cultural origins with bold flavors and fried finishes. Our most popular dish is our black pepper lobster, and our regulars can't get enough of it! Speaking of regulars, we've built a community of them, and they'er the reason we're so committed to making improvements while maintaining the traditional flavors we're known for.

name: Mannie's Seafood
raw_text:
Mannie's Seafood Menu: Discover Fresh and Flavorful Seafood Delights
Featured Picks by Goto-Place
Trending & Popular Listings
What Locals Say
Join the Goto-Place Newsletter
Mannie's Seafood Menu
Overview
Photos
Menu
Reviews
Location
Price Range
$10–20
Welcome to Mannie's Seafood, a hidden gem nestled at 8520 Gulf Fwy in Houston. This casual seafood restaurant specializes in delivering fresh, vibrant flavors reminiscent of coastal dining. Their menu is a delightful blend of appetizers and hearty entrees, showcasing the best of the sea.
Appetizers:
Indulge in the Buffalo Shrimp or Fried Squid, perfect for sharing before your main course.
Main Courses:
Customers rave about the fried or grilled red snapper and hearty lunch specials, like fried shrimp served with sweet shrimp fried rice.
Salads:
The Grilled Shrimp Salad and the light House Garden Salad provide refreshing options for those seeking a lighter meal.
Accompanied by refreshing drinks, including their famous Frozen Margarita, Mannie's Seafood promises an inviting atmosphere and generous portions, making it a must-visit for seafood lovers.

Home

T & T Seafood Menu
Home
Menu
Welcome to
T & T Seafood
, a hidden gem located at 7013 N Shepherd Dr in Houston, TX. This cash-only establishment has garnered a passionate following for its exceptional seafood offerings within a vibrant, neighborhood atmosphere.
What sets T & T Seafood apart? Their menu features an array of dishes that consistently impress, from delicious fried rice to expertly seasoned shrimp and fish. Vegetarian options are also available, ensuring there’s something for everyone.
Takeout & Delivery:
Perfect for those on the go, T & T prioritizes convenience.
Community Feel:
Dogs are welcome, and the moderate noise level makes it a great spot for groups.
Fresh Ingredients:
Customers rave about the freshness of the seafood, with the option to purchase live fish that they’ll fry for you.
Though it might be a little chaotic, a visit to T & T Seafood promises delectable flavors that will keep you coming back.

Gyu-Kaku Japanese BBQ
Menu
Menu for Gyu-Kaku Japanese BBQ
Gyu-Combo To-Go
Gyu-Combo 2
The closest you can get to the Gyu-Kaku yakiniku experience without grilling the meat yourself. Customize your meal! Select two proteins as single or double portions, two marinades, and rice portion. Includes Miso Soup, White Rice, and a Set Salad.
$14.00
Gyu-Combo 3
The closest you can get to the Gyu-Kaku yakiniku experience without grilling the meat yourself. Customize your meal! Select three proteins as single or double portions, three marinades, and rice portion. Includes Miso Soup, White Rice, and a Set Salad.
2 photos
$18.00
Gyu-Bowls To-Go
Crunchy Garlic Shrimp Noodles (GAH)
Crunchy Garlic Shrimp atop thick Japanese noodles stir-fried with sliced garlic, crunchy chili garlic oil, butter, and soy sauce. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds. Mildly spicy.
3 reviews
$14.00
Garlic Shoyu Chicken Noodles (GAH)
Thick Japanese noodles stir-fried with chicken, sliced garlic, butter, and soy sauce. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds.
$13.00
Beef Sukiyaki Fried Rice Bowl (GAH)
Our signature thin-sliced Sukiyaki-marinated beef stir-fried with white rice, egg yolk, mushrooms, and sliced onions. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds.
3 reviews
3 photos
$13.00
Beyond Beef Rice Bowl (GAH)
Our beloved Sukiyaki Bibimbap goes BEYOND. 100% plant-based Beyond Beef is marinated in our secret Sukiyaki sauce and stir fried with mushrooms, diced red bell peppers, and sliced white onions. Served over rice. Topped with chopped green onions and sesame seeds. Also contains butter and sesame oil. Picture for visualization purposes only. Beyond Bibimbap will arrive pre-mixed.
1 review
$13.00
Fried Chicken Karaage Rice Bowl (GAH)
Japanese Fried Chicken Karaage on a bed of white rice and shredded cabbage. Topped with Japanese Chili Mayo and chopped green onions.
9 reviews
5 photos
$13.00
Garlic Fried Rice Bowl (GAH)
Our Garlic Fried Rice features white rice stir-fried with egg yolk, sliced onions, sliced garlic. Seasoned with a combination of our Shio Soy Sauce, butter, sesame oil, and black pepper. Topped with chopped green onions and fried garlic chips.
17 reviews
16 photos
$10.50
Roast Beef Rice Bowl (GAH)
Premium roast beef on a bed of mixed greens and steamed rice. Topped with white and green onions, Signature soy-based barbecue sauce, and kuki wasabi.
$14.00
Spicy Beef Rice Bowl (GAH)
Beef rib meat and rice dowsed in our signature Umakara Sauce and mixed with an assortment of bell pepper, shishito pepper, and corn, then garnished with sesame, green onions, and chili flakes.
$13.00
Umakara Beef Rice Bowl (GAH)
Thin-sliced Yakishabu beef marinated in our sweet & spicy Umakara sauce with sliced onions on a bed of white rice and shredded cabbage. Topped with chopped green onions and sesame seeds.
9 reviews
5 photos
$13.00
Gyu-Ramen To-Go
Spicy Beef Ramen (GAH)
Gyu-Kaku original recipe: Japanese BBQ meets Ramen! Rich kalbi beef soup and medium thickness ramen noodles topped with thin-sliced beef, boiled egg, green onions, spinach, daikon radish, and sesame seeds. Ramen noodles and hot soup are packaged separately to maintain their maximum deliciousness. Please reheat soup in the microwave (if necessary) and pour over noodles.
1 review
2 photos
$12.00
Tonkotsu Ramen (GAH)
Our Tonkotsu pork bone ramen comes with chunky, fatty braised pork belly Kakuni chashu and is topped with hard-boiled egg, chopped green onions, diced red bell peppers, and sesame seeds. Ramen noodles and hot soup are packaged separately to maintain their maximum deliciousness. Please reheat soup in the microwave (if necessary) and pour over noodles.
$12.00
Goma Negi Shio Ramen (GAH)
Beef and shio-based soup with medium-thick ramen noodles and thick braised pork belly Kakuni chashu. Toppings also include boiled egg, green onion, and sesame seeds. Ramen noodles and hot soup are packaged separately to maintain their maximum deliciousness. Please reheat soup in the microwave (if necessary) and pour over noodles.
1 review
1 photo
$12.00
Gyu For All!
Gyu-Family Meal for All
We have put together some of our fan favorites to create a well-balance meal that feeds four. Substitutions respectfully declined. Includes: 1x Gyu-Combo with 7 oz Yaki-shabu Beef in Miso, 1x Gyu-Combo with 7 oz Toro Beef in Sweet Soy Tare, 1x Beef Sukiyaki Fried Rice, 1x Garlic Shoyu Chicken Noodles, 1x Black Pepper Wings, 1x Fried Pork Gyoza, 1x Gyu-Kaku Salad, 1x Edamame, and 1x Napa Kimchi
5 photos
$76.00
MEGA Beef Sukiyaki Fried Rice
A TRIPLE SERVING of our Crowd Favorite: Sukiyaki Fried Rice with Beef. Serves 3-5 people. Our signature thin-sliced Sukiyaki-marinated beef stir-fried with white rice, egg yolk, mushrooms, and sliced onions. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green Onions, and sesame seeds.
2 photos
$29.95
MEGA Garlic Shoyu Chicken Noodles
A TRIPLE SERVING of our Crowd Favorite: Mega Garlic Noodles with Chicken. Serves 3-5 people. Thick Japanese noodles stir-fried with chicken, sliced garlic, butter, and soy sauce. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds.
$29.95

1 photo
$7.45

$7.45

Multi-sensational American Chinese food from the retro future.
MENUS VARY BY LOCATION

Classic Dishes

Noodles

Street Bites

All
Classic Dishes
Fried Rice
Noodles
Ribs
Soups
Street Bites
Teas
Wings
Crab Rangoon
Nice & thick. Made from scratch & served with a side of herb based chili.
//
Street Bites
葱油饼 - Cōng yóubǐng
Scallion Pancake
Crisp & savory. Great for wrapping or dipping your favorite dish. Comes standard with sauce of choice.
//
Street Bites
左宗棠鸡 zuo zōngtáng jī
General Tso
Our General Tso is a deep, rich, sweet & savory, candied fried Chicken. Want to bump up the heat? Just say the word & we can make it medium spicy. It’s a crowd favorite. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
辣子鸡 la zī jī
Chongqing
One of the Szechuan inspired dishes on our menu. Think Ma (mouth numbing) & La (straight spicy), salty fried chicken pieces…delish! This house special goes great with beer & tea. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
蒜炒四季豆 Suàn chǎo sìjì dòu
Garlic 4 Season Green Beans
Classic Chinese style long green beans stir fried in a light savory sauce with plenty of garlic & julienned cut onions. Add any protein of your choice. Recommended with Beef, Chicken or Tofu. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
No Protein
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
甜酸鸡 tián suān jī
Sweet & Sour
With notes of sour plum our Sweet & Sour Chicken is served with grilled red & green bell peppers, onion & pineapple. It’s a classic & delish! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
茄子“和四季豆 qiézi hé sìji dòu
Eggplant Green Bean
This Chinese Eggplant & Greenbeans dish is lightly stir fried with green beans, eggplant & fresh garlic. A take on the Szechuan classic, it can be made regular or spicy, & pairs amazing with any other dish on the menu. Great for sharing!
//
Classic Dishes
//
No Protein
橘子鸡 juzi jī
Orange
Our Orange Chicken is stir fried with grilled bell peppers, onion & mandarin oranges. It is then topped with a fresh orange slice & dehydrated orange sprinkles. Citrus forward & sweet, this dish is great spicy! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
芝麻鸡 zhīma jī
Sesame
Sweet in flavor with hints of toasted sesame seed, our Sesame Chicken is tossed with grilled bell peppers & onion. Sesame caramelizes in the wok to give you a candied flavor second to none! Try it spicy! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Tofu
宫保鸡  gōng báo jī
Kung Pao
Our old school Kung Pao is stir fried with red & green bell pepper, celery, peppers & peanuts. We recommend with Chicken like the O.G., however you can make it with Shrimp or Beef! Being savory & spicy, we highly recommend with fried rice or noodle upgrade. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
咖喱鸡 galí jī
Curry
Thick with strong notes of coconut & fresh lemon grass, our Curry is stir fried with sweet potatoes, steamed carrots & cilantro, then topped with a fresh lime wedge & cilantro. Can be made with Tofu or Cauliflower. This dish unfortunately cannot be made 100% Vegetarian/Vegan.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
青椒牛肉 qīngjiāo niúròu
Pepper Steak
Our Pepper Steak is seared, then stir fried with bell pepper, onions & carrots. It has deep notes of sesame & is fantastic spicy! Great with Chicken, Shrimp, or Tofu too.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
芥藍牛肉 jièlán niúroù
Chinese Broccoli
An old school classic, our Chinese Broccoli Beef is stir fried with Chinese broccoli & white onions in a light savory sauce. If Chinese broccoli is not your thing, you can swap for English style broccoli florets. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
蒙古牛肉 ménggu niúròu
Mongolian
Wok-fired with white onions, scallions, & snow peas our Mongolian/Emperor stir fry is one of the most versatile items on our menu. While we recommend Beef, you can also choose Chicken, Shrimp, Tofu, or Cauliflower & get an equally great dish. Light, savory, & vegetable forward!
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Shrimp
,
Tofu
孜然牛肉 zī rán niúròu
Cumin
Light aromatic spiced beef & comes standard with white onion & green onion. This dish is a house special & the vegetables CANNOT be modified. Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
,
Tofu
橙皮牛肉 chéng pí niúròu
Orange Peeled Beef
Citrus, Candied, Beef — need we say more? Insanely tasty & addicting! This house specialty CANNOT be modified.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Beef
奶油虾  nai yóu xiā
Candied Walnut Shrimp
Think pillowy fried shrimp tossed in a delicious sweet honey glaze. We then top the shrimp generously with candied walnuts. It’s dreamy.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Shrimp
小白菜  xiǎobáicài
Baby Bok Choy
Baby Bok Choy is a light, crisp savory classic with garlic that is a great side veggie to any dish on the menu. If you are feeling vegetables today, then this dish is for you. So good.
//
Classic Dishes
//
No Protein
,
Shrimp
麻婆豆腐 mápó dòufu
Mapo Tofu
Chengdu style Mapo Tofu（麻婆豆腐）with minced 44 Farms Beef. An absolute perfect pairing with any spicy selection on The Rice Box menu. Think Ma (mouth numbing) & La (straight spicy)—the dish brings the heat! Make it Vegetarian by choosing Tofu or Cauliflower as your protein base.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Minced Beef
,
No Protein
鱼香茄子  Yú xiāng qiézi
Garlic Eggplant
A crowd favorite & sleeper hit at The Rice Box, so dang good. A perfect blend of sweet & savory with a bit of tang & spice. Comes standard with minced 44 Farms Beef & pairs with anything on the menu.
//
Classic Dishes
//
Eggplant
,
Minced Beef
,
No Protein
,
Vegetable
炒饭 chǎofàn
House Fried Rice
Our house fried rice is a crowd favorite & a classic dish. Fresh off the wok, it’s made with bean sprouts, egg, & chives. You can also add Beef, Chicken, or Shrimp.
//
Fried Rice
//
Beef
,
Cauliflower
,
Chicken
,
Chinese Sausage
,

,

扬州炒饭 Yángzhōu chǎofàn
Yang Chow Fried Rice
Yang Chow (Yangzhou) style fried rice is light & aromatic, & soy sauce free. We recommend adding a combination of Shrimp & Chinese sausage for our non-vegetarian guests.
//
Fried Rice
//

,

Fresh off the wok with bean sprouts, egg, chives & cilantro, our curry fried rice has notes of coconut & lemongrass. Level up by adding Beef, Chicken, or Shrimp.
//

Chow Fun
Freshly made rice noodles stir fried with egg, bean sprouts and green onion. Our play on the famous street food from the mainland. Recommended with beef, but is fantastic with all proteins. Make it spicy!

Sauce on the Side
,

Salt N Pepper Ribs
(Breaded)

1lb (4-5 RIBS)

Ribs

,

Chongqing Ribs
(Breaded)
Dry wokked in our house made Szechuan spice! A perfect blend of heat & mouth numbing goodness. Thick, juicy, & tasty.
1lb (4-5 RIBS)
//
Ribs
//
Sauce on the Side
,
Tossed
鸡翅膀 ji chi bang
Wings
6 Jumbo Wings marinated in a dry rub & served naked. Wings are made to order so they come out piping hot & juicy. Choose one of our sauces for dunking on the side, or tossed with the wings. We recommend first timers getting wings naked with a side of our herb based sweet chili. PRO TIP: If you opt for General Tso or Sesame sauce, get them tossed!
//
Wings
//
Sauce on the Side
,
Tossed
Salt N Pepper Wings
(Breaded)
6 Jumbo Wings marinated in a dry rub & are dry wokked with our house Salt N Pepper blend. Wings are made to order so they come out piping hot & juicy. Served standard with a side of our house made herb based sweet chili!
//
Wings

Chicken
Chongqing Wings
(Breaded)
6 Jumbo Wings dry wokked in our housemade Szechuan spice, providing a perfect blend of heat & mouth numbing goodness! Wings are made to order so they come out piping hot & juicy.
//
Wings

Chicken
Salt N Pepper Stacks
Our Salt N Pepper Stacks are SUPER GOOD. Dry fried with bell pepper, green & white onions, they pair with just about anything on the menu! Comes standard with a side of our herb based sweet chili. Choose from Chicken, Tofu, Cauliflower, or Eggplant.

name: Vietopia
raw_text:

About Us
Catering

Contact Us
713-664-7303
Select Page
Vietopia
Authentic & Fusion Vietnamese Cuisine
Order Online
Your new favorite restaurant
Authentically Vietnamese, Uniquely Houston
Since 1999, our family owned, and operated Vietnamese restaurant has continued to offer Houstians one of the best dining experiences in the city. With a blend of authentic and Asian infused offerings, we know you’re going to discover a new favorite dish every time you visit.
View our Menu
Dining Options
Great food should be enjoyed wherever you are. So, whether you’re ready to enjoy our beautiful restaurant, a relaxing night in at home, or you need to entertain, we’ve got you covered.
View Menu
Dine-In
Our soft lighting, sweeping, multi-layer patio, and high, slow-motion ceiling fans create an elegant, upscale experience for you to enjoy. Vietopia is the perfect spot for a light, flavorful lunch, or for a romantic night out on the town.
Carryout
We understand that sometimes it makes sense to enjoy the comforts of your own home. Our team will make sure your order is packaged properly so it can survive the car ride and be enjoyed immediately after getting home.
Catering
Feeding a large group doesn’t have to be stressful. Leave all the cooking to us! We offer a variety of catering options so you can ensure everyone will love what you order.
Testimonials
"This was the first time we had been here. It was recommended by our other friends who we were meeting for dinner. The food is excellent. It is very flavorful, and can be spicier if you want. The dinner was enjoyable, and we will be back....."
Joseph F
Customer
"I have a special place in my heart for Vietopia. I've been going for more than 15 yrs. The food is always delicious, customer service always impeccable, & the owner is amazing - much respect for a female restaurateur."
Kimsu H.
Customer
"The staff is very friendly and the food is out of this world amazing. I love this place so much 100% recommend"
Abilene S.
Customer
Online Ordering
You’re only a few taps or clicks away from ordering your favorite dishes. Submit your online order and we’ll start making it right away (assuming you don’t want to pick it up at a later time).
Order Online

Miyabi Sushi JapaneseRestaurant offers delicious tasting Japanese cuisine and the freshest sushi in Houston, TX.  Miyabi Sushi's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for dine-in, take-out meals in the Houston community. Our restaurant is known for its variety in taste and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.
WE DELIVER. No Registration Required. Order Online!

1205 Main Street, Seabrook, TX 77586  |  For Reservations 281.385.9975

$5.00 House Wine...
Menus
Menu
Wine Menu
Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday & Sunday
Friday/ Saturday
Kitchen Closes at 10pm.  Bar Open 12AM
Kitchen closes at 11pm. Bar open until 12AM/2AM
Proper Attire Required
no hats, cut offs, tank tops in the main dining rooms
One recent patron said,
"We had the most wonderful evening in this charming 1920's cottage by the Merlion Lagoon. We went to our first wine tasting dinner - Incredible! The lamb was succulent as was the Kobe beef. The waiters were gracious, fun and most of all extremely knowledgeable. The wine list is superb and they have chosen wines from all over the world. We had lived in Thailand for many years and my husband & I both agree that the food is, by far, one of the best you will ever eat!"
© 2025 Merlion Thai Restaurant & Lounge. All Rights Reserved.

Appetizers
A-1 Fresh Soft Spring Rolls (V)
, two large rice paper rolls stuffed with sliced green leaf lettuce, carrot and cucumber served with Mammaâs peanut dipping sauce
- Choice of Veggie, Chicken, Pork or Fried Tofu
- Shrimp

- Minced Mix of Pork, Shrimp, Crab & Veggies (4 pc)

(8 pc)

(3 sliced links) with fresh sliced ginger, Thai chili, lime wedges & roasted peanuts
- Sai Krok Esan â Esan-style Ground mix of soured pork, rice, garlic, pepper

A-19 Kai Jeow
- Three Egg Thai Omlette with thinly sliced red onion, scallions and cilantro
â Kai Jeow Moo Saap â adds minced pork
Thai Soups
S-1 Tom Yum Tofu
- Soft tofu cubes with chili oil, tomato, baby corn, mushroom, lemon grass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves topped with chopped cilantro and scallions
S-2 Tom Yum Gai
- Sliced chicken breast with chili oil, tomato, baby corn, mushroom, lemon grass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves topped with chopped cilantro and scallions
S-3 Tom Yum Goong
- Shrimp with chili oil, tomato, baby corn, mushroom, lemon grass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves topped with chopped cilantro and scallions
S-4 Tom Kha Tofu (V)
- Soft tofu cubes with coconut milk, lime juice, mushroom, lemon grass, lime leaves topped with chopped cilantro and scallions
S-5 Tom Kha Gia
- Sliced chicken breast with coconut milk, lime juice, mushroom, lemon grass, lime leaves topped with chopped cilantro and scallions
S-6 Tom Kha Goong
- Shrimp with coconut milk, lime juice, mushroom, lemon grass, lime leaves topped with chopped cilantro and scallions
S-7 Po Tak
(Spicy Seafood Soup)
- Mix seafoods (shrimp, squid, green mussel, fish ball, imitation crab), lime juice, baby corn, mushroom, fresh basil, lemon grass, galangal, kaffir lime leaf topped with chopped cilantro and scallions.
- Add catfish filets
Thai Noodle Soups
Choice of Veggie, Tofu, Chicken, Pork; Fish Beef or Beef Ball, Shrimp
NS-1 Guay Tiew Nam - Simple Noodle Soup (V)
- Sen jan (fresh narrow rice noodle), chicken broth, bean sprouts, topped with dried garlic in oil, chopped cilantro and scallions.
NS-2 Gaeng Jued Woon Sen - Glass Noodle Soup (V)
, with chicken or pork
- Woon sen (glass noodle), chicken broth, carrot, Napa cabbage, celery, black fungus mushrooms, topped with dried garlic in oil, chopped cilantro and scallions
NS-3 Guay Tiew Tom Yum - Noodle Tom Yum (V)
- Sen jan (fresh narrow rice noodle), bean sprouts, cilantro, scallion, lime juice, ground peanut, pickled jalapeno, topped with dried garlic in oil, chopped cilantro and scallions
NS-4 Suki Nam
- Sukiyaki Thai Style
- Woon sen (glass noodle) in Sukiyaki sauce with Napa cabbage, celery, scallion, and egg topped with dried garlic in oil, chopped cilantro and scallions.
NS-5 Guay Tiew Reua
- Boat Noodle Soup
- Pork stock, bean sprouts, kana, many Asian herbs and spices, your choice of sen jan (fresh narrow rice noodle) or sen mei (vermicelli style rice noodle), topped with dried garlic in oil, chopped cilantro and scallions
NS-6 Khao Soi Gai
â Coconut Curry Chicken Noodle Soup
- Two chicken leg, sliced chicken breast and egg noodles combined with yellow curry and Thai spices simmered in coconut milk and topped with chopped red onion, pickled greens, chopped cilantro and crispy noodles.
Thai Salads
TS-1 Som Tum â Papaya Salad (V)
- shredded green papaya, carrots, tomato, green beans, crushed garlic
- Thai Style is slightly sweet and spicy with salty fish sauce, fresh Thai chili and ground roasted peanuts; add dried shrimp
- Lao Style prepared with pla ra (fermented fish sauce), dried chili flakes; add black salted crab
TS-2 Larb â Minced Meat Salad
â Mixed with roasted rice, mint, cilantro, minced red onion and scallion, lime juice, dried chili flakes, fish sauce.
- Chicken or Pork
- Beef
TS-3 Yum Nam Tok â Grilled Meat Salad

- Chicken or Pork
- Beef

- Minced chicken or pork

- Mixed seafood
TS-6 Plaa Goong â Grilled Shrimp Salad
-  Ten grilled shrimp mixed with red onion, roasted rice, dried chili flakes, lemongrass, cilantro, lime juice
TS-7 Op Hoy Malang Phuu - Steam Muscles
- Ten green muscles steamed in fresh basil, galangal, lemongrass and kaffir lime leaf served with a spicy seafood dipping sauce
Stir-Fry Rice
Choice of Veggie, Tofu, Chicken, Pork, Beef, Shrimp. Add kai dao (fried egg on top) to any dish.
R-1 Khao Pad - House Fried Rice (V)
- Tomato, onion, scallion and egg stir-fry in house sauce and topped with cilantro.
R-2 Mammaâs Special Fried Rice
- Tomato, onion, scallion and egg stir-fry in shrimp oil and house sauce and topped with cilantro.
R-3 Khao Pad Krapow - Basil Fried Rice (V)
- Green bean, bell pepper, fresh basil, onion and egg stir-fry in house sauce and topped with cilantro.
R-4 Khao Pad Gaeng Keow Wan - Green Curry Fried Rice
- Green curry paste, green bean, bell pepper, eggplant, fresh basil and egg stir-fry in house sauce and topped with cilantro.
R-5 Khao Pad Gaeng Dang - Red Curry Fried Rice
- Red curry paste, bamboo shoots, bell pepper, green bean, fresh basil and egg stir-fry in house sauce and topped with cilantro.
R-6 Khao Pad Sapparot - Pineapple Fried Rice (V)
- Pineapple, tomato, onion, scallion, and egg stir-fry in yellow curry powder and house sauce and topped with cilantro.
R-7 Khao Pad Nam - Thai Sour Pork Fried Rice
- Thai style soured pork with kana (Chinese broccoli), tomato, onion, scallion and egg stir-fry in house sauce. Topped with cilantro.
R-8 Khao Pad Poo - Thai Crab Fried Rice
- Real lump crab meat with tomato, onion, scallion and egg stir-fry in crab oil and house sauce. Topped with cilantro.
Stir-Fry Noodle
. Choice of Veggie, Tofu, Chicken, Pork, Beef , Shrimp. Add kai dao (fried egg on top) to any dish.
N-1 Pad Thai - The Thai Street Food Standard (V)
- Sen lek (narrow rice stick noodle), scallion, bean sprouts and egg stir-fry in paprika and house tamarind sauce served with side of lime wedge, ground peanut and fresh bean sprouts
N-2 Pad See Ew - Stir-Fry Noodles In Soy Sauce (V)
- Sen yai (wide rice stick noodle), kana and egg and stir-fry with fresh crushed garlic in dark sweet soy sauce and dashed with crushed black pepper
N-3 Pad Kee Mao - Drunken Noodle (V)
- Sen yai (wide rice stick noodle), green bean, bell pepper, baby corn, mushroom, bamboo shoots and fresh basil stir-fry with fresh crushed garlic and house sauce
N-4 Pad Woon Sen - Stir-Fry Glass Noodles (V)
- Woon sen (glass noodle), Napa cabbage, carrots, tomato, onion, scallion, celery, black fungus mushrooms and egg stir-fry in house sauce dashed with crushed black pepper
N-5 Rad Naa - Stir-Fry Noodles In Thai Gravy Sauce (V)
- Your choice of sen yai (wide rice stick noodle) or sen mei (vermicelli style rice noodle), kana and fresh crushed garlic cooked in our house gravy sauce and dashed with crushed black pepper
Mamma's Famous Thai Curry
-Served with a Side of Rice. Choice of Veg, Tofu, Chicken, Pork, Beef, Shrimp.
C-1 Gaeng Dang
- Red curry with coconut milk, kaffir lime leaf, bamboo shoots, bell pepper, fresh basil
C-2 Gaeng Keow Wan
- Green curry with coconut milk, kaffir lime leaf, eggplant, green bean, bell pepper, fresh basil
C-3 Gaeng Karee (V)
- Yellow Curry with coconut milk, potato, onion, carrot
C-4 Gaeng Panang
- Panang curry with coconut milk, kaffir lime leaf, green bean, red and green bell pepper
C-5 Gaeng Massamun
- Massamun Curry with coconut milk, roasted peanut, potato, and onion
Authentic Thai Entrees
-Served with Rice. Choice of Veg, Tofu, Chicken, Pork, Beef, Shrimp.  Served with a side of white jasmine rice.  Add kai dao (fried egg on top) to any dish.
E-1 Pad Krapow â Stir-fry Basil (V)
- Green bean, red and green bell peppers, onion and fresh basil stir-fried with crushed garlic in house sauce
- Thai style (minced meat and chopped veggies)
- Thai style with no veggies only basil and extra minced meat
E-2 Pad Khing Sod â Stir-fry Ginger (V)
- Fresh ginger, onion, carrot, celery and black fungus mushrooms stir-fry in fresh crushed garlic and house sauce
E-3 Pad Prik Khing â Stir-Fry Green Bean In Red Curry Paste
- Mammaâs chili paste, green beans and kaffir lime leaf stir-fry in fresh crushed garlic and house sauce
E-4 Gai Pad Med Mamuang Himmapan â Stir-fry Cashew Nut
- Cashew nut, dried whole Thai chili, onion, scallion and carrot stir-fry in chili oil and house sauce
E-5 Pad Kana or Pad Pok Choi - Stir-fry Chinese Broccoli or Baby Bok Choy (V)
- Kana or Pak Choi or mixed of both, stir-fry with fresh chopped garlic in house sauce
E-6 Pad Ma Kuer â Stir-fry Eggplant (V)
- Eggplant, red and green bell pepper, onion and fresh basil stir-fry with fresh crushed garlic in house sauce
E-7 Pad Karlum â Stir-fry Cabbage (V)
- White cabbage with your choice of chicken, pork or fried tofu stir-fry in fish sauce.
- Add dried shrimp
E-8 Pad Pak â Stir-fry Mixed Vegetables (V)
- Napa cabbage, carrot, mushroom, onion, broccoli crowns, bean sprout, celery and scallions stir-fry in fresh chopped garlic in house sauce
E-9 Pad Kratiem Prik Thai â Stir-fry Garlic (V)
- Fresh chopped garlic topped with steamed broccoli crowns, Napa cabbage, and carrots dashed with cilantro and crushed black pepper
E-10 Pad Preow Wan â Stir-fry Sweet and Sour (V)
- Pineapple chunks, tomato, cucumber, onion and scallion stir-fry in Mammaâs sweet n sour source
E-11 Pra Ram â Thai Peanut Curry (V)
- Green bean, carrot and mushroom stewed in Mammaâs peanut sauce
E-12 Moo Palo - Thai Eggs & Pork Leg In Five Spice Stew
- Traditional Asian five spice stew with boiled eggs and pork leg.
E-13 Nua Pad Prik â Thai Style Pepper Steak
-Sliced beef, red and green bell pepper, onion stir-fry in house gravy sauce
E-14 Sua Rong Hai - Tiger Cry Salad
- 8 oz steak grilled to your liking, sliced and served on a bed of lettuce, tomato, and cucumber with spicy fish dipping sauce
E-15 Naam Khao Thai Steak
-16oz steak (Rib-Eye, New York Strip or similar) sautÃ©ed in our house sauce and grilled to your liking. Comes with a side of steamed vegetables or egg fried rice.
E-16 Pad Ped Pla Duk â Stir-fry Catfish.
- Lightly fried catfish filets with green bean, onion, red and green bell pepper and fresh basil stir-fry in fresh chopped garlic in house sauce
E-17 Plaa Rad Prik - Deep Fried Tilapia
(allow 20-25 minutes)
- Deep fried whole tilapia served with three flavor chili sauce
E-18 Pla Neung - Steamed Tilapia
(allow 30 minutes)
- Steamed whole tilapia with sliced lemons and ginger, lemongrass, fresh basil served with spicy chili sauce
Dessert
Mango Sticky Rice (V)
â Sliced Mango on Thai Sweet Sticky Rice drizzled with sweetened coconut milk
Thai Custard Sticky Rice
â Homemade custard on Thai Sweet Sticky Rice drizzled with sweet coconut milk
Roasted Taro with Tapioca in Sweet Coconut Milk (V)
small (6oz)  medium (16oz)  large (32oz)
Sides & Extras
Add extra egg in stir-fry or soup
Add fried egg on top
Side of steamed veggies small (8oz)  medium (16oz)  large (32oz)
Green leaf lettuce for wraps
Single serving steamed white rice
Upgrade single to large serving steamed white rice
Large serving steamed white rice
Sticky Rice
Sliced mango with or without sweet drizzle
Spicy Levels
At Naam Khao we LOVE SPICY and our levels are the hottest in Houston. However, we realize it is not for everyone. Truth is many Thai people do not eat spicy so that is why almost all of our dishes are individually spiced to your needs.
We use Fresh Thai Chilis or our House Wok Roasted Thai Chili Dust. Menu items are marked with their default spicy level but you can choose the right level for your enjoyment.
Spicy Level
â
None
-
â
Low / Mild
- Just a little bit...
â
Medium
â About same heat level as a fresh jalapeÃ±o
â
Hot
â Most people stop here!
â
Thai Hot
â Very very very spicy, few can eat this!
â
Cry Hot
â Good Luck!
Levels are 0-1-2-3-4-5 but really more like 0-1-2-5-10-50!  Order requested with Hot, Thai Hot and Cry Hot cannot be exchanged or refunded for excessive heat!  If in doubt start with Medium and work your way up.
Please note: Current prices and availability may not be reflected and are subject to change. Final prices can be verified by phone and at time of payment. Thank you for your understanding.
HOURS
Kitchen Takes Last Call 11:30pm nightly!
Lunch Specials:    Monday through Friday 11:00am to 2:00 pm
Dinner Schedule:  Monday through Friday 2:00pm to 11:30pm
Saturday 12:00pm to 11:30pm
Sunday 3:30pm to 11:30pm
Bar Service:
Monday through Wednesday 11:00am to Midnight
Thursday-Friday 11am-2:00am
Saturday Noon to 2:00am
Sunday 3:30pm to Midnight
Happy Hour Beers and Wines Monday through Friday 11:00am-7:00pm
1420 Eldridge Pkwy
Houston, Texas 77077

About the Business
Business owner information
William  H.
Business Owner
Pranee's Thai Cuisine, a small and homey Thai/Laos restaurant, had a humble beginning. It all started with the owner's passion for cooking authentic Southeast Asian dishes, passed down from generations of their family's recipes. Pranee, the restaurant's namesake, decided to take the leap and open her own restaurant in a small and cozy space. With hard work and dedication, the restaurant quickly gained a loyal following among the local community, who loved the authentic flavors and welcoming atmosphere. Though simple in design, Pranee's Thai Cuisine is rich in tradition and culture, reflecting the owner's dedication to sharing their heritage with their customers.

About the Business
Business owner information
Alan O.
Business Owner
We specialize in original authentic Thai homemade cooking that makes us stand out from other restaurants.
Thai food has its unique exotic flavors and veggies for example;
Common flavors in Thai food come from garlic, galangal, coriander/cilantro, lemon grass, shallots, pepper, kaffir lime leaves, shrimp paste, fish sauce, and chilies. Palm sugar, made from the sap of certain Borassus palms, is used to sweeten dishes while lime and tamarind contribute sour notes.

Naha Thai Restaurant, TX
Naha Thai Restaurant, TX welcomes Sugar Land diners to experience the journey of Thai taste with our friendly service. Truly Thai in spirit, Naha Thai Restaurant, TX evokes a sense of culture and authenticity by fusing Thai culinary traditions with a modern interpretation.

All of our food is prepared with 100% Halal ingredients, so you can enjoy every meal with peace of mind.

Served with sticky rice, fresh vegetables and spicy tamarind sauce.
Light batter-fried squid stir fry with salted egg sauce, bell pepper, yellow onion, green onion, and garnish with cilantro served with steamed jasmine rice.
LUNCHEON SPECIAL 12.95
CHOICE of
CHICKEN, PORK, SHRIMP, BEEF
OR FRIED TOFU
(except
Greenish, Eggplant Tofu, and Vegetable Pad Thai)
Served with Steamed Jasmine Rice (except Pad Thai), a vegetable crispy roll and choice of "Soup of the day" or Salad (peanut or vinaigrette dressing)
Available on Monday - Saturday from 11 AM – 3 PM
Princess of Siam
Stir-fried mushrooms, onions, carrots and zucchini in homemade sauce.
Chili Basil 🌶️
Stir-fried fresh basil, carrots, bell peppers, green beans, onions and mushrooms in basil sauce.
Garlic and Pepper Lover
Stir-fried mushrooms in garlic and black pepper sauce served over fresh cabbages and garnished with cilantro.
Cashew Delight
Stir-fried meat with cashew nuts, carrots and onions in special sauce.
Taste of Ginger
Stir-fried fresh ginger, onions, carrots, mushrooms and celery in ginger sauce.
Chili Paste 🌶️
Stir-fried broccoli, basil leaves and onions in chili paste sauce.
Peanut Rama
Sautéed chicken with homemade peanut sauce, steamed mixed vegetables and green onions.
Red Curry 🌶️
Red curry paste, coconut milk, bamboo shoots, peas, carrots and basil.
Yellow Curry 🌶️
Southern Thai style yellow curry paste in coconut milk firm cube potatoes, carrots and red onions.
Green Curry 🌶️
Green curry, coconut milk, bamboo shoots, zucchini, peas and basil.
Chicken Teriyaki
Grilled marinated chicken breast with teriyaki sauce, served with steamed mixed vegetables. (Not available for other protein substitute)
Pad Thai
The oriental Thai noodles creation with green onions, baked tofu, bean sprouts and egg in special sauce. Served with crushed peanuts and lime.
Sweet and Sour
Thai style sautéed cucumbers, onions, tomatoes and pineapples.
Royal Broccoli
Fresh broccoli sautéed in gravy sauce.
Green Dish
A perfect vegetable dish with combination of vegetables, mushrooms, bean sprouts, and fried tofu stir-fried with soy sauce. (available for other protein substitute)
Eggplant Tofu 🌶️
Stir-fried eggplants and fried tofu with broccoli, bell peppers, and fresh basil in spicy basil sauce. (available for other protein substitute)
Vegetable Pad Thai
Thai noodles creation with broccoli, onions, carrots, baked tofu and bean sprout in a special sauce. Served with crushed peanuts and lime.
Substitution :
$1 for substitute with steamed brown rice or steamed vegetables
Extra Chicken, Pork or Tofu for $2, extra Shrimp or Beef for $3 (except Chicken Teriyaki)
Extra charge for substitute or additional ingredients

Privacy Policy
Last modified: 02/22/2022
Introduction
SmilePOS, LLC ("
Company
" or "
We
") respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy. We provide point of sales systems and related products and services (collectively "
Product
" or "
Products
") that help our restaurant customers better manage their business.
This policy describes the types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you visit the websites, Smilepos.com and SmileDining.com (collectively, "
Websites
") or through our Products and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
This policy applies to information we collect:
On the Websites.
In email, text, and other electronic messages between you and the Websites.
Through mobile and desktop applications you download from the Websites, which provide dedicated non-browser-based interaction between you and the Websites.
through our Products used or accessed by us or our Product users.
It does not apply to:
information collected by us offline or through any other means not described in this policy;
information collected by any third party, including through any application or content (including advertising) that may link to or be accessible from the Websites or Products; or
Any third-party websites, products, or services (including those of Product users and their vendors) even if they link to our Websites or Products, and we encourage you to review the applicable privacy policy of those third parties to learn how your information will be collected and used.
Please read this policy carefully to understand our policies and practices regarding your information and how we will treat it. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, your choice is not to use our Websites or Products. By accessing or using the Websites or Products, you agree to this privacy policy. This policy may change from time to time (see Changes to Our Privacy Policy). Your continued use of the Websites or Products after we make changes is deemed to be acceptance of those changes, so please check the policy periodically for updates.
Information We Collect About You and How We Collect It
We collect several types of information from and about users of our Websites and Products (including users of our Websites and Products and customers of our Products users), including information:
By which you may be personally identified, such as name, postal address, e-mail address, telephone number (“
Personal Information
”);
About your internet connection, the equipment you use to access our Websites or Products, and usage details.
We collect this information:
Directly from you when you provide it to us.
Automatically as you navigate through the Websites. Information collected automatically may include usage details, IP addresses, and information collected through cookies, web beacons, and other tracking technologies.
From third parties, for example, our business partners.
Information You Provide to Us
The information we collect on or through our Websites and Products may include:
Information that you provide by filling in forms on our Websites or provided by our Product users. This includes information provided at the time of registering to use our Websites or Product user’s merchandise, subscribing to our Products, or requesting further Products. We may also ask you for information when you report a problem with our Websites or Products, including, without limitation:
Records and copies of your correspondence (including email addresses) if you contact us.
Your responses to surveys for research purposes.
Details of transactions you carry out through our Websites or Products and of the fulfillment of your orders. You may be required to provide financial information before placing an order through our Websites or Products.
Your search queries on the Websites.
Information We Collect Through Automatic Data Collection Technologies
As you navigate through and interact with our Websites, we may use automatic data collection technologies to collect certain information about your equipment, browsing actions, and patterns, including:
Details of your visits to our Websites, including traffic data, location data, logs, and other communication data and the resources that you access and use on the Websites.
Information about your computer and internet connection, including your IP address, operating system, and browser type.
The information we collect automatically does not include Personal Information. It helps us to improve our Websites and to deliver a better and more personalized service, including by enabling us to:
Estimate our audience size and usage patterns.
Store information about your preferences, allowing us to customize our Websites according to your individual interests.
Speed up your searches.
Recognize you when you return to our Websites.
The technologies we use for this automatic data collection may include:
Cookies (or browser cookies).
A cookie is a small file placed on the hard drive of your computer. You may refuse to accept browser cookies by activating the appropriate setting on your browser. However, if you select this setting you may be unable to access certain parts of our Websites. Unless you have adjusted your browser setting so that it will refuse cookies, our system will issue cookies when you direct your browser to our Websites.
Flash Cookies.
Certain features of our Websites may use local stored objects (or Flash cookies) to collect and store information about your preferences and navigation to, from, and on our Websites. Flash cookies are not managed by the same browser settings as are used for browser cookies. For information about managing your privacy and security settings for Flash cookies, see Choices About How We Use and Disclose Your Information.
Web Beacons.
Pages of the Websites and our e-mails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs, pixel tags, and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company, for example, to count users who have visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of certain website content and verifying system and server integrity).
Children Under the Age of 13
Our Websites or Products are not intended for children under 13 years of age. No one under age 13 may provide any information to the Websites or Products. We do not knowingly collect Personal Information from children under 13. If you are under 13, do not use or provide any information on the Websites or through our Products. If we learn we have collected or received Personal Information from a child under 13 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 13, please contact us at
[email protected]
.
How We Use Your Information
We use information that we collect about you or that you provide to us, including any Personal Information:
To present our Websites and its contents to you.
To provide you with information or Products that you request from us.
To fulfill any other purpose for which you provide it.
To provide you with notices about your account/subscription, including expiration and renewal notices.
To carry out our obligations and enforce our rights arising from any contracts entered between you and us, including for billing and collection.
To notify you about changes to our Websites or any Products we offer or provide though it.
To allow you to participate in interactive features on our Websites.
In any other way we may describe when you provide the information.
For any other purpose with your consent.
We may also use your information to contact you about our Products and third-parties' goods and services that may be of interest to you. If you do not want us to use your information in this way, or if you want to change your information with us, adjust your user preferences or change your information in your account profile, or contact us as stated in Contact Information.  You may also delete your information by clicking the delete button in your account profile or contacting us as stated in Contact Information.  For more information, see Choices About How We Use and Disclose Your Information and Contact Information.
Disclosure of Your Information
We may disclose aggregated information about our users and information that does not identify any individual, without restriction.
We may disclose Personal Information that we collect, or you provide as described in this privacy policy:
To our subsidiaries and affiliates.
To contractors, service providers, and other third parties we use to support our business and who are bound by contractual obligations to keep Personal Information confidential and use it only for the purposes for which we disclose it to them.
To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Company’s assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Information held by Company about our Websites and Product users is among the assets transferred.
For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information.
With your consent.
We may also disclose your Personal Information:
To comply with any court order, law, or legal process, including to respond to any government or regulatory request.
To enforce or apply our terms of use and other agreements, including for billing and collection purposes.
If we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to protect the rights, property, or safety of the Company, our customers, or others. This includes exchanging information with other companies and organizations for the purposes of fraud protection and credit risk reduction.
Choices About How We Use and Disclose Your Information
We strive to provide you with choices regarding the Personal Information you provide to us. We have created mechanisms to provide you with the following control over your information:
Tracking Technologies and Advertising.
You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, or to alert you when cookies are being sent. To learn how you can manage your Flash cookie settings, visit the Flash player settings page on Adobe's website. If you disable or refuse cookies, please note that some parts of this site may then be inaccessible or not function properly.
Data Security
Unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we do our best to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee the security of your Personal Information transmitted to our Websites or through our Products. Any transmission of Personal Information is at your own risk. We are not responsible for circumvention of any privacy settings or security measures contained on the Websites or the Products.
Changes to Our Privacy Policy
It is our policy to post any changes we make to our privacy policy on this page. If we make material changes to how we treat our users' Personal Information, we will notify you by email to the email address specified in your account or through a notice on the Websites. The date the privacy policy was last revised is identified at the top of the page. You are responsible for ensuring we have an up- to-date active and deliverable email address for you, and for periodically visiting our Websites and this privacy policy to check for any changes.
Contact Information
To ask questions or comment about this privacy policy and our privacy practices, contact us at:
SmilePOS, LLC, PO Box 2653, Lynnwood, WA 98036 or
[email protected]
.
Accessibility Statement
SmilePOS LLC (“SmilePOS,” “we,” “our,” or “us”) is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities.  We are continually improving the user experience for everyone, and applying the relevant accessibility standards.
Measures to Support Accessibility
SmilePOS takes the following measures to ensure accessibility of Smile Dining website:
Incorporate accessibility considerations into our digital resource design process.
Ensures accessibility is part of our continuous improvement process.
Follow reasonable technical practices for digital accessibility.
Conformance Status
The Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG)
defines requirements for designers and developers to improve accessibility for people with disabilities.  It defines three levels of conformance: Level A, Level AA, and Level AAA.  Smile Dining website is conformant with WCAG 2.0 level AA and partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 level AA.   Partially conformant means that some parts of the content do not fully conform to the accessibility standard.
Feedback
We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Smile Dining website.  Please let us know if you encounter accessibility barriers:
Phone: (206) 905-9025
E-mail:
[email protected]
Compatibility with Browsers and Assistive Technology
Smile Dining website is designed to be compatible with assistive technologies and the last two versions of major browsers, including Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Safari, and Firefox.
In Internet Explorer 10, 11, and older browsers, some aspects of the website may not display optimally.  Smile Dining website is not designed for Internet Explorer 9 and earlier versions.
Technical Specifications
Accessibility of Smile Dining website relies on the following technologies to work with the particular combination of web browser and any assistive technologies or plugins installed on your computer:
HTML
CSS
JavaScript
SVG
These technologies are relied upon for conformance with the accessibility standards used.
Limitations and Alternatives
Despite our best efforts to ensure accessibility of Smile Dining website, there may be some limitations.  Please contact us as described in “Feedback” above if you encounter any issues in accessing our website.
Assessment Approach
SmilePOS assessed the accessibility of Smile Dining website by self-evaluation.
Formal complaints
If you wish to send us a formal complaint regarding accessibility accommodations of this website, please contact us as described in “Feedback” above.
Formal Approval of this Accessibility Statement
This Accessibility Statement is approved by:
SmilePOS LLC
